hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: The presentation of the hotel was beyond expectations. What stood out most to me was the great way the whole staff treated me and my fiance. JL (John) in particular went above and beyond. He was very friendly and helpful as soon as we stepped into the lobby and he checked us in. I would definitely come back or recommend ! 10/10
user_name:
mimilovsya
New York City, New York

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: This hotel really understands what makes a difference to a guests stay....Service and attitude of staff. They are a happy and very accommodating group and will do everything they can to make your stay memorable. We are definitely staying only here on our next trip to NYC. This is a perfect hotel for people travelling with kidsPros1. 5 mins walk to Times square and empire state building/macy's 2. Kitchen and utensils in your room if you dont want to eat out. They have everything you need (1 non stick and 2 normal pots and pans, cutlery, knife, plates, bowls, glasses etc and a stove top and a full fridge, dishwasher, washing liquid)3. Breakfast in morning and to go boxes for kids. Good variety, but can do more for vegetarians given a lot of people are converting now to vegan and vegetarian4. Excellent service from staff. They provide all the comfort they can. I had an issue with my room rate, they resolved it at check in. I needed a taxi they ran to the corner of st and got me one. Needed a box for my child to take some food for the day, and it was not a problem.5. Free teas and coffee throughout the day. Not a big consumer myself but it makes lot of difference to some people. Areas of improvement1. More variety in breakfast for vegetarians. Mix it up a little as when someone is staying 3-4 days or a week it is good to have some variety. I know they changed 2 items mostly but with the price and how much people love breakfast here I think the team can do much better. A live omlette bar/pancakes bar will be a dream come true :)

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: great midtown location, attractive lobby, friendly and responsive staff who were helpful in knowing the area and directing me. filling breakfasts with lots of fresh fruit, pastries. I highly recommend.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Great service. Beautiful rooftop seating. The hotel allowed free early check in, late check out. Nice kitchenette, coffee and tea 24hrs in lobby. Nice free breakfast. Nice location. All staff so nice.
user_name:
lizzie10017
New York City, New York

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I can’t say enough good things about the facilities, the room, but what prompts to write this positive review is the stellar staff and management. At every point (and mind you it is The 2020 Pandemic) from JL to everyone at the front desk, engineer, housekeeping were professional, kind, attentive, and helpful. A breath of fresh air during the advent of challenging times for everyone. Bravo to them. Hilton Corporation = give these good hospitality professionals a bonus ASAP. They represent you beyond your expectations!!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We were greeted by Audreen on arrival, who was warm, welcoming and polite at every interaction.Jackson was serving breakfast most mornings and he was so friendly and chatty with us and our baby Ava. We loved our stay. The room had everything we needed. This hotel is perfect for young families.Thank you to all the wonderful staff.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: From the reception you get from the staff, to the well appointed and immaculately clean rooms, a stay at this Homewood Suites property will not disappoint! During 8 nights I stayed at the hotel during the month of March, I found that Idris, Audrine, Kayla, and Mike along with Nick are among the best hospitality professionals that I have encountered! I must also give props to the Housekeeping Staff: They are not only courteous when you run into them in the hallway and elevators, but the attention to detail in cleaning, making up, and maintaining the rooms resulted in me having a worry-free experience. Needless to say, I highly recommend this property!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Know how you see hotel pics online then you get to your room & you're like what the hell men!!, well, at Homewood suites midtown nyc, you'll check in & say thank Heaven!! Thanks JL, Kayla& Nick, Nice!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: First off the communication with the hotel is great via the app. It was nice, JT & Kayla are amazing. It was nice not to have to go to the front desk for ANYTHING given the new social distancing standards. Hilton's digital key worked wonders ! Very safe and clean hotel. Rooms had great amenities especially by NYC standards. I hope to stay there again soon to get away.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Hotel was clean and well maintained. Breakfast was varied and abundant. Room was much smaller than it looked in the photo's. Very cramped for 3 people, and the pull out bed was small and uncomfortable. Well equipped large gym, but no earbuds to use in the gym even though sign said to ask at reception for them. Nice reception people and accommodating. Good location. Long wait for elevators.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I have been travelling a lot and stayed in many different places with my family worldwild. I stayed in homewood suites in a very particular moment because of covid 19, and it obviously added a lot more difficulties to the management and staff. EVERYONE from the whole team at all levels and departments has been more than wonderfull. Very professional, fast responding always smiling, ready to help and make feel safe and clean. I will for sure be back BRAVO !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!A big hurray for breakfast and kitchen team, front desk and all the ladies from house keeping.... Please follow my comments to your staff !

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: My spouse and I stayed at the Homewood Suites Midtown Manhattan Times Square South for two nights over a long weekend in mid-February 2020. We reserved our stay online using the Hilton HHonors website. Although we are Diamond members, we did not receive any kind of an upgrade (such as to a higher floor; in fact, we could not have been on any lower of a floor!). The Manhattan Homewood Suites property is located on West 37th Street in Chelsea. We chose this property because it was located between Port Authority (where we parked our car) and Madison Square Garden (where we had tickets to see the Eagles Hotel California tour). Many shops and restaurants are located just steps from the hotel, although the shops are more of the souvenir variety and the restaurants are more functional than destination dining. (We ate at the full-service Houndstooth Irish Pub nearby, which was better-than-expected; see our separate review. We also had some food at Doylers Irish Pub at the Hilton Garden Inn just a few doors away; see our separate review.)Public spaces include a high-ceilinged lobby, with areas for the front desk/pantry store, overflow breakfast seating at regular-height tables, one high-top communal table with charging ports, a two-sided gas fireplace, a wall with a lovely glass waterfall feature, and some comfy lounge seating. Three elevators whisk guests to the floors above. There is some narrow outdoor space through the rear of the building, as well as an area that overlooks the basement-level fitness center. A buffet breakfast area that can be closed off doubles as luggage storage in the afternoon and evening. The hotel offers a rooftop terrace in warmer weather. Our studio suite was located on the second floor, which has a sort of atrium feature because it is open to the lobby below. Our room overlooked West 37th Street, and although initially we wished that we had been assigned a higher floor, the second floor proved interesting because we could watch the pedestrian and vehicle traffic on the street below from our own private floor-to-ceiling window. We entered our room near the bathroom, which was an acceptable size for one person at a time, including a small sink vanity, toilet, and a long but narrow standing shower (no bathtub). An adjacent closet offered plenty of storage space, including a hang bar and shelving unit as well as space to hold our suitcase on a luggage rack so that we could then close everything away behind doors; the closet even had a light as well as a large safe, iron, and tabletop ironing board. The main room contained a small kitchenette at one end (with an apartment-sized refrigerator/freezer, small sink, microwave, two-burner stovetop, and tiny dishwasher, as well as the cups, plates, utensils, and cookware necessary to prepare a simple meal). A king-size bed occupied the middle of the room (across from which was the wall-mounted TV), small chest of drawers, desk (with a roll-out extension below it), with an end table and small sofa with ottoman (which unfolded to expand the surface) near the windows. We liked the layout of this studio suite because of the extra space and comfort it provided. (Note that there is no door between the living and sleeping areas in the junior suite.)We enjoyed our stay at the Homewood Suites Midtown Manhattan Times Square South, and we would stay there again.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: He was the most friendly member of the wait staff and personally greeted every single morning regardless of how busy he was. He made the buffet breakfast experience most enjoyable for my family and I!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I was in the hotel twice and every time Jonathan is kindly helping and giving the best service thanks so much! I recommend the hotel to everyone! I enjoyed the location you can walk/drive everywhere! there is many places to shop and grab food

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: This hotel has the BEST CUSTOMER SERVICE I have ever experienced! I had to cancel my upcoming trip due to the Covid-19 virus. I booked through a third-party service and could not get through due to the high call volume. I called the hotel directly on told them what was happening. Per the third-party agreement the hotel did not have to work with me, but I spoke with Jeanette who went out of her way to talk with management. Both management and Jeanette understood the situation and agreed to refund my money even though they did not have to. This is an honest, friendly business. I will be rescheduling my trip and I will absolutely stay in this hotel. This is a time when businesses could take advantage of others, but this business did the socially responsible thing. I am very grateful. I have spent a lot of time in NYC and know that this is a great location. I look forward to rescheduling soon. Again, I cannot say enough positive about how friendly and honest this business is.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: It was a comfortable stay I enjoy been there for the three nights I was there store are closed by so u don’t have to drive you can walk to everything around there bed and rooms were nice and clean so I will be staying again

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We are silver HH members who booked a King Efficiency Studio with Sofabed for 3 people for $108.85 USD per night (inclusive of tax and all fees PLUS free breakfast) about 3 days in advance during all the coronavirus craziness. I think 3 things are critical to a hotel stay so always prioritize reviewing the property location, a good night's rest, and a good morning shower:LOCATION: 4.5/5. Located in the garment district (lost of clothes re-sellers), about a 10 minute walk from either Times Square or Penn Station - exactly perfect for not having to drag your bags very far while also being close to the action and good subway stations.GOOD SLEEP: 5/5 Comfortable bedding, room was quiet, and no issues at all.SHOWER: 4.5/5 Hot water and good pressure. Average toiletries. Nice sized walk in shower with door.....but the door didn't close all the way and the seal was cracked in a few places which resulted in some water leaking out after every shower that needed to be cleaned up.....but I forgot to tell them about the problem, so some of that is my fault too. Other Comments:- FREE coffee and tea and water in the lobby- 2 FREE bottles of water on arrival for our HH status- We arrived VERY early at 9:45 AM for our evening stay and were expecting to just leave our bags BUT they surprised us by going ahead and checking us in AND invited us to grab a bite of what was left at breakfast.- Speaking of breakfast - it is GREAT and FREE. Much more comprehensive and nice than average hotel continental - they had juices, coffees, teas, fruit, oatmeal, pastries, muffins, hot eggs, hot sausage/ meat, potatoes, and some kind of (varied by day) waffle/ pancake/ french toast. This is a huge convenient value in NYC and probably saves you $10-$15 per person. - Complimentary newspaper- Staff were all friendly and helpful.- The hotel lobby is very nice and inviting with nice spaces to hang out and relax near the fireplace. The rooms was fairly modern and in good shape.We had previously stayed right next to Times Square at hotels that probably charge 40% more per night AND now have started charging an extremely insulting $30 per day resort charge for things that are free or unnecessary (land line phone, WIFI, etc).....so this place is a gem. Particularly if you want to split being close to Penn Station and Times Square. We will definitely be back - nice place!!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: A great hotel with large spacious rooms. The room included a kitchenette with dishwasher and large fridge. The complimentary breakfast was good quality and always well replenished as soon as items ran out.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Employees made checking in easy. Big room for NYC. Great location and very clean. Elevators are fast. both the bed and pull out sofa are extremely comfortable Nice to have a medium size refrigerator, microwave and sink in the room. The free breakfast is better than some restaurants!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We spent 9 nights in the hotel which is situated near Madison Square Garden and Macy's. There are many groceries and shops around. Checking in and checking out are standard and efficient without any particular attention. (The receptionist was ostensibly chewing gum and dancing!)The room is spacious with all the kitchen commodities but there could be some more spaces to put away your stuff. We were on the 12th floor and didn't get any noise. The heater functions well.Breakfast changes every day and offers an important variety of choices. Boxes are available to bring food in your room. We particularly want to thank Jackson who has a particular attention for everyone every morning.All day long, tea and coffee is available in the lobby. If you wake up early it is more interesting to have breakfast before 8.30 am if you want to avoid the crowd.In case of technical problem, Mike is friendly and very efficient. Thanks to him as well.The limo service to drive to the airport is also efficient (75$ a car to JFK)We definitely recommend this hotel.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: While I didn’t end up staying at the hotel, I needed to cancel for business reasons after the cancellation deadline, and the customer service I spoke to Was so helpful! They waived the fee for a one-time good faith gesture, and I was very appreciative!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: My husband and I stayed at this hotel during a weekday last week. We are loyal to the Hilton brand and are Hilton Honors members.Upon attempting to check into the hotel at noon, and although rooms were available, we were told that we would have to pay $50. for an early check in. This was new to me! We left our luggage behind at the hotel, went sightseeing, and returned later in the afternoon to complete our check in process. This is very bad PR. It would have been better to simply say that no rooms were available.We were looking forward to their complimentary evening social hour (advertised on their website) prior to attending a Broadway play, only to find that it does not exist. This is false advertising. We left the hotel and found a happy hour elsewhere.Our hotel room was clean and comfortable. The bathroom had limited vanity space, in that there is no where to place your personal items. We were told that our room had " a nice city view". We overlooked an office building, which blocked out any daylight.There was a kitchenette in our room, which is of value if you are using it. We were staying for one overnight, so did not use it. Breakfast the following morning was busy, and the offerings were so/so. The workers were courteous and were trying to replenish items quickly.The location of this hotel is conviently located between Penn Station and the theater district. For us, this is well positioned. However, there are several hotels in this area, and for us, we will probably look elsewhere on our next visit to NYC. Homewood Suites is on the higher end costwise of hotels in that area. They did not deliver on their value.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Shivangi was simply great at Homewood suites NY. Very accommodating and friendly! I would definitely recommend this hotel - had a great stay and time in NY. Breakfast was cool- would have preferred more vegan options though!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Ever wanted to stay in an manhattan modern apartment near the heart of everything . long term stay for more then 10 days this is your place . the rooms are soundproof updated decor a lot of space for work entertainment and a good night sleep . they offer evening reception you can even save on eating out every night such good cooked meals . staff is accommodating in every way

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Good clean accomodation in a handy spot. Accomodation includes breakfast which is good and has many options, it’s not a 5 star hotel where things can be made fresh for you. Room sizes are good for NYC. It’s In A safe spot and easy to get around.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I decided to stay here since it was close to my party. I arrived at 4 to check in and was told the room wasnt ready. When asked how long I was told I don't know. I waited an hour for my room. No one kept me updated. They just had me sitting there off to the side. I had to go back to the desk. The room was nice and comfortable though

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Not your usual breakfast. Variety, quality and quantity. Fantastic! They even provided little cardboard boxes for food so you can take it to your room. How great is that?! Will recommend this hotel to my friends...

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Stayed at Homewood Suites for a week in NYC with my partner. It was amazing! Location is fantastic. Walked to Times Square, Broadway, Central Park, and easy train to 9/11 and Battery Park. Very central. We love walking so the 15 blocks to Chelsea for some more intimate meals were super pleasant. Free breakfast was amazing. Please be aware it is free and not a restaurant. Hot food, cold food, breads, oatmeal, cereals, basics. Each day was so great and a major money saver! Rooms are great size, two large suitcase were able to be unpacked and a big tip for future travelers: consider sliding your suitcase under the night stands. not in the way at all and really enjoyed the space. We will be back for sure. Best deal, friendly staff, fireplace in lobby. Loved it!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: This is a great hotel. I was happy with almost every aspect of it. There were a few you little things here and there that I wasn’t happy with, like I could hear doors opening and closing all night and I had to deal with an issue I thought I’d solved before I came on the trip, but over all I was really happy with my stay.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Nice location. Close to Macys and Penn Station so easily accesible from Kennedy and Newark Airports using public transportation. Rooms were clean and comfy.Staff is nice. The only negative is that walls are a bit thin but it was quiet during the overnight hours.I would definitely stay here again.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I had to cancel my flight and my Hotel reservation for my trip to NY. The customer service has been very comprehensive on my situation and did not apply the cancellation fee.I will for sure book at Homewood Suites on my next trip to NY.Thank you

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Had a wonderful stay in NY at this great hotel. Our room was spacious and clean and the location was ideal, very close to Time Square. The breakfast was amazing and the staff very friendly and helpful; special mention for Jackson who took care of us at breakfast most mornings and was so friendly and a joy to talk with!!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Beautiful facility, lovely, clean room, great breakfast included, very friendly and knowledgeable staff ready to assist with any of our on-stie needs. Reservations were easy and staff accommodated requests.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Just returned from a 5 night stay and it is very difficult to find fault with this hotel .Room very clean and bigger than most in New York ,fully equiped kitchen and fast wi-fi . Good location , close to Times Square and Penn Station . Very good hot breakfast , some previous reviews had suggested very crowded and nowhere to sit , but we had no such problems . Lifts quick and reliable and all staff very helpful and friendly , especially front desk . We had a couple of minor problems and they were resolved promptly. Would go back , no doubt about it

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I checked in around 4.00 pm and I was told that since you have booked for premium room and it’s upgraded one and room is not ready. Moreover the behaviour of front desk person was very casual and unprofessional. Last time for me to stay here. Overall pathetic experience and just no professionalism. I felt that I made a big mistake in booking a premium room, for which I expected atleast decent service but the experience has been just so opposite.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: For a family of 5, this room was perfect. About 4 blocks from times square and three from Penn Station, we walked and took the subway everywhere! Honestly, we weren’t in the hotel much except to sleep and have breakfast (breakfast included!), but room was quiet and comfortable. Breakfast was actually a highlight. The staff down there worked their butts off the keep food supplied and clear tables for a very busy breakfast. Jackson, in particular, was super friendly and helpful. Will definitely stay here again!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Excellent breakfast, with some vegetarian options. Clean fitness room and excellent kitchenettes with refrigerator! Coffee and tea were always available. The staff was quite hospitable. Will stay here again.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Hotel is close to the subway and in walking distance of Times Square. Rooms are not the largest I’ve ever seen but fine for a city trip, very clean with a small kitchen which is great. Breakfast is nice with lots of fresh fruit, bagels and different kinds of pastries. A special thanks to Jackson and Felix who made sure my son could enjoy a gluten free breakfast every morning. Thanks guys!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Booked 4 days in NYC through British Airways Holidays and chose the Homewood Suites as our base. Situated on West 37th Street in the Garment District this is a great hotel for a short break. The room we had had a kitchenette, good sized bathroom (no bath) and a terrace! Very nice room, comfortable bed and very quiet apart from the odd traffic noise. Security is good and you need your room card to access the lifts. Breakfast is included and is varied but don’t expect a full English! A bonus is they encourage you to make a packed lunch if you want which saved us $$! Hot drinks are available 24/7 and there is also a fitness suite.The hotel is close to Penn Stn on 8th which takes you directly to the JFK Air-train. Friendly staff and overall a great place to stay when visiting NY.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I stayed in the Homewood Suites for two nights. The first morning, I woke up at 10:00 am only to realize I would miss breakfast if I didn't hurry and get downstairs. My brother and I left the safe open with our items inside, including my wallet. I came back 30 minutes later to realize that someone (cleaning staff) had come into the room to make the bed. An extra blanket was left on-top not folded at all and no clean towels were left. My brother and I thought this was strange that only the bed was made and nothing else cleaned or tidied all within 30 minutes. Fast forward to checking out the following day. We do a thorough check of the room to make sure nothing is left behind, literally nothing. I arrive at the airport to leave and for some reason I cannot find my wallet. I panic and search all my things. I call the hotel and ask them to do another check of the room. I'm told they have found it... in the safe, which is totally not accurate. I'm then told I will need to fill out an online form, which will need to include a photo of my passport and visa so the wallet can be sent back to me in Toronto. The form allows you to select how fast you would like the delivery to be. I ask for two days. The lost and found contact for the hotel however, doesn't work on this particular Saturday and therefore doesn't see my request until Monday. I then receive my wallet on Thursday and now have to pay $100. The whole experience was weird and didn't sit right with me.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: This place is excellent! Nicely appointed and immaculately clean. I highly recommend it. Centrally located. Close to the train and bus stations and Madison Square Garden . The staff is very helpful and polite.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: My overall experience was good. The room was a little cold. We had to crank up the heat to 80 degrees in or to get warm. Although it was sub 25 degrees in the city that night , it was still unusually cold.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: The staff was very good to me and helpful. Jejejenelenejeiejrkrormirrirbrkrjrkrkrirlrmjekfnrkebjdieekemekeenenelrnfifnfnlfoenrrjirnrkrkrnrorjirnrbrbwldhurbrkrnrkrjrinrnrjrnurjrbrurjrnrjrirkrjrirjjrikr

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: As usual, Audreen & the front desk staff @ this Hilton Property, made my stay extremely pleasant again. moved me to a better room after WiFi issues, breakfast quality went up considerably. Kudos to Lisette and staff

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: convenient hotel to broadway and madison square garden. spacious modern clean rooms with a very decent breakfast. (fresh fruit)! 24 hour coffee tea and cocoa in lobby. great hotel for the money. discounted parking right next door

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: nice rooms, nice bkfst, gym and the best location you can get. 5 min from times square, 5 mins from hudson yards, 5 mins form 34 and 6 and 5 min from a lot of metro lines!!ypu can dine in your room, you can dine in the lobby, fast elevators!!!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: While the location of this hotel definitely receives high marks, the real asset in this venue are the people who work there. We enjoyed an extended stay, and, the staff was unfailingly friendly and helpful. Our experience in that regard was well above average. The Hilton brand is well represented here and we have enjoyed staying at many of their hotels. The quality of accommodations is good. Guests are offered a buffet breakfast bar. Food was OK but not equal to Hilton's best breakfast offerings. The rooms generally are spacious, clean and comfortable. We liked having a kitchenette including full size fridge, sink, small stove top, and, a dishwasher in the room. Bathrooms have ample space and include a walk-in shower. Bedding was just right. Heating and air worked well. WiFi was excellent. Elevators are busy and require a room key to get to any floor except the lobby level. The key detectors in the elevators did not work consistently. That can slow down the process and has almost no security benefit as tail gating is prevalent. But overall ride times were not excessive. Many guests expressed some frustration with having to use keys to run the elevators. Since the system is so simply defeated, it is just a nuisance. The TV was flat screen with one premium channel. Some channels suffered from buffering due we assume to network issues. There is a small laundry on site where guests can wash and dry their clothes for $3.50 per load. The hotel needs to install a clothes rack for hanging up wrinkle free garments. There is a folding table. The fitness center is very nice.We enjoyed being centrally located in the garment district, not far from Times Square, the theater district, Hudson Yard, Madison Square Garden and Penn Station. With The Port Authority terminal and multiple subway stations nearby we found getting around the city pretty easy. There are Uber, Lyft and taxi rides for portal to portal travel although we like Dial 7 car service which is about as cheap or cheaper depending on the time of day, and, more reliably available.. There is a Brooklyn Fare grocery store close by as well as both Duane Reade and CVS pharmacies. Several banks have walk-in locations within a short walk. CityMD, a walk-in clinic, faces 8th Av between 33rd and 34th St, within easy walking distance. There are lots of restaurants nearby. We found the most visitor friendly place was the Essen Slow Fast Food restaurant on 8th Av and 36th St where you serve yourself buffet style just the kinds and amounts of food you want, then pay by the pound. Their selection of freshly prepared food was impressive. They have a some seating but we usually brought our food back to the room as Essen was only a short walk away from the hotel. We will definitely stay at Homewood Suites again on a future visit. If you found this information helpful please click the link below to let us know.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: The staff went above and beyond for us when we arrived at 6:00am and got cheated by another hotel (Paramount Hotel, took our money, wouldn't allow us to check in early even if we paid, hotel was horrible, smelled like weed, staff was unprofessional and rude). Homewood Suites and Hilton staff got us a room with early checking and very accommodating. they went above and beyond! that is how service should work.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I found small wood piece in muffin I eat I told manger about that .she said we dont prepare these here .I mean that is not my answer to problem ..she should maintain the quality of food...hotel accommodation is good...

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Nice and comfortable hotel, and very convenient location in Midtown Manhattan. Within walking distance to Times Square, Macy’s Heralds Square, the Empire States Building, Madison Square Garden, etc. Breakfast included, quite plenty of breakfast food choices. Comfortable room, bed, and bathroom. Very friendly and helpful front desk staffs. We stayed 3 nights at TRYP hotel and 1 night at Homewood Suites for our NYC trip, they were within a short 1 or 2 blocks of each other. Both were great hotels, we highly recommend them.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I have all recommendations for this hotel. The front desk is polite, helpful and most importantly you felt welcome. Common areas are nice and clean, lot of seating areas, fireplace while the rooms are even bigger surprise. There is ample space in the room without feeling cramped yet there is everything you need for a nice plasent stay.My only criticism is the charge of $50 for 3 hours earlier check in.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Jackson went above and beyond to help with our needs! He was especially nice to my daughter and found ways to assist her and checked up on us as we were eating breakfast. To top it off, breakfast was about to be over and not once did I feel like he was rushing us or anything. He was always willing to help.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Got a king room. Very small. No where to put anything in the room or bathroom. No where to put toiletries around the sink.No mirror at the desk. Shower is nice. The room is just extremely small uncomfortable and does not allow for space to leave anything out. Asked for a list of restaurants but they dont have one. Location is okay is you are willing and able to walk 7 to 14 blocks to get anywhere. Lots of selection at breakfast. It's good for a hotel breakfast. We would not stay here again.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We had a king studio 1616 and I think it is so well laid-out. Also, ask for a room in the back to cut down on noise. There is plenty of room for clothes, nightstands that have drawers, a decent tiny sofa with a hammock, and the kitchenette has everything you need. The only suggestion would be a shaving/makeup mirror in the bathroom and maybe a little extra shelf there too.After a few slight glitches with room selection, the front desk got everything straightened out, with good humor and friendliness. The breakfast was fine, and the food service folks were friendly and attentive.This will be our go-to hotel in the city.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: It’s my second time at this hotel. Enjoyed as last time so far .... wifi excellent room clean and with some extras such has possibility of cooking a light meal due to built in Room kitchen .....Very good located in Midtown so easy to reach places and only few blocks far from Penn station ...... what else ...????

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: This hotel has lack of professional, courteous and service minded Reception Desk staff. The gym and laundry room are not at a level of a Hilton. They don’t offer socials even though it is advertised on their website.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: The service and the staff was absolutely wonderful! The breakfast was outstanding and they were so kind every morning. We’d like to mention Pedro, Jackson and Felix. They made sure we were greeted every morning and provided us with excellent service.Keep up the good job!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: The hotel was brilliant, more than we were expected. The staff is very friendly, helpful and the breakfast really delicious.Many thanks to Jackson, Felix, Pedro, Lissett and Ana for everything.I would like to mention that the housekeeper done a very good job. (room 2108 - 27.01.20 - 03.02.20)

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: This hotel is well-located, clean, friendly and reasonably priced. Our room was comfortable and the daily breakfast buffet was a great way to start the day. The hot menu changes daily and the buffet times are amply set (6-10:30 a.m.)

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Home wood suites is a fantastic resort to stay in and rest after hectic days out sightseeing in the city. Staff were very helpful and Jackson the breakfast server was kind, helpful, friendly and a nice gentleman to meet. Rooms were very well maintained and very comfortable for the stay. Would recommend the hotel and the breakfast is great for fuelling up for a busy day. Thank you very much

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We've stayed at Homewood suites for a week during winter.The room is spacious and the everything works as it should. The location is excellent and all is clean and nice.Kitchen would not be have been sufficiently furnished if we were to have traveled with our small children and expecting to actually use it for children meals. AC is sometimes noisy but the fact that we had 10F outside may be a plausible explanation.Complementary breakfast is very helpful.Very good value for money.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: To make it short.Very clean including the kitchen.Rather small room but everything was there. The nights were cold and there was no second blanket but some sort of a sheet in the drawer which worked fine as well.Considering the breakfast was included for free, the quality and variety was great.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Everything is ok recommended hotel for business or vacations with family. Sou brasileiro e recommends o hotel, inclusive com early check in para queen chela em ny credo Vinod do Brazil. thanks idriss.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Staff from the general manager down provides great service and is willing and able to help with your stay. They showed considerable knowledge of the city in general and the neighborhood specifically for both, being a tourist or blending in with the local scene. Food and room notably above average for comparably priced city hotels. Only knock is the elevators can be a bit overworked and slow during high traffic times.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: This property does not have an evening social time and does not disclose it. This should be disclosed at the time of the reservation. One of the front desk staff patronized me when I asked about it. he said they cut it out because he drank all the beer.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: These people take care of you. Great accomodations and locations, as well as courteous and friendly staff. The elevator can be a bit tricky because you have to tap your room key to push a button, but only after the door closes, and if your hands are full, it's a struggle. So the cleaning staff was always great about helping you.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Great hotel. I would recommend this hotel to anyone staying in the city. Its in a great location. The staff were very professional and saw to our needs. The bathrooms are a bit small but par for the course for NYC. They made up for the size with quality.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: JACKSON made our mornings really happy. He is a credit to your team! The front of house guys were great. The food was OK. The room was OK. The fridge was so noisy and every night about 2am noise people outside room. But overall it was pretty OK.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: The service was outstanding. I liked the room, it was very large for New York Standards and included a desk ,chair and small coach that could be converted to a bed and included a kitchenette with a large refrigerator. The location was good. Great amenities with a fitness center, laundry and small business office with two computers and free printing. Free breakfast was a complete buffet style with many choices. Staff at breakfast very helpful, I especially enjoyed the service by one particular employee, Jackson, he was the best!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: The hotel is really good, well located and well maintained. Me and my family needed an early check in, and all the employees were really thoughtful and helpful. Will definitely recommend to friends!!!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Homewood Suites was a great choice for a long term stay in New York. This hotel has very nice suites, great staff, awesome location, good amenities and super comfortable beds. I highly recommend this hotel for your long or short term stay.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: first i felt that the employees are very kind. when i have some problems with the shower tap and air conditioner they came up to my room and fix them very soon. The employees always smile at me. It is impressive. The facilities and snacks, and teas, coffee capsules are very useful here!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: The room was clean and big enough for our family of 5. The fridge held our snacks, the breakfast was huge and delicious, and the location was convenient from both Penn Station and Times Square. We will definitely stay here again!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Its location near Penn Station and the Port Authority Bus Terminal and Times Square and the theater district makes this hotel extremely attractive. All the subway lines are a short walk to Penn Station. The complimentary breakfast was mundane, but filling.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We throughly enjoyed this hotel. The location was perfect. The staff was so nice and helpful! The room was big. Towels were new and very white. The bed was very comfortable. Free breakfast? Where do you get that in NYC??

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I prefer Hilton brands if possible and this hotel is the reason why. Great staff and everything was easy from the moment we walked in. Beautiful room and the ideal location. Definitely will stay here again!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We have received a really good attendance from Idris. We just got to the city and were really tired from the trip and cold. It’s so nice to start our vacation with a great service at the hotel. Thank you Idris!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Enjoy the stay. The only drawback was no pool or hot tub facility that I know of. The complementary breakfast was nice, the coffee in the lobby was available all day but late in the evening, it was often cold (just make a fresh cup in your room)

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: The hotel is located in midtown and previous reviews have helped set certain expectations for me before my trip (i.e lifts can take a while, breakfast can be overwhelmingly crowded with little space to sit). Those reviews probably helped reduce any potential disappointment I could have faced. I was impressed with the free flow of coffee, tea and hot water in the lobby that guests can help themselves to throughout the day. The breakfast spread was limited however, it was helpful to kick start the day with some food before exploring the city. The hotel also does provide boxes for guest to take out their breakfast, and I suppose it is because of the limited seats they have (that unfortunately cannot cater for the hotel's capacity). The rooms did not feel as small as I thought it might be. The cooking area felt a bit awkward and the size of the sink was quite small so food preparation was a bit tough and we ended up only cooking breakfast on certain days. Around the corner of the hotel was a 7-11 store and the hotel has its own "mini-mart" in the event you might want to get something from there. There are food places near by as well. The hotel was a short walk (about 5 min) to the subway (34st-penn station) or about 7 min walk to the Port Authority Bus Terminal. It was convenient as the subway lines (A, C, E) that pass the station that served the purpose of our travel destinations and only on occasions did we need to change lines. One thing about the area the hotel was located in - the streets in this area smelt more (i.e. of weed and cigarettes) as compared to some of the other areas of NYC. The subway station also had homeless people taking shelter. It took a while to get used to it and it helped that most times, the station had other commuters entering and exiting. My friend did not like the hotel as much because of the area that it was in. There was a front desk staff in the hotel that was observed to try and make the stay pleasant through their smiles and hospitality. As the title says - It was a place I started to be comfortable with even finding my favourite coffee place at the next street. There were many things that could have been better, however every hotel would have its limitations, and for this hotel, it's familiarity after the long stay, its convenience to the subway, and different parts of the city, the one staff that was friendly, the room that I could rest comfortably in, and the memories I built in my trip while staying there has left fond memories.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I had just landed from an early flight that to be honest was not the greatest experience. So needless to say I was already exhausted from my early start to the day (4:30am EST) and feeling a little under the weather from the flight.Upon my arrival I was immediately greeted by Janette and Idris who were both so friendly and welcoming. I figured it was a long shot to try and check into my room at 10:15am, a time where most guests haven't even checked out yet - but Idris made it happen!! He could see how tired I looked and just wanted to make sure that I was able to rest before enjoying my time in the city. My room was clean, bed is SO comfortable and the location of the hotel couldn't be better. Thank you Idris for making this the most memorable part of my trip to NYC. I'll be back for sure!!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I recently spent 3 days in NYC for a trade show and booked a room here as one of the hotels in the show's block. As a mid-tier property I have to say I was really pleasantly surprised at the quality and size of my room. As well, there was a kitchenette that I wasn't expecting, a small couch, and a desk to work at. Property was very clean, staff were very warm and welcoming and helpful. I would recommend this hotel. I stayed in room 602.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: This is the best stayed we had in the USA. The hotel is clean, cosy and the staff were friendly. Breakfast buffet offered limited varieties but the food was excellent. What we love are the complimentary drinks offers at 24hours a day. Once you stepped into the hotel, you can help yourself to hot chocolate, coffee or tea; very favourable especially when it is cold outside. In addition to this, you can bring your packed food and dine in the hotel waiting area. Location is about 7 mins walk to the nearest subway and 10 mins to Times Square and a lot of eateries around the hotel.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I really enjoyed my stay at Homewood Suites NYC Midtown Manhattan. The accommodations were great. I rested so well. My breakfast was wonderful. I was met with a friendly smile and excellent service from Jackson and Felix!!! Thank you for great service and hospitality.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Nice size room for New York city. Well done, inviting lobby and clean rooms. The staff was friendly and helpful. Excellent stay in a great location for the theater district and the garment district. Would not hesitate to stay there again

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: What can I say, we are so happy about our choice to book this hotel for our trip to New York. Furthermore I have to say that one man, Jackson Franco, from the morning service team earns a big big thank you for his attention, beeing and kindness. Every hotel should have more of this service staff. Thanks a lot to Jackson again!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We were having issues with the T.V. not turning on and called the front desk. Maybe 20 minutes later a small, latin man with a plaid shirt showed up and said he was the engineer of the hotel. He fixed the T.V pretty quickly so there was no issue there. The problem we had was with his attitude, he looked annoyed because he was called to our room and my wife swore he smelled like alcohol, which made her very uncomfortable. We didn’t raise a issue at the front desk upon checkout because we were running late and had to catch a flight, but I will probably not be returning due to the poor service that man provided. Very nice place otherwise.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Very pretty Hotel with super friendly personal.The rooms are big and very clean. You have a little kitchen including a fridge, microwave and a sink. There is also a dishwasher. The breakfast is very good. We had a stay for one week, and got every day different food in the morning. Free coffee and hot water are available the whole day.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Everyone I've interacted with here - Rochelle, Kayla, Isaiah, has made me feel welcome and at ease.Isaiah checked me in, and what's cool about Isaiah is that he is a "build you up" individual. You always expect to be treated kindly and professionally - but you don't always get to enjoy interacting with genuine class act human beings. And that's why I felt like I should review Homewood by Hilton in Midtown

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Went to the city to see a play and we decided to stay in the city after dinner - found availability at this hotel and man were we shocked - modern, clean, great staff room was great. Love the security of using the card for the elevator.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Audreen is great and very attentive and don’t let me forget breakfast with Jackson and crew.Rooms are always well kept and stocked with all kinds of utensils.I will not stay anywhere else when I’m NY.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Quick multi-generational girls trip to the city after New Years- and we always look for Homewood Suites. Fantastic breakfast, service was good and having a kitchen is a must when you are trying to save money, time and eat a plant based diet! Great Hot Water (always important), clean rooms and comfy beds.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I read tons of reviews and looked at least 30 different hotels before settling on this one. I am very happy with my decision. We got there a couple of hours before check in, but because I am a Hilton Honors member I was allowed to check in early for free. I even got to pick what floor I wanted out of the available rooms, which I thought was very nice. The room was spacious and very clean. Everything looked new, nothing was rundown or worn out. The furniture and bed were very comfortable. The view was of offices, but I wasn’t expecting a spectacular view, so it was ok. There is a loveseat, office chair for the desk, and ottoman. There is also a tray that unfolds so you can eat at the loveseat, or pull it over to the bed if you need to, which I appreciated. The ottoman was so nice to have to put your feet up after walking all day. The room was very quiet, we never heard any outside noise while we were there, which is unusual for a busy hotel. The shower had good water pressure, and water (I think we’ve all stayed in hotels where you feel like it takes forever to get shampoo out of your hair). The bathroom was a little small, but very nice. The breakfast had a lot of options, we really enjoyed it. There were eggs, potatoes, meat, and pancakes at the hot station. There was another station with toast and bagels. The third station was drinks, milk, cereal, fruit, yogurt and oatmeal. The staff was so friendly. There is one gentleman, I don’t know his name, that was so pleasant to everyone. I think he said he was from Florida, he was cleaning off the tables each morning we went down, his kindness to every guest stood out to me. Check out time is noon, which is basically unheard of in most hotels. We loved that because we had a later flight and were exhausted from walking. I would definitely stay here again. My friend that lives in Brooklyn was impressed with it as well. Friendly staff, good location, and comfortable amenities can’t be beat!!!!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Stayed here with daughter and adult granddaughter two weeks before Christmas. Hotel was constantly filled with people and a festive air. Our room was smaller than I liked but it had a mini kitchen and a large refrigerator. The breakfast was top notch with lots of offerings and very efficient staff. I would like to mention Jackson in particular. He was there at 6 am when I took myself down to breakfast and was friendly and personable as could be. Never failed to say good morning and chat for a minute. And he remembered my name. Nice touch. Hotel was convenient for our needs and we checked out several local restaurants. Check in and check out were efficient and Vince at the front desk was particularly helpful at checkout.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: The hotel was great; clean, friendly environment. Great location to easily access Central Park, Times Square, the High Line or Greenwhich Village. All within walking distance. The breakfast was good and saved some $$ to not have to eat out in the AM. Rooms were modern and clean amenities were in great shape, seemed to be recently updated.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We had a great stay at the Homewood Suites this past weekend. It was completely sold out and they did a magnificent job! We stayed in a large suite with two beds and a couch as we're a family of five. We checked our bags and went off exploring. Some complain that their rooms aren't ready earlier than check in but seriously, I'd rather check my bags and get a later check out time. All staff from kitchen help to management were amazing. I don't know how they do it with the crowds but they were the most friendly and efficient I've ever seen. I read a complaint about the breakfasts but seriously, what a well oiled machine they run at this hotel. I was there on sold out days and yes, maybe you had to wait for a few people to get your food but it wasn't anything to cry over. There were plenty of tables and again, maybe you had to wait a few minutes but we never did. There was one kitchen helper who directed you to where there was an empty table. Another complaint I read was there was no bacon or sausage. The breakfasts meat seems to change daily. We had sausages one day and corned beef hash another. Sorry but Ewwww.. to corn beefed hash but there were plenty of other alternatives to eat. Most surprising were the to go boxes provided and the trays to take your food up to your room. There were many guests packing up tons of fruit and pastries, which I found ridiculous. Even though the hoarders were taking large amounts of food, there was ALWAYS plenty available. They didn't run out. One lady checking out had several apples and bananas on the top of her bag! Most places put out a certain amount of fruit on a first come, first serve. Not the Homewood Suites! Very efficient, plenty of food and much faster than going to a local diner in the city. Well done Homewood Suites! Best place to stay if you're a family of five!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Great experience and not far to walk to Times Square and easy to get to Penn station. Plenty of restaurants to choose from that are close There is a Seven Eleven close for snacks to purchase for the room!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: This is a beautiful hotel and centralized to a lot of places. The staff was very friendly and helpful. The hotel was VERY clean. It is a plus having a refrigerator, sink and stove in the room. I will definitely stay here again.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Good location, convenient room. Had a view of an office building with people starring into room if blinds were up, not much privacy if it’s a weekday. Check in took a while, way too cramped in lobby. Not enough seating during breakfast. Can’t flag down a cab unless you walk towards 8th ave, not so great if it’s raining. Other than those inconveniences pretty decent hotel.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Perfect location for everywhere. Time’s Square is a 3 minute walk as is Madison Square Gardens and the Empire State. Subway close by for all the other tourist locations and really easy to navigate. The breakfast is simple but good. The staff really friendly and all the areas clean. We stayed in room 1001 which was good, not noisy from traffic, although no skyline view but the apartments opposite to look at which was okay. Can’t fault anything.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We came as a family of 5 - 2 adults and 3 children between 13 and 8. The room is not huge (which is expected in NYC) but was comfortable and always kept very clean. A kitchenette is incorporated into the room. There is a decent gym, business centre and laundromat in the basement which we did not use but would do so if back again.Breakfast was always plentiful and the staff were a credit to Hilton. Always smiling and helpful despite being under a lot of pressure especially in the busy periods.All the staff were exceptional - cant say a bad word about them. Really kind and always available and helpful with clear and honest advice.Location is excellent if you want to be near the main sites - Times Sq, Empire State Building and Macys all 5 mins walk away. Subway only 2 mins walk away.For us the location was a little too busy over the Christmas period. Thankfully the hotel provided some calm and quiet from the surrounding chaos.Tea/ Coffee and Hot Chocolate available in lobby 24 hours which was a nice touch and lovely to come back to exhausted after a day in NYC!Special thanks to Sophangi in reception who really looked after us -apologies if name wrong - I will correct if manager responds :-)

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We always take in a show in NYC around the holidays and are on the lookout for a place to stay that is reasonable yet comfortable for our family of four. Our stay at the Homewood Suites did not disappoint. We were provided an upgrade as a Hilton Honors member (I highly encourage joining) and had two king efficiencies instead of one double room. It made our stay even more comfortable. I love the wood floors (always a bit grossed out by carpeting in hotel rooms) and the beds were extremely comfortable. Overall very pleased!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: The hotel was great and breakfast was outstanding. Jackson was amazing and helped my family everyday we were there during breakfast. He would work quickly to find us a table for our party of 6 and would bring us whatever we needed. He definitely deserves a raise!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Overpriced for what you get. Morning breakfast was a zoo and there was not enough food or plates and utensils for everyone. Staff did not seem to care. The rooms are closets at best and do not accommodate more than two people. The dirty linen cart set outside our room the whole stay so that was always appreciated. There are better options for your money.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Spent 4 nights in this hotel just before Christmas 2019. I can recommend this hotel for families as it is in walking distance from all top N.Y. ”must see” places - and Hop-on-hop-off -routes. Breakfast was good ”European style”: something for everyone in the family. Room was quiet and cosy, yet a bit small for 3 persons. Would definatelly stay here again next time in the Big Apple!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: This hotel is very nice but the service is very poor as we were promised a floor above 20 and we got floor 16.so the next day we asked if we can be moved as we paid for it they said yes we will get you on floor 35. Later on we arrived at the hotel and found out that we were on floor 28. Finally when we left we looked at our bill and found that they had been trying to charge us $300 that we shouldn’t of been charged.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Can’t say enough about this great little gem of a hotel. When you combine the great location, the spotless rooms, great breakfast, fully equipped fitness center and above all, the friendly staff, you have the perfect place to stay when visiting NYC! You won’t find a better option or a better bang for your buck. I will be making this my home base whenever I’m in the Big Apple

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: The Homewood Suites at Hilton Midtown had everything and more I want from a hotel. Coffee & tea in the lobby at any time of day. I made use of the hotel’s shop during my first late night to buy soda & dinner. My room had a lovely full kitchen equipped with plates, pots, silverware, towels & paper towels. The thermostat worked well. Super comfortable king size bed, soft pillows & warm blankets. The loveseat opened to a comfortable foam bed for an overnight guest. And the Large screen TV swiveled to watch in any part of the room. The desk made writing postcards very easy. I also used the safe with no issues. The self-service laundry downstairs was very helpful as I travel light and washed my clothes. Each day the complimentary breakfast had different types of delicious eggs, bacon or sausage plus pancakes, bagels, English muffins, various fruit & juices, and water. And plenty of seating options. Mostly I sat near the large screen TVs to watch the morning news shows. During my December NYC stay in midtown I was in a perfect location. Besides going to several Broadway and off Broadway shows, I visited art museums & actually walked to most places. Also around the corner on 9th I found two good restaurants: Thai Select & Buena Vista. I am planning my stay at Homewood Suites Midtown again during August 2020!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We had such a great weekend ! This hotel is located in the heart of midtown close to everything. The suites are spacious, modern and well equipped. Full breakfast included daily and had tons of choices !The hotel manager ,JL , is an ambassador of hospitality and made sure we were comfortable throughout our stay. He was so friendly , helpful and professional ! Highly recommend!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Terrible experience Too expensive for what you get No where to seat for breakfast and cold breakfast Room too small no where to put a suitcase if you have one Not impressed at all Terrible experience Trop cher pour ce que vous recevez Pas assez de table pour le petit déjeuner Et en plus petit déjeuner froid Chambres trop petites si vous avez une valise Vraiment pas impressionné

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Traveled with my young son and older father. The staff was incredible and the hotel value was excellent. Would stay here again, no questions. The staff was very helpful with directions and locations to visit and eat. The hotel was very clean and in a safe area.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Great location to things, but the price to me was not worth it. The complimentary breakfast did not include bacon, and the pancakes were very hard. Hallways are narrow, but that is expected in New York. Staff was very nice and helpful.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: The rooms were comfortable and clean. Laminate flooring. Staff was helpful, eager and friendly. The breakfast was excellent and filling with healthy choices.Of particular note: Idris, the doorman.Jackson, the matre'd in the dining room.Ana, ValerytPedro, Felix, Lissett and Jason, the chefs.Couldn't be happier with the stay!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Great Hotel and Breakfast. Only two problems keeping it from five stars-Noise easily travels through their walls and the road is very congested so you’ll want to walk from the corner if you catch cabs.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I was impressed with the hotel and it's relative proximity to the Javitz Center where I was attending a conference. Only stayed one night. Parking was reasonable with a third party garage across the street.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Nice, clean hotel. Staff members are very friendly and helpful. Rooms are smaller, more like European hotel rooms. Beds are comfortable and rooms are well equipped. Plenty to select from at the breakfast buffet.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We took our 9 year old Granddaughter to NYC. I’m originally from NYC so I love visiting whenever I can. I did lots of research on hotels. I wanted a hotel not far from Times Square, wanted two queen size beds and coffee in room. And most of all breakfast. All of these amenities were a must for us. And we got all of this at Homewood Suites. Our room was large and it had a kitchenette which we really didn’t use. The breakfast I thought had great choices. Each day the hot food selection changed. Coffee was available all day in lobby. I would definitely stay here again. But when making a reservation be sure to say you do not want to be in a room that has a connecting room. We did and walls are thin and you can hear everything. Management offered to change our rooms which was nice of them but we were unpacked and only had a couple of nights to go. Also in the morning elevators are slow. We were on the 4th floor so we walked down the stairs to breakfast area. All in all the Homewood Suites was a good choice.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We stayed here for 6 nights. The location is great; near to many of the attractions like Times Square, broadway theatres, shopping and food. The staff are very friendly and helpful. Shoutout to Shivangi who helped me with my requests and made my stay feel at home. Thanks so much for your hospitality, Shivangi. Also to Jackson who works in the breakfast area for his good service, chatting up with us every morning he is on duty, and recommending places where we can go.The rooms are huge compared to the other NYC hotels and comes with a kitchenette. We had 3 big luggages and still had space to move and sit around with the luggages opened up.I will certainly stay here again if I come back to NYC. Thanks, Homewood Suites, Shivangi and Jackson again for making our stay in NYC so comforting!Photo : view from rooftop terrace level 22.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I was so impressed by this hotel in Midtown. The room was small but I was told by my son, who was staying the Wyndham New Yorker, said that it was spacious.I particularly appreciated the quiet. Our window faced a near by office building and you could see little else. But there was no street noise at all. We could hear the doors and door locks in the hallway but did not hear anything from neighboring rooms. My 35 year old daughter spent one night with us and said the sofa sleeper was fine. It is a loveseat size though, not for two people except perhaps small children.The breakfast area was busy but staff was friendly and helpful and the whole things well managed. Food was good and quite extensive. Front desk and the bag check staff were great. Housekeeping that I met were so polite. Would defiantly go back.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We loved our stay in the city. The hotel is in a wonderful location. If you don't mind the front staff being rude (Dontavious), then this is the hotel for you. They have okay rooms and the staff generally is wonderful, especially the people at the breakfast, until it turns 10:30 when you will be treated a little differently.Not sure if we would stay there again. We used Hilton points. So, it was convenient. However, there are other chains in the area that hopefully, will treat you better.Look elsewhere if you think your status with Hilton means anything.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Great hotel, VERY clean and courteous staff. I stay about 100 nights a year in Hilton properties and I’d rate this as one of their very best. The breakfast was excellent. I’d certainly recommend this hotel to friends and family.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Rooms were very clean and service was great. Jackson was very helpful and hospitable during breakfast! Loved the coffee and hot chocolate in the lobby. Front desk staff were very pleasant. Would definetly stay again at this hotel.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: This hotel was very nice and comfortable. It was also in a pretty quiet location. It’s convenient to a lot of attractions if you are familiar with the subway. If not, hop in an Uber or taxi. The staff were very helpful and welcoming. We would stay there again!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Just stayed in this lovely hotel from 5th - 9th Dec, so welcoming from the minute we stepped through the door to when we checked out .Staff are so friendly and helpful, nothing is too much trouble for them. The room we stayed in was really big with 2 big beds, kitchenette, fridge, safe in the wardrobe, lovely big shower room, TV. Breakfast was lovely, a good choice of juices, cereals, warm breakfast, lots of choice of bread, bagels etc plus spreads, jams etc. Fresh fruit. Free tea and coffee in reception whenever you want it. Maid service. Very near to Macys and Empire state building. I would definitely stay here again and I will definitely advise my friends, family and others to stay here. Big thank you to management and staff for great service and a wonderful stay x

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Excellent hotel. Well located. Super helpful staff. Breakfast included was amazing. Super quiet room. No noise at night. Comfy bed. Fluffy towels. Free toiletries. Can leave luggage securely in hotel if checking out late. Faultless

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: My family and I stayed here for the Thanksgiving holiday. It was conveniently located and the rooms were decent sized for NYC. It had a great rooftop that would be awesome in the summer. I especially want to thank Shivangi at the front desk for making our stay fantastic. Shivangi was quick to help out if we had any questions and overall just provided excellent customer service even though the hotel was extremely busy during this time. Thank you, Shivangi! I would stay here again.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We stayed 8 nights and enjoyed our stay. Rooms are super clean with good housekeeping . We look forward to each morning breakfast. Staff like Jackson, Ana, Pedro, Lissert, Felix and Valeryt were super friendly and helpful each morning keeping the tables clean and comfortable for us. The location is superb within walking distance to many restaurants, Time Square, Broadway theatres. We felt at home .

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Great find. 10 minutes max to Times Square, 5 minutes to Penn Station. Very nice staff, beautiful room. We were on 2nd floor and facing the street but hardly heard any noise from the street save an occasional siren. WiFi and AC excellent which are big plusses in our mind. Shower did take about ten minutes for the hot water to kick on each day but that is the only minor complaint. Once hot water started it was great. Would highly recommend.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: My biggest concern is that no one on the staff was prepared for a health emergency on the property. (They did call 911 but nothing beyond that) Our last morning, we went to breakfast in the very crowded lobby. Upon entering the breakfast area, there was a guest unconscious and struggling to breathe in the position he was in. Two Homewood suites employees stared at him while having a discussion with another guest. Very casual considering the circumstances. I mentioned that the gentleman needed to be positioned differently to open his airway. The staff told me I was not allowed to touch him. I was not going to stand by and do nothing or let this poor guy die with no one helping him. When I moved him to a flat surface I noticed he didn’t have a pulse. My husband then requested the portable defibrillator and they refused to give it to him because “the ambulance was on the way”. I’m just a mom, wife, daughter.....not a nurse or doctor but I knew something needed to be done THEN and we couldn’t wait for the ambulance. I started CPR at that point but feel that if the hotel had someone trained in first aid (or at least how to use the portable defibrillator) this situation would not have become so dire for this gentleman. I pray that the EMT was able to stabilize him. Definitely a traumatic experience for everyone in the lobby (which they never cleared people out of...even after EMS started working on the gentleman) To make a long story longer, my recommendation is that this location needs major management changes.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: This was our second visit to New York City and Homewood Suites. Once again excellent customer service and a wonderful stay.
