Some of the best qualities of this hotel are the proximity to so many of the top things to do in New York City, the rooftop patio/deck, the staff, and proximity to transit options. The hotel common areas are ideal for socializing, grabbing a coffee/tea and always clean. Our experience started with Shivangi checking us in. She was attentive and made sure we had everything we needed for a comfortable stay. We were pleasantly surprised at the attention to cleanliness Elia from housekeeping provided in our room each day of our stay. Thank you for doing such a great job.We enjoyed the breakfast buffet everyday and the choices varied everyday. The staff in the breakfast area work tirelessly replenishing food, clearing tables, filling the coffee station,etc. Kudos to Ana, Pedro, Lissett, Felix, Jackson, Jason, and Valerie. You made our mornings!Last but not least, our utmost thanks to Jonathon the assistant general manager. You go above and beyond to help hotel guests and your staff. Thank You so much for another great stay!We definitely recommend choosing Homewood Suites for a stay in New York City.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: This hotel is in the Garment District, but was a 10 minute walk from Times Square. It was a very good value for the price. The room had a full kitchen with dishwasher if one was inclined to cook. The complimentary breakfast each morning had a lot of options, including hot eggs/meat/potatoes/pancakes/waffles, muffins, oatmeal, toast, bagels, fruit, yogurt and juices. Everyone on the staff was friendly and worked very hard to make sure every guest's needs were met. There are 2 close subway stops. We'd stay here again whether for the parade or any other reason when we're in NYC.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I loved my stay greatly at this hotel. I've stayed at several HWS in CA but this was my first in NY. As a prior resident of NYC, I wanted to feel at home and comfortable where I was staying while visiting. I was there for business with a stacked schedule so being comfortable with convenient amenities like a full kitchen, a gym, laundry, etc- was very important to me. The staff was a highlight for me- They were so accommodating and genuinely paying attention to the comfort of my stay. Audreen and Janette at the front desk were so pleasant and made my stay so lovely. I could keep writing about why I loved my stay but I think you get the point- this place is wonderful and I will continue to stay here when visiting NYC.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: This is our first time visiting NYC. Glad we found this hotel. Location is just right for us, walk to Time Square, theatre district, Penn station, subway entrances, and grocery. It was far enough that we did not see lots of crowds loitering around. The free breakfast came in really handy every morning, though it is kind of crowded. They do have a take away box that you can box your breakfast in and eat in your room, if you wish. Many nights we bought take out and eat at the tables on the first floor to save money. The managment was nice and attentive. They even have services to help us call for car service at the end of our trip. That was really nice. Great place to use as base for a visit. We had two king efficiency rooms, just enough space for a family of 6.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Five of us stayed in 2 rooms over a 3 day weekend. We were allowed to check in early which was especially helpful as we arrived at 9:30 am. In order to check in early, I had to become a Hilton member while my friend did not. The rooms were clean although smallish (in part due to the kitchen set-up). The pullout futon was comfortable to sleep on. The complimentary breakfast was quite good with a combination of 4 hot items daily (eggs, meat, potatoes, and rotating pancakes, waffles, french toast), along with pasteries, cereals, and yogurts. I also received daily texts from the staff asking how my stay was going. We had requested a shower chair which went to my friend's room in error, but staff quickly rectified it and brought a chair to our room

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Everything worked well. I stayed hardly more than overnight so the service quality was really not tested but from what interaction I had with front desk and at breakfast, the value delivered was excellent.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: My stay was made especially pleasant and memorable due to the service and friendliness of Mgr JL and his staff; including Idris ,Nicolas, MikeZ, Jackson,Amalia,Valeryt,Felix, Ana , Pedro and Lissett. Many thanks to all!!! Florence Marjorie Nelson

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: My first time New York and how do you chose from the hundreds of hotels and motels. Do you rely on Trip Advisor, Travel Agency, Friends and Family or just stick a pin in the map and hope. First off, decide the location you want to be in, secondly decide upon your budget and thirdly, look at what other travellers are saying on this or similar sights. For me it was a mixture of all of these. The location was the primary, then the reviews. The layout of New York means that most attractions in Manhattan and Lower Central Park are easily walkable from this hotel, with time and good shoes you can easily stroll to Chelsea, and at a push Downtown. The hotel was clean and the staff inviting, The rooms are clean and airy, even a double, although smaller than other American hotels I had stayed in, but I guess that is New York. It has all you would need for a comfotable stay, my only criticism was the Fridge was quite noisy but after the third day I got used to it. We had a room at the back of the hotel, that was super quiet athough I did feel that I was intruding into other peoples' lives, but I guess that it city living. We had a bed and breakfast option, and the breakfasts, whilst simple set you up for the day and the 24 hour tea and coffee was most welcome. All in all a pleasant stay and I would certainly be back. The hotel also has the benefit of a roof terrace for night-time views.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We stayed at one of those with balcony. The good: good location, close to Hudson river runway, Madison Square Garden, midway between Central Park and downtown, breakfast included, good bed, clean, kitchen, courteous staff.The so so: fairly small room, breakfast, a bit noisy refrigerator, slow cook electric stove.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Check-in was annoying because they couldn’t find my name as a guest due to the fact the booking was made under the name of my client (though my full name had been provided along with another colleague). In the confusion, I was sent to my client’s already occupied room, catching him in his underwear! He had to go down to the front desk with me to sort things out... After traveling 10 hours, this botched check-in was the last thing I needed.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I have been spending a lot of time in New York (more than I'd like) and have settled on staying on the southern part of times square for the purposes of convenience. I have tried 6 hotels in the area of W. 36th Street to W. 38th Street and the Homewood Suites is definitely one of the best, if not the best hotel, in the area.The hotel is new, the rooms are spacious, and is an outstanding value for the area.The rooms are great. They are spacious by New York standards - there is a king size bed, a desk, a couch and a small kitchenette (microwave, 2 burner stove, refrigerator, dishes). I don't cook much on the road, but the kitchen allows me to reheat leftovers from a prior evening's dinner. The bathroom is also new, neat clean and relatively spacious. Unlike other nearby hotels, the closet is actually well designed. The floors have a nice hardwood look and the overall room appears new and modern.One big advantage to the Homewood Suites is the included breakfast buffet, unlike many of the other mid-market hotels in the immediate area. It's a solid buffet - typically consisting of cereals, breads, scrambled eggs, potatoes, yogurts, etc. The quality of the food is pretty good - they add a gourmet touch when they can (e.g., green onions sprinkled on the eggs).The hotel is convenient - there is an Orange Theory across the street, a dry cleaner practically next door and a 7-11, CVS and Duane Reed within a 5 minute walk. The hotel is useful for the business traveler, but offers an even better value proposition for small families with young children. Having a kitchenette and breakfast buffet will really help keep the family fed and going.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Staff was very courteous and professional. Rooms were very clean and quiet. Room had a small kitchenette which was a nice touch. Breakfast was very full in the morning.Overall was a pretty good stay. Not for from Times Square and PABT.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Spent the weekend at Homewood Suites hotel on W. 37th St. (between 8th 9th Avenues) NYC. We were so pleasantly surprised with everything about this property. Our top floor room was more spacious than we expected and very comfortable. It was also located next to a beautiful roof top deck with great views of the city. We really enjoyed a delicious breakfast the next morning which was included with the room. The breakfast area has plenty of seating. The front desk was kind enough to store our dinner leftovers in their fridge after we checked out. We will absolutely be returning!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I have stayed here a few times, and the hotel is always clean, large spacious rooms for NYC, great hot breakfast and good location. Close to Javits & Timesquare. Many restaurant options close by. Nice atmosphere at the hotel.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Great quality experience with an amazingly big room for nyc. The quality of the room was good with nice furnishings. The rooftop was a great perk and the breakfast was exactly what I needed before heading out the door for meetings
user_name:
kieskatherine
Washington DC, District of Columbia

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Best place for the position of the hotel for everything easy to reach anywhere in NYC . Train and buses on your doorstep . Times Square and Empire State Building you can walk in ten minutes restaurants of every variety only minutes away even the local 7/11 sells everything you need plus added bonus hotel has a little shop . Jackson one of the restaurant staff is so helpful and knowledgeable ask him anything and if he doesn't know the answer will find it for you if possible

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Hotel was only average in quality, not generally up to Hilton standards. The lobby was very small, and extremely crowded. IT doidn't feel comfortable or welcoming. Rooms were acceptable, but clearly not outstanding.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: This was a beautiful and affordable suite. The location was excellent. Free breakfast was a plus. We travel to nyc a couple times a year and would absolutely choose homewood suites again!! Staff was pleasant too!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: The staff was very polite and efficient. The room was clean and comfortable and I was very at ease there, as well as I felt very safe coming and going. I wish it had been a warmer time of year so I could have enjoyed the roof top terrace more.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I used to live in NY and I have stayed in lots of places in NYC before. I booked this hotel due to its proximity to Penn Station (an easy walk) and the High Line (also an easy walk.) I got a very good price on the hotel through the Hilton website too. I was very pleasantly surprised because even though the price was cheap I had a really great experience. Rooms are new, CLEAN, modern and quiet. My room had a full kitchenette and a sofa. Windows that open (yay) and ceiling fan. Free breakfast with coffee or hot chocolate to go as well! This hotel also has a very pleasant roof deck!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: This hotel is convenient to walking to Times Square. It allows for a peaceful night's sleep and the amenities are very nice. The rooftop offers a nice view. We really enjoyed the coffee/creamers and hot chocolate available in the lobby at any time. Staff was helpful and friendly. The room was spacious and very clean. We enjoyed this location and would definitely stay again.
user_name:
ANGfromFL
Fort Lauderdale, Florida, United States

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Friendly and helpful staff (Dontavius), clean room and close proximity to Times Square, Broadway, Empire State Building and Penn Station made our stay perfect! Also, nice variety of food served for the free breakfast! We will definitely stay here for any future visits.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Restaurant was delightful! Atmosphere, food and employees were amazing! Reservations a must on weekends. The Peking Duck was tender, moist and so delicious! And they slice it at your table! Will go again!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I come to NYC for work and I love staying here. The rooms are comfortable and I like having real plates and flatware at my disposal. At my last visit, I met Jackson, who works breakfast. I enjoyed my conversation with him. One morning I complimented the kitchen on the awesome bread pudding that was served. He had Felix, another nice young man, tell Lissett (the cook) about my complement. I do love that personal touch.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: This is my third time staying here in about 18 months. The location is great. It is close to everything. I can walk to MSG, walk or take a quick taxi to the theater district or hop on the subway to anywhere. The staff are so nice and helpful. Jackson, in the food service area, is now like an old friend. Always good to see his smile. Looking forward to staying here again very soon.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Excellent hotel with excellent location located just a few mins walk to the city center,extremely clean & comfortable, rooms are spotless (well done to the cleaners). Upon arrival we were warmly welcomed by the friendly reception staff (Special thanks to Jannette) ,Would definetely recommend this hotel to everybody! It's a true sample of excellent hospitality. The staff are friendly and helpful, the food was top quality and delicious, thanks to Ana (supervisor) and Jackson for going the extra mile for all the guests, the restaurant manager Jonathan was very friendly, helpful and Professional, he had no problem helping his staff when the area was busy (that's what I call a Manager) overall this is a first class hotel, keep up the good work folks

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: The hotel is very good placed, near Times Square and near the Subway, Bus Station, Supermarkets, restaurants... Although is near all it is very quiet. The service is very good, the people is very nice and helpfull. I will recomend it

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: This hotel was very clean, best customer service, now the breakfast was the truth, real homemade cooking. The rooftop was Beautiful, nice gym. My room had a full kitchen with appliances. Location is perfect.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: This is a great location and hotel. The staff was friendly and the hotel was modern and very clean. The complimentary breakfast was okay, but not great. We have stayed here previously and would stay again.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: The hotel was great. We couldn’t believe how different 8th, 9th, 10th Avenue are in NYC now. We moved out a few years back; what a transformation. The location was very convenient to the subway ( Times sq. & 34th st -herald sq. ) The rooms were well thought out and laid out nicely. Audreen at the concierge/front desk was very helpful & good restaurant recommendations. We will return when back in NYC.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Great location, easy walking distance to Times Square, twin queen bed room was excellent. If you are a light sleeper I would definitely recommend a higher floor due to street noise. We tried to change rooms but reception staff were not that helpful. Jackson was fantastic, cheery friendly face at breakfast. Bedroom was always cleaned to a very high standard. Overall a great stay.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Incredible midtown location. Close to Times Square, Empire State Building. Penn station. Great room, clean, well kept. Available stove, fridge, service utensils if you want to save money and cook in. Staff was always friendly and helpful. Great complimentary breakfast to stay your New York Adventure.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We were greeted by Idns at the front desk, who made check in fast and easy. He was very friendly and told us about breakfast and where every thing was in hotel. The hotel was very clean and bed was comfortable. Our room had a small kitchen which we did not need for just an overnight stay. I would stay here again when in New York city. It was near Madison Square Garden.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: The service provided by the manager Johnathan and supervisors Nicolas & Audreem (front desk) was highly professional.Other staff members deserving of recognition are:Pedro and Valerie as the serversMichael from the front Reception Desk staff.Our room and service was excellent and very spacious and convenient. The location was unbeaten and close to Times Square, Subways, and within walking distance of many Broadway Shows. We love the local restaurants and shopping areas.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We had a very nice stay for one week. Location is great in terms of activities , subway , and restaurants The hotel is comfortable and very clean. Our room was quite big with small kitchen inside which is super convenient . Generous breakfast. Rooms are quiet and the hotel is not noisy. Free WiFi that works well

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Great location, great hotel and great staff! We flew into Newark and took the NJ Transit train into Penn Station. It was super easy. Hotel has decent breakfast and rooms were very clean and spacious. Definitely recommend.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Excellent location <10 mins walk from Penn Station (if you get out on 8th Ave exit). Nice staff, free coffee/breakfast, and a pretty nice little rooftop of its very own that's not even well known. Decent space for Manhattan midtown standards. Fairly new on the inside.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: The staff at this hotel is incredible. As a business owner I would be proud to hire the front desk staff at any time! They were approachable, friendly, and accommodating. The hotel is in a great location to get to Times Square, Penn Station for the subway or grab a taxi. The hotel breakfast had fresh and flavorful options with variety each day. The tea and coffee in the lobby 24/7 is a great touch and much appreciated!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We recently got back from a wonderful weekend stay in New York at Homewood Suites. The location was great and the room was just right. We were celebrating our 30th Anniversary and the hotel made it special. A heart felt thank you to Jannette and Stephanie. Also we noticed that the manager (I did not get his name) at breakfast was terrific. He was friendly and worked enthusiastically to make sure everyone was happy. We will be back.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Great location, blocks from multiple locations of interest in NYC. Breakfast was nice, kitchenette in room was as more than enough and very handy. Proper small refrigerator with a freezer made the room excellent. Tons of space and one block away was a grocery store and a liquor store so it’s perfect. My 100% for sure destination next time.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Late night arrival last October 19, 2019. Welcome by this handsome fine gentleman name Nicholas, found out he’s the duty manager that night. He then give me a key to the 9th floor but I hesitated as I want a higher floor. Nicholas told me to check in with him the next day and he’ll make sure to block a higher floor for me. The next day, I able to be moved to 14th floor with a view of the street which is better than the first one. This was my very first time in New York and kinda worried about traveling alone and walking by myself but homewood suites staff reassured me not to worry and give me guidance every time I ask. Staying in this hotel was awesome... I love everybody there.. they treat you like family not just a hotel guest. Great buffet with boxes ready if you want take out. Miguel assisted me on my request the first night. Anderson is so awesome, give me a blanket even I did not ask for it. Shivangi is the sweetest always with a smile every time I approach her at the front desk. Great team of front desk staff Janet, Michael, Shivangi, Nicholas and Octavius , Keep up that great teamwork!!! Excellent and happy service crew at the buffet special mention to Jackson and Felix who’s always attending to every request I needed. Thanks for my snacks even I remind you guys sometimes. Hotels are expensive in New York but for me choosing Homewood Suites Manhattan was the great decision I made. I cannot wait to go back again to be with my second home sweet home family at the Homewood Suites Manhattan. I already missed you all...Keep that excellent service with a smile always... hope to see you all soon❤️

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Family trip to New York was brilliant. Even more so thanks to this gem of a hotel, it was absolutely perfect, very clean with big rooms, we had a king size efficiency suite for the 3 of us. Breakfasts where included and quality of the food was really great, buffet style with plenty of choice, a great way to start the day before hiking around town. The staff where incredibly helpful always going out of their way to ensure you had a special stay. A big shout out to Jackson very friendly and put a smile on our faces on the last day. I would definitely recommend the Homewood suites by Hilton to anyone heading to New York, great place, great rooms, great location, great food and drink and especially great staff.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I experienced the customer service first hand by talking with their assistant general manager. He was incredibly helpful, kind and courteous with us. We will definitely try and visit the property in the near future.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We really loved our stay at Homewood Suites for our first trip to NYC. We specifically chose this hotel based on other reviews on TA and the included breakfast.We arrived earlier than check-in time. The front desk employee told us he didn't have our reservation in his system. I had a mini panic attack! I thought he was joking but he was serious. We had booked through hotels.com and had confirmation. He then checked elsewhere and found our name. Whew! He said the words were smaller than normal or something like that. But moving on...They held our bags and said to come back at 4:00 to check in. We didn't really know what to do in the meantime as it was pouring rain outside but we made our way to a nearby restaurant. We were able to check in at 4:00 but were given a different room than originally planned but all turned out ok. We liked our room location and the layout of the room.Beds were very comfortable, room was clean, good shower pressure & temperature, great room lighting.We really enjoyed the breakfast each morning. The employees worked hard making sure the buffet was fully stocked and tables cleared. Props to them! Each day had different hot food items on rotation which was nice. They also offer free coffee/teas 24/7.Location of the hotel turned out to be convenient for us. It was close to Penn station, Times Square, the High Line, & Empire State Building just to name a few. Our entire time there we either walked or took the Subway to get around. Overall if we ever make it to NYC again we will choose this hotel!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: The Homewood Suites feels a bit out of place in midtown, but for all good reasons: my room wasn't tiny, it had both a desk chair and a separate chair with ottoman, it had a refrigerator + microwave + 2-burner stove + sink, the rate included a generous breakfast, and they serve free coffee 24/7.I especially appreciated the reasonably quiet, accurate AC unit, the overhead fan, the functional shower door (finally a NY hotel without a leaky shower!), and the hardwood floors. I was there for an especially rainy stretch and it was easy to get dry and deal with raincoat and umbrella without making a mess in the room. The windows were effective and blocking out street noise although it's NYC so some sound gets through.The staff at the breakfast in the morning were especially friendly and helpful and the breakfast was generally good with many cold and hot options although I wouldn't describe it as fancy.My only real negatives on this stay were an unusually long wait to get a key in the evening when I arrived (only one desk staff and a very confused foreign guest with many questions in front of me) and somewhat dim bulbs in the various lamps in the room. 37th Street is not the greatest as it's dark and perpetually covered by scaffolding on adjacent buildings, but I never felt specifically at risk. About two blocks West from the hotel is a large grocery store, Brooklyn Fare, and a few blocks away in several directions are various subway stops as well as a short walk to either the Port Authority Bus terminal or Penn Station for longer-distance travel. A little over one block to the East is 7th Ave which is lined with decent casual restaurants and a few blocks south closer to 6th Ave is Herald Square with the famous Macy's store and a collection of other shops and restaurants.I ended up here as my usual stop closer to my office was fully booked, but I'll be returning often in the weeks and months ahead as I really found this Homewood Suites comfortable and convenient.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I called the morning of my booking to see if early check in was available. Not only was it not available, I was told I didn't even have a reservation. I spoke to the manager on duty (Dontavius) and gave him my confirmation number from booking direct from Homewood Suites. He offered no solution and told me to call back in 30 minutes to talk to another associate. When I called back the other associate told me they were having system issues and they couldn't pull up my reservation.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Homewood Suites on 37th is fast becoming our go to hotel in NYC. The rooms are incredibly clean, efficient and so comfortable. The in room amenities including a ceiling fan make it so comfortable. The staff are friendly, knowledgeable and efficient. The breakfast that was included was quite good. Overall each visit we’ve had to this hotel has been fantastic. I would highly recommend it to family and friends.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We only had a short break so wanted to be fairly central. This is ideal location and close to Times Square area. Breakfast was included so it meant we could get out and away without the fuss. There are quite a few bars close by offering lots of choice

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We had a great stay at Homewood, clean and friendly atmosphere. Able to park across the street which was seamless. Nice to have internet and breakfast! One drawback was waiting a while for elevators but...that happens. Staff was wonderful, rooms clean, and fairly roomy, great sleep! Thank you!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Location is excellent in the Garment District. Breakfast was also very good with good choices. In the one bedroom suite which was very large by New York standards. Newer hotel was very clean. Very busy hotel for groups. Don't expect an early check in. Overall a good hotel in a convenient locale.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I arrived on a Thursday just before the Canadian Thanksgiving long weekend. I was greeted at the front desk by Shivangi and Audreen. Realizing I had been on the MTA for over an hour coming from the airport, Shivangi offered me water.I made my way up to my room. It was very well maintained - clean and spotless. Shivangi had sent for a "gift" which was waiting in my room when I got there. It was delicious cupcakes and strawberries! Throughout our entire stay, the front desk staff were amazing. Anytime I needed anything, they would send someone up right away. The breakfast buffet is delicious. Its not just a continental breakfast but an entire buffet breakfast of eggs, french toast, pancakes, sausages, fresh fruits, and various pastries. There is 24 hour tea/coffee available in the lobby - an another amazing feature of this hotel.My only complaint would be during the busy breakfast time, the elevator is slow. This wasn't a big issue as we are only at the hotel in the morning.Overall, this is a great hotel at a great location. Very close to subway lines and easy to get to points of attraction in Manhattan!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Check in: 15th SeptemberCheck out : 21st SeptemberPRO:Good location.Wide variety of breakfast.All the staff member friendly and made you feel welcome.Coffee available for 24 hours.They give you direction and tips what to do around new York.Rooms are quite big (for the New York area) with small kitchenette and sofa bed.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We loved our stay at the Homewood Suites. Excellent facilities, good sized rooms,great complimentary breakfast and excellent service.In particular Jackson and Felix in the restaurant were excellent, so attentive and helpful! Highly recommended!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: 5 short blocks to the heart of Times Square - and 4 blocks from Macy's. Surrounded by great restaurants. Security at this property is great - and the rooms are large for NYC. Very clean - beds were great with very nice linens. No View - but that wasn't important to us.
user_name:
Nancy M
Myrtle Beach, SC, United States

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: On two mornings in a row we observed an employee in the crowded breakfast area doing everything in his power to make guests happy. He was going from table to table checking with guests making sure all was good. We were very impressed with this attentive personal service. We approached him to get his name so we could mention him to hotel management. Turns out he was Jonathan Lomitola, the Assst General Manager. Nice work Jonathan.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: When I arrived I needed to go right to work. No taxis and my uber app wasn't working Michael V, Bellman on duty, used his app to book me a car and waited with me until it arrived. Went above and beyond!Rooms were comfortable and clean. Only downside is I always prefer a hotel with bar and restaurant in case of inclement weather (I knew going in that all homewood suites don't have this)

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We found this to be a very convenient location, close to two subway stops, and very walkable to several sites in the area.One of the reasons we chose this property was the rating and many mentions of great service. We agree with that as we have found the service here to be very friendly.We were upgraded to a city view room on the 21st floor and found the room to be very comfortable. It was small compared to other Homewood Suites we have stayed in, but large by New York City newer hotel standards. It was also very quiet for a city hotel. We only heard an occasional siren...sounded like it was faintly in the distance.Considering we are in the midst of the city, breakfast is very busy. We usually went down toward the end of breakfast and found there was still a good selection of items available. It is a fairly basic breakfast with several cold and a few hot items.The property also includes a nice rooftop patio with seating areas, good workout facility, nice business center, and a guest laundry facility.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Spent here the Columbus day weekend.Amazing location it is , but the most significant issue is the exceptional level of service . Every issue was addressed immediately in polite, quick snd efficient way. Always with a smile .We’ve been in NY for so many times , can’t recall such pleasant stay! Great job guys!!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Love the kitchenette. Perfect if you will be here for several days and want to save a little money on eating out. The room was very clean and staff was very friendly. The breakfast was the only thing I wasn’t crazy about but it is no worse than other free continental breakfasts.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Was extremely satisfied with our stay. This hotel has the perfect location of mid-Manhattan. The staff was excellent in providing accommodations for us, and were very helpful with all of our needs. The breakfast buffet had excellent choices and was tasty. Room was great and hotel is very clean! Smells nice! Hot coffee machines around the clock, hot water and hot chocolate packs, teas, etc. Complementary internet in lobby and rooms. Can't beat the price for the quality of service received.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: The price was fair and I thought everything that came with it was of value. The location is very convenient as well and is in the heart of NYC. The service was also excellent. I recommend staying here.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: The hotel was wonderful. All staff members were friendly, kind, helpful and professional. Our questions about the area were answered promptly and appropriately. Location is close to Broadway and Times Square. We arrived early and were able to store our luggage while we went to lunch before returning to the hotel and getting into our room a little early. Check out time is noon which was ideal. We would definitely stay here again.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Homewood Suites has lived up to all the positive reviews! We stayed at this property at the beginning of our trip and at the end (total of 10 nights). Facilities - Whilst not a 5 star hotel, it has everything that you could want in a hotel in the middle of NYC. Well appointed rooms, Laundry facilities, Comfortable small lounge area, Breakfast, Ice Machine, Free Coffee/tea/hot chocolate. It was a super busy hotel when we were there but it didn't really affect our use of these facilities. The 3 elevators worked hard but no longer than 1-2 minute wait. Only suggestion I can make, is for the size of the hotel, they might need 1-2 more washer/dryer machines in their laundry room - This to account for people who don't keep an eye on washing/drying times.Room - We had a room with 2 queen beds and a kitchen. Beds and pillows were comfortable. Room was spacious and (personal choice) I liked that it didn't have carpet on the floors. Kitchen has a full sized fridge, hot plates, dishwasher, microwave, sink and the essential utensils. Whilst we didn't fully utilise the kitchen, it was so convenient to have it there. Rooms were clean, bright and airy. We found it reasonably quiet given its location, only street noise we heard were the fire engine or police car sirens. Good air-conditioning - not too noisy. Only minor issue we had with our second room (1905) was that the refrigerator was noisy and the smoke alarm would light up intermittently. This room is also right in front of the elevator which can be noisy depending on the guests.Location - Loved the location and one of the best things about this property. Located in the Garment District, it was central to everything and minutes away from Time Square, Penn station, other subway stations, Hell's Kitchen, Hudson Yards etc. Streets felt safe even later in the evening. Staff - Front desk/Concierge were generally friendly. Stand out staff for us, was Jackson who worked the breakfast shift. Super friendly and helpful. He really made an effort with the guests (not just us) and made us all feel welcome. JL (duty manager) was also fantastic. We watched him interacting with the guests and helping where he could. Both are a credit to the Hilton brand.Only issue we had was with house keeping who regularly gave us 2-3 bath towels instead of the 4 we needed. This happened irrespective of whether we left a tip or not for house keeping. Breakfast - During the time we stayed there, we found that there was enough variety to satisfy both hot and cold options. The food choice isn't extensive but given it was free (or part of our booking), we couldn't complain. Breakfast gets busy from about 8.30 am onwards. You need to be an early bird to avoid the crowd.Would I stay here again? Definitely! We really could not fault our stay.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Asked for a quiet room and enjoyed the quietest room I’ve ever had in NYC. HVAC worked well. Plenty of outlets. WIFI was consistently good. Nice staff. Nice suite with amenities.Location convenient to theater and subway.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: The hotel is clean, comfortable and modern - and is a few minute walk to Javits, which is great for exhibitors or attendees of events there. My team has stayed here for a few years in a row. We love it and we will be back. But there is just ONE downside - the breakfast selection and quality is not on par with other Homewood Suites, or even close to sister brand Hampton Inn. Please increase your pastry variety (donuts?) and add the fresh waffle makers at a minimum. When staying here for days in a row, the breakfast gets tiresome. Thank you!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: This is a good value hotel in the middle of Manhattan, with easy walking access to subways and Penn station. Security is well done, with key access to floors necessary in the elevators. We found the bed somewhat soft, but not uncomfortable. Air conditioning quiet and powerful. Large TV with multiple channels, but almost exclusively in English. Excellent elevators, which is necessary given the number of floors (22). Although this was the smallest Homewood suite we've ever been in, room size (we had the King efficiency with sofa) was reasonable for NYC. Unusual for Homewood, lighting for reading was marginal. As well, the room could have used some light maintenance - squeaky hinges on bathroom door and dresser. The breakfast area is somewhat undersized, but the hotel makes up for this by having several friendly folks cleaning tables, and when the weather cooperates, there's a pleasant outside area for breakfast. For a quiet room, request an even numbered room. This will have you facing apartments, so not much of a view, but you'll escape any street noise. All in all, we'd recommend this place for a first stay in New York.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Great service, great rooms, great breakfast! Very friendly staff that are accommodating. The rooms are perfect. Modern rooms, up to date dishwasher, flooring is modern, spacious, and many breakfast options like beef fajitas, hash browns, biscuits, chicken sausage with to go containers.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: From emailing Nicolas at the hotel prior to our arrival, to texting with Jonathan during our stay for a special request, everything was exemplary!! John at front desk as we arrived at 6am and Santos from maintenance, were very welcoming and friendly each time we saw them. Our housekeeper was so polite and took care of our room needs with no hesitation. The breakfast staff were courteous and food always warm no matter what time of the morning we came in. Overall, Homewood Suites Midtown shows true hospitality!!Thank you all, we look forward visiting again and again.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Close to Penn Station & Times Square a really convenient but pricy stay in NYC. Breakfast pretty normal but lacked healthy options. Room was comfortable & quiet. NYC is a great city to visit - so much to do and see.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Spent 8 nights at the hotel. The room was clean and the bathroom really good, like when there is a shower instead of bathtub. The room is a bit small but works good for two persons. Good free breakfast that was open untill 10.30 everyday. A good gym. Very friendly staff. We vill come back.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Great location, especially if you’re a first time visitor to NYC or even a frequent visitor. Stayed in a double queen room and it was much larger than other hotels I’ve stayed at NYC. There was also a sofa bed and a kitchenette which gave the room its spaciousness. Breakfast was average but convenient. Elevators not crowded. Overall, I definitely recommend, especially for families.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: The staff really impressed me. They were warm, friendly and attentive. I would recommend this hotel for it's cleanliness and great location. The rooms are NYC small, but comfortable. I would probably stay there again.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: The location is perfect. The room was amazing. The Premium King Studio was so efficient and perfectly designed. I truly enjoyed my stay. The Rooftop Terrace was amazing. I ate dinner up there. I had a great night's sleep.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: This hotel is in a great, central location. The staff ensures timely check in, and goes above an beyond to make sure you can have the most unique and special experience. They will give you rewards or celebrate you in any way you can if you have a birthday, anniversary, etc. I will for sure be going back, and have never had a better experience at a Hilton property in New York.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Lovely newer (4 year old) property with very friendly staff. For NYC rooms are large and comfortable. Great selection of food for breakfast. Nice outdoor patio on first floor rear. Even better outdoor patio on rooftop with view of the Hudson. Overall an excellent experience.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: The Hispanic male that checked me in at approximately 5am was very disrespectful, rude and nasty. He had me wait for someone to bring me 12.64 in cash to check in because I was over the limit for my credit card. Even though I'm a Hilton Honors Rewards Gold Member.
user_name:
tyrelljbrown
New York City, New York

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I am a space person and I have stayed in a ton of hotels in New York. Expensive and moderately priced. The issue is always SPACE. I love this hotel due to it's easy location and most importantly size of the suite. I also love that it does not have carpeting the floors. That always grosses me out. The roof top is a nice added touch.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Just had an overnight stay at this beautiful hotel. Great location. Everything is clean. Front desk staff attentive. In fact, all the staff we encountered were top notch. Loved the 22nd floor outdoor terrace. Now for the ugly. We are a family of 5. We need to stay in hotels that can accommodate us. We don’t mind paying a bit more for this reason. As long as there is a shower and a TV to watch at bedtime we are set. Well. The shower didn’t drain after each use. It took a full half hour to drain between showers. Since we didn’t notice this until the morning we were leaving we had no choice but to deal with it. To say it was disgusting is an understatement. Second, the tv didn’t work. We didn’t notice this until we returned very late in the evening. So the two things we look for we didn’t get. The front desk felt 5000 points would make up for this. It doesn’t. I used 16000 points plus paid well over $300 for one night. So the room was roughly $450 for the night. Average for NYC, yes...but we didn’t receive the anticipated creature comforts. Very disappointed.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Great accommodations, prime location and exceptional staff. The facility is very nice and very clean. However, staff here is what separates them from the pack. I would definitely come back. I highly recommend this facility.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I have stayed all over the United states and stayed in all brands wirhin Hilton but this property was excellent and they have the most friendly front desk staff as well as one of the best managers Jonathan I have ever dealt with. Highly recommend

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Homewood Suites checked every box. We wanted two queen size beds, abundant guest room square footage, hot breakfast buffet, and location. In our room we found two comfortable queen beds, lots of space and seating, and a modern bathroom. The desk and furniture closet helped with storage for 3 ladies. We liked the hardwood floor for cleanliness. The breakfast buffet offered different egg, meat choices, and pastries daily, but we found oatmeal, fresh fruit, yogurt, toaster breads, hard boiled eggs every morning. The dining room was busy with many guests but we were always able to sit together and enjoy a nice morning meal. The buffet was a real money saver. The hotel staff was a 5 star team. We were saved three times by the front desk staff as they recovered items left behind at breakfast. All interactions with staff were friendly and professional. The Homewood Suites in Manhattan met our every expectation. We highly recommend this hotel!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Me and my family stayed at this hotel for 1 week,and never regret. Its sentral, near Times Square, Rockefeller, Empire state Building, Highline, Vessel, shopping, and everything you need for a vacation in the city. The staff is so friendly, allways with a smile and good service. The room was big, quiet(could not hear the noice from the street), and the bed was comfortable. One note: the shower was not in good shape in our room. The rooftop is stunning and relaxing and the workoutroom as well. I can reccomend this hotel!!
user_name:
tonehaugenoyen
New York City, New York

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Good location, 10 min walk to times square, but far enough away to where it was quiet at night when sleeping. Was super clean, didn't see a speck of dust. The free breakfast in the morning was excellent, better than most diners! It was also a nice touch that the workers came by to clear our plates. The only slight issue I had was reconnecting to the wifi a second time, couldn't get the hhonors wifi to work, had to use the att one.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: My family had a wonder stay at the Homewood Suites in Times Square!!!!!! The location was perfect!!! The staff was SUPERIOR, they were very helpful and attentive. We stayed in a King studio efficiency. It was very clean and comfortable with plenty of room. Our room was on the 22nd floor and the view from the rooftop deck was great. We will definitely choose make this our HOME AWAY FROM HOME for our next visit to NYC!!!!!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Great location. Close to stations and theatre.Very helpful and friendly staff. Breakfast was great. Coffee available in the lobby. We try to stay at Homewood suites because of amenities and kind staff.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Had a great stay. Clean lobby, room and eating area. Complimentary wifi and full breakfast with lots of options. Helpful staff and centrally located enough to walk around to alot of the main attractions. Would definately recommend it and would stay there again. Able to leave luggage there early on arrival and late day of departure with access to airport transport. Everything we needed!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We had a wonderful experience at the Homewood suites, started as soon as we arrived. We were there early so our room wasn’t quite ready. They stored our luggage for us and we headed out to explore the city. Later that afternoon we had a text our room was ready. When we arrived back we were given a room on the 17th floor. Lovely! Nicole, at the front desk had even left us a lovely anniversary note and some treats to enjoy! Nice touch! It’s the little things that make a difference! The room was wonderful, spacious, clean and quiet. The city is noisy so I recommend higher rooms! It was nice to have the kitchenette, to store some snacks, heat up food, and just have available if you want to make some toast or whatever. We had a fantastic stay. We did a lot of walking around the city, but we like to walk. The location for us was perfect! It was a bit pricey especially when we have to add in the Canadian exchange. Maybe have a special for your Canadian customers would be nice! I would highly recommend the Homewood Suites!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Before our arrival I called ahead and Nicole ensured our 2 rooms from 2 separate bookings were near to each other. Great location for us as tourists from the UK. Immaculate, friendly and helpful staff. Free breakfast is a great bonus as are the in room kitchens.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: This is a nice hotel near Time Square. Staff was super helpful, assisted us with any requests we had and the free breakfast was good. The only issue was the toilet wasn’t clean when we checked in, but the staff took care of it ASAP. That’s the only reason I gave them 4 stars in cleanliness. Otherwise I would have given them 5 across the board, would stay here again, with no problem.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Stayed here overnight after seeing a show and dinner. We had a room with a terrace (highly recommend) The room was spacious, updated and had a nice kitchen. Staff is friendly. Free Breakfast was great.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: The location was awesome- close but away from times square. Quiet area.Lobby and front desk always welcoming.The room (queens and kitchenette suite with sofa) was clean, comfortable and plenty of space for 2 teens, 2 adults and child. Breakfast was great ! Staff kept area clean and stocked. Food options were plentiful. Also enough to pack on the go.Loved it here during our 1 week stay.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Super friendly staff and great location. Breakfast food was not very good, bathroom sink tiny, no place to set open luggage, and thermostat hard to regulate. Bed was comfortable and room fairly clean. Needs some updating and TLC. You get what you pay for

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Very nice hotel in a great area. Staff at check-in are awesome. Breakfast was ok but not heated enough so some items were cold. But lots to choose from. There is a nice rooftop terrace. Safe location within easy walk to Times Square & Shows.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: As a family we had two different rooms in this hotel. A regular king bed room on the 20th floor and a suite on the 2nd floor. The suite was handicapped accessible. It had a large bathroom with three distinct areas. The suite also featured a small kitchen with table and a seating area with a sofa. We gathered there for family meals (take out from nearby restaurants) and there was adequate space for 5 of us. The regular room had a small bathroom with a walk-in shower. One wall of the room had a kitchenette. The beds were large and comfortable. Overall we were very pleased with this hotel. The location was great. The staff was great. Very friendly and eager to serve. The breakfast buffet was typical for this style hotel

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Everything was clean and great customer service Location is great. Helped us with early check inWe will come back the next time we’re in the city. We loved the full kitchen in our room as well as the lobby and coffee 24/7

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Great hotel. Comfortable beds. Excellent location. Fast elevators. Nice view. Bad breakfast experience. Hotel does not serve pork products and eggs were way over cooked. Fajitas were good but that's about it. A good breakfast is very important to travelers. This breakfast was not good.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I usually do not write reviews, but I was blown away by my experience! The rooms were very cozy and the hotel is in an amazing location. The best part was the complimentary hot buffet in the morning. Amazing selection at the buffet, but the service was incredible. Jason went out of his way to ensure my experience was good and did his job very professionally with a great attitude. I will be sure to come back in the future thank you to Homewood Suites and most specifically, Jason. Thank you

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Jose waited on us at the Herb N Kitchen. He was professional and courteous. We ordered a few pizzas and didn’t hear the number when it was called. Jose came and found us and personally brought the pizzas over to us.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We stayed for a family vacation in August. We had a nice clean room with a kitchenette. The terrasse on the 21rst floor gave us a great view of the city. It was also good to have a breakfast buffet included. Food was good and the staff was very nice. We would choose this hotel again.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Very nice place to stay for a family getaway. Great location, between Time Square and Pen Station. Rooms are clean and comfortable. Very good breakfast. Parking is located across the street a few meters from the hotel.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I enjoyed a mini vacation in New York City and stayed at the Homewood Suites. The hotel staff was phenomenal, the room was clean and comfortable, and the location was ideal to get to major attractions!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Although we are in NYC often, this was the first time we stayed overnight, and we couldn't have picked a better hotel. The location was perfect! Just a few blocks from Times Square and the theaters, not a far walk from Rockefeller Center, Grand Central Station, the High Line or the Empire StateBuilding, and most importantly Penn Station (just 4 short blocks).They held our luggage while we were out for the day, and it was easy for us to walk back to the hotel to pick up our bags and then head to Penn Station to take our train home. No need to Uber, taxi or take a subway.Our room was a king studio suite and it was the perfect size for us Both the bedroom and bathroom were the perfect size, spacious by NYC standards. It was just a bit smaller than a comparable room outside the city. It was by no means cramped. It was clean and modern.Most importantly, it was quiet. We were on the 11th floor and were not facing the street. We never heard a sound, and I'm extremely sensitive to sound.The breakfast was delicious and there was a nice variety and well-stocked. And it was available until 10:30. If we ever stay in the city again, we will stay at this property..

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: If you like the hustle and bustle of midtown, this is a great location. Staff was excellent, only drawback is we were on the 2nd floor and the open format to the lobby let the noise from the breakfast area up to our room.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Was shocked to find an affordable price for a midtown hotel, not more than a couple blocks from Times Square. Homewood Suites New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square is actually at West 37th and 8th Avenue. We had two suites, a bit on the small side, but this is New York, and I get that real estate is at a premium. The rooms were comfortable and had small kitchenettes which we did not use. Beds were comfortable, the rooms were quiet and dark enough for sleep. There was free wifi, good TV channels, nice bathrooms, and breakfast was included. Though we had to leave before 6AM, when breakfast serving begins, we were given permission to access the serving area and take some food to go. All in all, the service was excellent, and the location and hotel amenities served us very well. For less than $200, this was a fine deal.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I had a lovely stay with my family at Homewood Suites by Hilton in Manhattan New York. The room was cleaned regularly and the kitchen staff during breakfast were exceptional going out of their way to provide service. Jackson and Jason were always helpful. Jackson especially always had a broad welcoming smile and cherful outlook. Jason was also quite perceptive sensing when a guest was in need and always coming to ask to help. I will gladly stay there again.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We had a great stay and enjoyed the hotels amenities. Breakfast was great with a lot of options and coffee ready to go every morning. Lobby was clean, rooms were small but clean and efficient. I loved the outdoor areas - it made for a nice place to have coffee or a glass of wine.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We love staying at the Homewood Suites New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South any time we come to NYC! The staff is always very friendly and the queen size rooms are always a great size for us to stay in for a week. Much larger than many of the other NYC hotels! I would highly recommend this hotel!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Stayed recently at this property. Location convenient as only a few blocks from Penn Station, but also not too far of a walk from the heart of Times Square. Hotel clean, rooms were comfy. Tad small room for a Homewood Suites, but this is typical of most Manhattan hotels. Only wife and I so for two room ok, but if with family, room would be too small for more than that. Good price for the location in Manhattan

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Good value for cost and convenient location. Clean, comfortable, modern suites in chain hotel. Nothing fancy but more amenities than average NYC accommodations. Easy check-in/check-out. Good service and pleasant staff.
user_name:
xist2xist
New York City, New York

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: This is a great location for those coming in by Amtrak. Very quick walk from Penn station. Friendly and helpful front desk staff despite it always being a busy lobby. Yes you might have to wait for an elevator but that’s to be expected in a 22 story building. I didn’t mind. Rooms are very clean and efficiently laid out for the space. I used the fitness center and that was also clean and well organized. I would stay here again no hesitation.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: The hotel is excellent and staff is extremely cordial and helpful. Nothing but kind words for everyone. The entire experience was fantastic! Thanks for what you did to make our stay comfortable. The location was very convenient for the Broadway camp and i woul recommend it for everyone.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Great hotel with comfy bed, hot shower, clean rooms, good breakfast, and great staff. Good location and close to Times Square, Empire State Building, and Penn Station. It’s in the heart of the Garment District.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: The location is perfect, easy to offload and onload your luggage. The staff was amazing, parking was great, and the breakfast and coffee was great. The rooms are spacious, and the rooftop has an amazing view of the harbor and the city.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We are still here...but I couldn't wait to review this property! The cleanliness, location, and reasonable price are at the top of my list for a great review! But my enthusiasm is for the service at this hotel. We have stayed at many hotels over the years all over the world, and this facility ranks top of my list for the employees that work here. From the front desk clerks, to the breakfast staff, to the manager, they are all willing to help you with everything from directions to special food needs. Smiles on faces makes 100 degree weather tolerable. A wonderful breakfast includes fruit, bread and pastry selection, and a number of hot food selections. Coffee is kept fresh in the lobby and there is a small necessity store there, too. You won't be disappointed if you choose this hotel!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: This is a great location and have huge rooms. I love staying here when traveling for work as it feels a little more like home. Good breakfast in the morning and love the fact they have 4 elevators to move people quickly. Great location to Times Square. It’s close enough but far enough away to miss the crowds.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Love homewoods for travel and this place didn’t disappoint. It is in a good spot close to Times Square but far enough away that you can escape. A decent walk to Central Park but doable. Close to the Hudson which is an easy walk. Close to the ACE and BDMF subway linesLook for the rooms that have a small balcony. Well worth the extra few bucks.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: This is a great hotel in a convenient location, with helpful and friendly staff from the check-in team to house keeping and the kitchen staff. Rooms are clean. The food is great. It was nice to be able to do laundry mid-week. And the gym facility was great. Will choose this hotel every time !

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: A great deal in Midtown! LARGE room with kitchen and sofa in addition to 2 queen beds. The rooftop lounge was a nice surprise and a great spot to relax after long days of sightseeing. The location was ideal and the breakfast made it an even better bargain. Will definitely return.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Great hotel with central location and convenient breakfast. Very clean and helpful staff. Rooms were very clean and modern. Good value for NY. Enjoyed the roof top patio and free coffee. Kitchen in the room was also a plus.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Great location to most major sights. Staff was very welcoming. The only issue I had was I showed up at 1:00 to check in knowing check in was at 4 I expected to wait for a bit. It was after 7 pm before I was able to actually check in and get to our room. They were of course apologetic but not usual for a Hilton property. Room was great. Parking not so much. I used the lot across the street. I was charged $82.00 for 1 day and 2 hours. When reading the parking for Hilton I was under the impression it was $45 per day not the case. I was trying to get clarification from the guy checking me out but he was too busy playing in his phone while he was waiting on me that he couldn’t answer as to why my bill was so high. Hilton May want to check into this as they are recommending their customers park here.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: My husband and I along with my mom and niece stayed here during a family trip to NYC in July of 2019. The staff were amazing always willing to help and offer advice on where to go and what to see. The hotel is great for anyone traveling with a disability with roomy and well equipped handicap rooms. The daily breakfast is one of the better ones I’ve had while traveling, with options for everyone especially picky eaters and kids. Seating was the only problem we experienced as we tended to get down around 9am. If you come earlier in the morning it’s easy to find a seat. The rooms are equipped with a small kitchen, utensils, plates, full size fridge, dish liquid, and sponges. It’s great for saving money while in the city making lunch or dinner. The hotel is close to Penn Station and is easily walkable. There are some great cheap eats close by like 2 Bros pizza and Grays Papaya.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: This hotel far exceeded our expectations. We were welcomed warmly at the front desk with big smiles. Everyone wanted to help us out and ensure we had a pleasant experience. The manager walked us up to our room to make sure we were happy with it. The room was clean, big and in an excellent location. We expressed the need for a bathtub for our young daughter which was not a problem for the team at the hotel. Our room was great! I have trouble sleeping but not here! There was no noise, great blackout curtains and the air conditioning was wonderful! Wish we could have stayed longer! There’s so much to do in the neighborhood also. We walked to the high line, dinner and various parks nearby for our daughter! So easy and so much fun. And oh yea breakfast was excellent and included! I have a gluten allergy and they accommodated me with GF toast!! Definitely recommend Homewood Suites by Hilton and will certainly be back!!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Great value hotel in the heart of Manhattan. Located in a quiet area, but a stone's throw from Times Square, The Empire State Building and major shopping areas as well as a 10 minute walk to the Theatre District. Close to subway to take you downtown (recommended) and a 20 minute walk to Grand Central. We had a studio between 3 adults. There was plenty of room and the kingsize bed was great, but the sofabed was NOT comfortable for our adult daughter at all, they definitely need updating. Aircon was a godsend!Breakfast was very good. A different cooked selection every day, plus cakes, pastries, cereal, fresh fruit, cereal. Plenty to choose from, although we were not keen on the non pork breakfast products, but I understand it makes the breakfast an inclusive experience. Rooms were tidied daily, and fresh towels/toiletries provided.Staff were brilliant. Extremely friendly and efficient. We would definitely return.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: The Hilton Midtown is centrally located near Time Square, Central Park, and Rockefeller Center. But, the rooms are a bit run down. The bathroom spelled and the wall paper was pilling. The curtains were extremely hard to close (however, when you could close them the room remained very dark). The staff was very nice and helpful.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I stayed at this hotel during a visit which included activities in the Theatre District. Perfect location for walking to theatres and a short walk to Penn Station to go anywhere in the city via the subway. The immediate area around the hotel is a little scruffy and the people hanging out around these few blockes were unsavory but non-threatening. May need to shield the kids eyes or explain some of the sights nearby. But that being said, there are several deli/grocery, liquor, 7-11, and Duane Reade (Walgreens) nearby to supply the kitchen in your hotel room. If you plan ahead you can get a much better rate, so be sure to book ahead. The buffet was a bit stale but that didn't seem to bother anyone but me. Everyone else was enjoying the free meal. Most importantly, the staff, management, even the cleaners, were the most pleasant and helpful that I have met than at any other Hilton. Since we were staying a full 7 nights, we had several requests to the front desk/housekeeping but all were handled quickly and pleasantly.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Great rooms, super friendly staff, great complimentary breakfast, awesome location!!! We will definitely be back to have another memorable experience! Other than the usual busy streets of NYC, this hotel is a super place to stay!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Everything about our stay was perfect. Location steps from Time Square and Broadway and walking distance to most of Manhattan. Nice very clean hotel, friendly stuff, comfortable room with kitchen ( we found the full size refrigerator very useful as we could store all our leftovers). Complimentary breakfast included eggs, sausages, potatoes, oatmeal, yogurt, bread, fruits, and pastries. We had a great experience, would stay again when in NY.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: One of the front desk staff provided me bad customer service although I mentioned that I am a Hilton Honors member. She wasn't friendly. When I visit NYC this October, I will not stay this hotel since other Hilton hotels provide better Customer Service for Hilton Honors member.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Great hospitality and experience. Try to get up early to beat the breakfast buffet rush. Anytime after 8 AM you're going to have trouble finding a table especially if you have family with you. Other than that you have plenty of food as they bring out more food consistently as it runs out pretty fast.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Jackson from F & B is a man with great hospitality and service. He was professional and personable at the same time. Great eye contact. Smiles through it all. Even on days when staffing was very low.He is has been the most outstanding hotel personnel by far. He made no excuses for the delay but always said thank you for our patience when he was delayed in servicing his guests.I would recommend that Jackson receives the commendation that he deserves.Kudos!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Hotel was nice and clean, good location if you are looking for something in midtown. However downside was that I was overcharged at the end of my stay. This amount was meant to be refunded but was never processed by the hotel.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: From the moment we stepped into reception we knew we would love it here. We were welcomed with a big smile from a young man, who checked us in quickly, happily informing us about the hotel's amenities, what was in the surrounding area, good places to eat etc. We were given a King Bed Effeciency Room with a Sofa on a high floor facing the street. The room was big, very clean, modern with a kitchenette with all the amenities needed including a big fridge, small stove top, a microwave and dishwasher, which comes in handy if you are a long stay guest. The bathroom although a bit small is very clean and modern. The king bed was very comfortable and made for a really good nights sleep. The breakfast included was lovely and plentiful and a great way to start the day. The free coffee/tea/hot chocolate is available to all guests in a lovely lounge area with a glowing fire making it feel like home where there is also an internet area.This hotel is in an excellent location close walking distance to many attractions including Times Square, Broadway, Macy's, Bryant Park, Penn Station and subways just to mention a few. There are also plenty of places to eat close by.The staff here are an asset to this hotel starting from reception, to breakfast and housekeeping. We found them to be very friendly, polite and happy to help whenever they can.We loved our time here, and sad to have to leave. We thoroughly recommend this hotel, and we will most definitely return here when we next come back to New York.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I have been a Hilton member for a long time. Customer Service at Homewood Suites in Times Square - South was okay, but one of the front desk representative (supervisor/manager) was a bit rude. Overall, I may not stay in this hotel again since other Hilton hotels provide better customer service.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: The hotel is within easy walking distance of Times Square, the Empire State Building, and many other places to visit. Full size refrigerator, microwave and cook top was great. My room was very quiet and clean and the staff was very courteous and helpful!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
