review_body: Our trip was a "fun" trip to NYC for a Broadway show, sightseeing, a baseball game, museum touring and fine dining. The location of this hotel and our accommodations worked out well. We enjoyed the hotel. It was quite busy with summer tour groups, but the staff seemed to have it all under control, with a smile!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We would highly recommend this hotel. We came from the UK to celebrate my husband's 40th. We were given a spacious room on a high floor and when we arrived in our room there was a lovely cake, some chocolates and a bottle of non-alcoholic cider for my husband which was a lovely touch. The hotel is centrally located and in a safe area, close to all major attractions. The staff were extremely helpful and welcoming too. Only negative was the noise of the fridge in our room at night. We didn't mention it to the staff but I'm sure they would have switched it off if we had told them as we weren't using it anyway.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I highly recommend this hotel EVERYTHING about it was great the staff was extremely friendly nice and courteous they went above and beyond to accommodate any needs or concerns we had the Hotel was spotless clean and in a good location with a fantastic free breakfast we will definitely be staying there again

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: The service staff at this Homewood Suites by Hilton are all excellent. They arranged an early check in and 6 hour late check out for a minimal cost. They kindly and patiently will direct you to wherever you want to visit; shows, restaurants etc. The rooms are quiet and comfortable. The breakfast staff is amazing considering all of the hundreds of guests. Their is a lot to choose from including eggs, turkey sausage , potatoes , fruit , yogurt , bagels, muffins , juices and more. Seating is available inside and nice outside patio. Coffee , tea, hot chocolate is available 24/7. The elevators are fast. Subway is 3 short blocks away. Time Square, NYC Public Library, Bryant Park, Madison Square Garden, Empire State Building, Macys are all 5- 15 minute walk. The 22nd floor to the roof has a very nice patio with chair and tables that overlook the Hudson River. The Management does an excellent job motivating their employees and are all to be commended. Thank you Barry S.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: One of the most pleasant welcomes we have ever experienced in New York City. Checking in was a breeze and our room was ready as soon as we arrived from our long trip. Mr. Idris, the hotel receptionist, was most helpful in explaining we needed to know about the suite's amenities. Wonderful staff, great location, excellent amenities! Will definitely stay in this hotel again'

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We were warmly welcomed by Idris, Nicol and Christy. They introduced the facilities of the hotel, and made us very comfortable upon our arrival. The room provided is excellent, complete and new. Thanks.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: not all rooms are the same standard but were not a problem to change the room and get a better one, staff friendly and helpful, good location, coffee, and tee in the reception area a great bonus, breakfast ok but on my taste, hotel clean,small breakfast area always crowded,good coffee

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Although check in a bit rocky, room not ready after 4 staff made it right and added 10,000 points to account. The the best part was receiving a text (From Nick and Nicole) to make sure everything was satisfactory with room. Two minor issues, we needed more pillows and the shower leaked onto the floor, because of a loss seal one the shower door. Both were corrected within an hour and while we were not in the room. Great idea. SO often those little things go un reported by guests because they don't want to take the time or get in line to report and issue and it continues to be a problem for the next guest. and small problems that continue (leaks and such) just become worse. Great idea Nicole!!!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Great value large room in convenient location near Javits, Times Square, broadway shows, Hudson yards, and other midtown sights. Great free breakfast, free coffee all day, and kitchenette in room. Excellent staff.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: This a great hotel to stay in Midtown Manhattan. Staff upon check-in was friendly and provided complimentary bottled water and constantly acknowledged you when you returned back to the hotel. A+. We had the king size bed with twin sofa bed. King bed was comfortable the sofa bed was creaky and the mattress was thin (typical sofa bed). The size of the room was typical of most New York hotels, but appeared to have been recently renovated. The added plus was the refrigerator and microwave which came in handy. Also this hotel had a Laundry room with 3 washers and dryers, which was convenient. $2.50 per load and you need to get change at the Lobby desk. The hotel offers a complimentary breakfast which was good and the staff was great. The area is about 7 blocks from Broadway theaters and 3 blocks from Penn Station. There were more shady characters in this part of town that when we stayed in uptown, but they did not bother you. Also 2 blocks away from 2 Bros Pizza ($1 Slice)I would stay here again for the convenience and staff. A+

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We are family from Brisbane Australia. We stayed at Homewood Suites for 5 days in June and our stay included complimentary breakfast. As my daughter has multiple allergies I was concerned about the ingredients in the food. I met Jackson on day 1 of our stay and he was very helpful in checking and advising me of which foods were safe for my daughter. Jackson helped us every morning and it helped us have a enjoyable holiday. We are planning another trip in June 2020 and would prefer to stay again at Homewood suites.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: My wife and I stayed here for one week to celebrate our 43rd wedding anniversary. This hotel was a wonderful experience with no problems or complaints. It is conveniently located 3 short blocks from Penn subway station and half mile walk from Times Square with many restaurant and pizza options nearby. A 7-Eleven and Dunkin Donuts are steps away. Complementary breakfast was good, staff were all friendly and helpful. As with many hotels, the elevators get backed up at times but we just need to have patience. Rooms were quiet - we never heard neighbors talking or making noise. The bed and pillows were wonderful!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Everything from location, to service and quality of the room was excellent. Especially Shivangi and Idris on the front desk at check in. They did all they could to make our stay a good one. Highly recommend!!!! 5*

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Spent 4 days at this hotel, was impressed by how friendly all the staff were, those at check in, housekeeping, at breakfast and the even the odd staff persons we met in the elevator.Breakfast was good. They will hold your luggage, before you check in (if you arrive early) or when you checkout -- allowing you to spend a little more time site seeing. Walking distance or a short cab ride to a number of sites

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: My family really enjoyed our 5 day stay at this hotel. The location is very good-quite close to Times Square and there are a bunch of restaurants within walking distance from the hotel. For New York City, the room was a nice size and even included a kitchenette. The hotel was clean and the employees were exceptionally friendly-everyone at the front desk and the breakfast area went above and beyond to make our stay a great experience. Shoutout to manager Jonathan for making sure everything went smoothly during breakfast and guests were well taken care of. This hotel is a really good value too-reasonably priced, clean, safe, and in midtown Manhattan...what more can you ask for? Also, I was impressed with how big the gym was and the quality of the equipment. I will definitely stay at this hotel again on future trips to NYC.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Homewood Suites was easy to get to and in a great location for travel around NYC. Staff was friendly and checkin/checkout were ez. Rooms are decent size and have great amenities.. will go back in a heartbeat..

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: The hotel was very well kept, staff was very friendly, especially the front desk personnel. Clean room with very good environmental controls, AC was perfect. The only slight negative was the strange choices at breakfast. Typical breakfast food would have been better, such as Sausage and Eggs, Pancakes etc.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: This is a fantastic place to stay,the staff are absolutly lovely always a smile and hello when you go out and come back in again.I have stayed in 6 different hotels in NYC and this is definatly my favourite,stayed there last year and again last week for 10days.Will be back!!!!.It is very central to get around as we like to walk everywhere,having a kitchen in the suite is a big bonus.
user_name:
Sue M
St Austell, United Kingdom

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Our stay was quite comfortable, stayed 6N. Some highlights1) Positive and Welcoming Attitude of the Staff: this is a popular and large hotel. So at anytime there are many people. However you will always find the staff smiling, chatting and being helpful to the patrons. They try and help in whichever way possible. Full marks to their lovely attitude.2) Proximity to Penn Station: Just under a five minute walk to Penn Station. We bought the 7 day ride pass for the MTA - best way to get around. Also a walking distance from Hell’s Kitchen and Times Square.3) Amenities: Breakfast, complimentary coffee all day - self service in the lobby, laundry in the building, a super gym facility and a rooftop seating for fresh air. Rooms are equipped with a kitchenette. Beds are comfortable and Shower is Morden and nice.Only draw back is that the hotel due to its building location has limited sunlight (that’s the only thing negative I could come up with - but it might be the case with most New York hotels unless you are willing to pay much more)

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: The thermostat was broken and they failed to fix it during my stay. I couldn't get the temp above 67 degrees.And the bath towels ---- they seriously need to invest in some new ones. Two of my towels actually had HOLES in them.Breakfast day one was weird - beef fajitas. Who eats fajitas for breakfast?

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: If your on vacation - great location near Times Square if that's your thing. For business - different story. $45 day parking which is validated at hotel desk UNTIL YOU REACH THE PARKING GARAGE! There, you'll pay and no one at this hotel mentions it. No evening reception as at most Homewood hotels. Small rooms. No view from any of them. Impression is Hilton is simply trying to squeeze every dollar they can from guests choosing to stay at this location.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: This was an enjoyable place to stay. Wish they had a Manager's social. Would have made it worth the price. Otherwise, it looks exactly as it did on the internet. Staff was friendly and very accommodating. However, our room wasn't cleaned because we forgot and left the do not disturb sign on the door. Couldn't even get a $10 credit.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I reserved this room several weeks ago using my Chase Sapphire card...so I prepaid for a nice room with 2 queen beds and a foldout because I was traveling with two teenagers. It's tough to find a reasonable room of a good size, so I was pleased to find this hotel and book it for our trip.I checked in, was given my keys, went up to our room. It was a much smaller room than what I had paid for...only two queen beds and a very small bathroom, and add to that the A/C was barely working.Mind you, when I checked in, no one informed me I wasn't getting the room I paid for. So, I went downstairs and informed them, wrong room. They informed me that the hotel was full and I could move tomorrow. Nothing was offered to me at all to reimburse me for the difference in the room.Next day, packed up our bags, brought them down...and when we returned to the hotel around 5pm, guess what? Room wasn't ready. So, we sat in the lobby for 25 minutes waiting for them to get their act together.I really don't ask much, I just wanted the room I paid for, and would have appreciated them informing me on check in and at least apologizing.Pretty sure if I hadn't said something they would have just left me in that smaller room.Just not great service from Hilton...

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I Checked in with my family last weekend and my experience was amazing. Shivangi at the reception was very courteous and even checked us in early without any extra charge.The room service was very prompt as well and the breakfast was amazing. Overall this hotel experience was very good according to the tariff.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I travel to NYC monthly, mostly to see shows or visit friends. This hotel will be my new home away from home. From the friendly welcome (accommodating my request for a lower floor) to the pleasant check out, the whole experiences was wonderful!The room was spacious and comfortable - with the best mattress and pillows I have slept on in years! The room has a stove, a fridge and a microwave, so you don't have to eat it if you want to save a few dollars ( even though you are surrounded by fabulous restaurants!) The free breakfast buffet was incredible and better than what the local restaurants were charging $15 for!and location? 25 minutes to Chelsae- via walking along the beautiful Highline...and 15 minutes walk to Times Square. I highly recommend this hotel and look forward to my return!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We loved the location and the breakfast. The breakfast saved our family about $50 a day. The room had a king bed for us and twin for our kids. We stayed in the heart of the city. The staff was friendly!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: What a wonderful place to stay. The room, though not huge, was well equipped, clean and in a convenient place to get to just about everything. Had a shower leak, was fixed immediately. Desk personnel were kind and eager to help with visitors who were unfamiliar with train system. My only suggestion would be a more kid friendly breakfast, i.e., pancakes, regular sausage, french toast. Seemed to be a more European style meal.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: This hotel was wonderful, quiet, clean, and modern. Had room on 18th floor and it was super quiet and comfortable. Vince at front desk went out of his way to find us a quiet room. Subway was about a 5 minute walk-easy to get anywhere in Manhattan. Jonathan Lomitola, Asst Manager, was awesome during breakfast service. He was always dressed in his suit yet rolled up his sleeves to help with breakfast service every morning, cleaning off tables and helping guests find a table for breakfast. We were very impressed at how friendly all the staff were at this hotel. Wish I had booked a couple of more nights.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We stayed in a group of 8 travellers in March. The hotel was fantastic with comfy, clean, well kept rooms, laundry, 24 hour a day coffee/tea bar in foyer, and comfy foyer seating where a lager group can meet, wait for each other and catch a cuppa. Fantastic and helpful front desk staff with good eating choices, wonderful housekeeping staff and the daily breakfast staff of Jackson, Lysett, Felix, Pedro, Tamara, Lloyd and Ana went above and beyond each and every day.Very handy location withing walking distance of Macy's, Time's Square, Hudson River, theatre district. Would definitely stay here again.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: There were four women and one child for our stay and the accommodations were perfect. This hotel is in a great location and the staff is exceptionally friendly. The room was a great size and the refrigerator and microwave allowed us to have some snacks for the evening. I especially liked the wood floors. It seemed so much cleaner than carpet. The breakfast was very adequate and all we needed. We enjoyed the rooftop area and the general neighborhood. We would definitely stay again !

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We stayed at the Homewood suites, Manhattan in late May for 4 nights. It exceeded our expectations. The location was fantastic, short walk to Times Square and The Empire State Building. Plenty of restaurants nearby to choose from. The rooms were kept very clean and there was no noise , considering we were in a bustling city ! The kitchenette and fridge in the room was an added bonus. The staff were so welcoming and friendly and couldn't do enough for you. Especially Nicole on reception. The breakfast was lovely with plenty of choice and staff were great at keeping the tables clean and stocking up on the food and drinks. There was a celebration in the lobby during our stay, to celebrate 100 years of Hilton. There was a quiz with prizes and my son loved it , especially as he won ! They put on pizza and cake as well. They have complimentary hot drinks in the lobby 24/7 which, again, was an added bonus. Would definitely return.
user_name:
Trek793073
Newcastle upon Tyne, United Kingdom

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: This hotel was the best we stayed in throughout our three separate stays in NYC recently. Staff were accommodating asking what room we'd like and knowing which were the quite ones. A buffet breakfast was included in the room rate and was replenished constantly and managed extremely efficiently The room we had even had a microwave and cook top with full size fridge. Midtown location is certainly the best with proximity to subway very close.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We were family 2 Adults 2 Kids(6Year & 6 Month). King room was not that spacious. But other than space everything was very good. Location was perfect. Breakfast was included. Having kitchen in room was really helpful because of kids.Overall I will definitely recommended this property. If big family make sure to book big rooms.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Loved most everything about the hotel - got a great last minute deal so it was even nicer. Had a great check in experience, hotel is so central so it made it easy to walk here from Penn station! The room was stunning, gorgeous views. The rooftop area was amazing. The free breakfast the next morning was fantastic. My only complaint was the shower - the water pressure was pretty bad. We didn't call the front desk about it though because we were in a rush and just didn't have the time. Jackson who helped me get milk at breakfast was delightful - such a nice person and he was the cherry on the top of a great overnight stay. Will definitely be coming back!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I was on a family vacation across the East Coadt in USA so NYC was always on the anvil. I booked 3 rooms @ Homewood Suites due to the high rating on Booking.com and I expected a good stay.The hotel property is good but not outstanding. Still, what makes the hotel work big time is the staff and overall customer experience.During my 5 night stay they din’t say no for anything:1) Free Coffee/Tea/Hot Chocolate in the lobby - No problem.2) Early CheckIn - No Problem.3) Late Checkout - No Problem.4) Pack your breakfast for the guests who didn’t wake up in time - No Problem.5) Stow luggage as my flight is late - No Problem.Also, the location is very central and you can walk to Times Square, Rockenfeller Center, Broadway and Empire State Building.I would stay here again.. Highly recommended.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I cannot say enough about how great our stay was, from the check-in and check-out, to the excellent breakfast, to the perfect bedding and cleanliness of the room. I would say that this was my best stay in a hotel setting ever.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: A great hotel and staff in a wonderful midtown location..restaurants all around...5 blocks (walkable) to Times Sq and Theatre District.. 4 blocks to Penn Station...Rooms are large (by NY standards) and very clean!!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: A trouble-free, comfortable and very affordable stay at yet another of the simpler Hilton-brand hotels -- and at a convenient location. The hotel was crowded with tourists but that didn't impact me. (Only problem -- frequent in small, densely packed hotels -- is the banging of doors by inconsiderate neighbors, but was not a major concern.)

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We stayed at the end of May with our 8 year old. The hotel is a perfect location for sightseeing & surprisingly really quiet considering how close it is to Times Sq.The rooms are a decent size and really modern & spotlessly clean. There is a little kitchen in the room which we didn’t use that much however it was good to have the fridge (a little noisy at times). The room had a huge bed & a fab sofa bed for our daughter who always slept well in it every night.Breakfast is included which is fab! So much choice!If you have a busy day a head you can grab a takeaway box and fill it up with breakfast items which we did do a couple of mornings. There is also free tea & coffee in the lobby.The staff are so lovely!! They really make the hotel. They do a brilliant job & always so friendly & helpful. We would stay again!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Bathroom was dirty in several places. Beds were super squeaky and uncomfortable. The morning breakfast was super low quality, we only even tried it one day and went out for breakfast other mornings, and breakfast was one reason we stayed here. Breakfast area and lobby is too small for size of hotel so it was crowded all hours of the day but especially breakfast. Close to Times Square and Penn Station, perfect location.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: My family and I stayed here for our family vacation.  We choose this hotel, because we are Hilton Honors members and no Homewood Suites we have stayed at has ever let us down.  This hotel is walking distance from everything; Central Park, Empire State Building, Macy's, you name it.  The hotel has free breakfast everyday and it's always a great selection and good!  Idris and the rest of the staff there  was so accommodating and kind they made the stay even easier.  I don't know how they manage to always have a smile even with the chaos going on around the place during the memorial day holiday.  If we ever come back, we will definitely come back to this hotel.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We stayed at the Homewood for 6 nights and I cannot say enough great things about the staff and hotel. Location is perfect if you want to be in the big city but a short distance away from all the hustle and bustle. We easily walked to many of the city's top attractions. Room was a good size for New York city. We were on the top floor so we had the pleasure of a beautiful view each time we came and went from our room. Elevators were busy, but nothing that could not be managed. I was visiting with my two teenage sons and felt comfortable walking to and from the hotel at any time of the day.From the moment we arrived we were treated as V.I.P. guests. Each encounter we had with staff was positive. I didn't catch each staff members name but will note the breakfast staff as they were phenomenal!! Every single interaction we had at breakfast was met with a smile and we were always accommodated and happy. Breakfast at this hotel was delicious and crazy busy! Kudoos to Ana, Lissett, Jackson, Lloyd, Jason, and Felix. I don't think I saw you stop moving once while breakfast was going.Absolute applause and appreciation goes to manager Johnathon Lomitola for his professionalism, positive attitude, and hardwork. He goes above and beyond to ensure you stay, leave, and remain a valued client of Hilton. Thanks!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We stayed in the King Efficiency Suite and it was very spacious for a hotel in NYC. Great location, you are close to every where you need to be, but far enough from the noises. Vincent checked us in and he was awesome! A great addition to the staff! He greeted us right away, and while we were passing through the lobby I heard him made everyone feel like VIP when they walked through the door! The only thing is the elevators were very slow, but overall a great hotel!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: As soon as I walked in I was greeted and ushered to my suite. A diamond in the ruff. Unlike some of my stays in the city this one was memorable. The hotel has positive vibrations all around. As I write this I’m aboutTo check back in for my second stay. Stay tuned I’m sure this round will be even more memeorable.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Be warned, every photo we saw show a hotel room was WITH couch and an acceptable size. However after check in we realized this photo which is on the Hilton Website and Hotels.com is the Accessible (ADA) room. The room given to us had no sitting area or pull out sofa. The Hotel DOES NOT offer roll away beds. Our room had two large double beds which were small and a desk with a chair. There is no carpeting so it feels cold and awkward and does not feel inviting in any way. We asked for extra pillows and blankets and got sheets after our first night, the next day after we called again (we stayed two nights.) It is not the typical welcoming feeling of a Homewood suite and that is that. The breakfast was okay. Very typically hectic and busy but fine. The hotel is fine. Elevators are very very very slow and our room was only available at 3:45 PM which is 15 minutes prior to mandatory check in. Basic bathroom. So overall it was Average. Not going back and not impressed. The lack of any other sitting area in the room other than sitting on a bed or an uncomfortable office chair and the fact that there is no carpeting in the rooms made it uncomfortable. The kitchenette was VERY small and don't plan on cooking anything other than using the microwave for a mac and cheese. What I can't get over is there isn't even a chair to sit on, other than a metal desk chair on wheels which again, because of the lack of carpeting makes it feel like we were in a office building. Not a great stay.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We stayed at the Homewood Suites Midtown and the stay was great. The hotel was clean and the staff went out of their way to make our stay amazing. Very friendly staff. The hotel was in a good location for sight seeing and catching the subway. We will be back!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: While the front desk staff were wonderful, the housekeeping left me underwhelmed. My room was often left with trash not emptied and when I checked in, the furniture was pushed into the middle of the room against the bed with the sofa bed open and cushions all over.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Just the right hotel especially for families visiting New York for a good holiday. Located in the heart of Manhattan, Times Square. Everything is close by....be it 7/11, Pharmacies like Dwane Reade, Take out restaurants especially an Indian Restaurant called Indikitch ( only one or two block away ), public transportation...Its like a dream come true!!The rooms are also quite larger given Manhattan Standards. They have a small kitchen complete with a stove, dishwasher, utensils etc that is extremely convenient for families with children ( such as ours). Very decent breakfast every morning. The lady who checked us in ( im sorry I forgot her name ) was courteous enough to give me a higher floor ( it eliminates any noise issues that one might face at a lower floor ). So kind of her!!...The 24 hour tea, coffee and hot chocolate feel like an icing to the cake....Could you ask for something more!!!I would have given it the perfect 5 stars but stop short only due to some hitches I faced....The safe that was provided stopped responding with all my valuables inside. I had to put in 3 reminders to the front desk and waited for a good 1 1/2 hour in the night before somebody found the time to come up and help me. This was despite being promised that help is right on its way....Also when I was checking out, the guy at the front desk seemed disinterested in knowing how my stay was ( I booked the room for a good 6 night stay)...So much for basic courtesy to a guest !!Still a positive experience overall!!Thx

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Stayed here for 3 nights while visiting for a concert at MSG. Very convenient, it's a 5 minute walk to Penn station, Macy's and MSG and 1O minutes to the Empire State Building in one direction and 5 minutes to the bus station, 10-15 minutes to Times Square and theatre land in the other. Did I mention quiet ? I was actually able to get to sleep in a large comfortable bed in New York. Good sized rooms with fridge/freezer, microwave, dishwasher and hob. Rooftop seating was fine, not great views but it didn't really matter. Great, friendly staff especially Pravay on reception who we dealt with several times. We had to go to Pennsylvania before returning for one last night in NY and the plan was to stay in another hotel, booking it on the day but we enjoyed our stay here that much that we didn't have to search for anything else.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Came across this little gem of a hotel when searching for an affordable stay during a biz trip to NYC. Location in midtown is great; rooms are comfortable, clean and spacious. Breakfast was awesome and the service all around was efficient and professional not to mention warm and hospitable. Great workout facility also as well as a beautiful rooftop area to view the surrounding neighborhood with glimpses of the skyline. Manager JL was always around greeting guests and making everyone feel at home. Highly recommend this hotel when visiting NYC.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Very good modern hotel, quiet even though close to many attractions and with subway/trains/buses near by. Our room was very well appointed and comfortable with a well equipped kitchenette and good bathroom. Complimentary breakfast, well served and free coffee available all day. Everything is very well taken careFront desk go out of their way to make you feel comfortable and do their best to help you in any way they can. Thank you Nicole for your help.When in New York we used to stay in another hotel, uptown, and prices were much higher for a less result! We will come back and let our friends know about your hotel!!!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: The hotel is very well organized, welcoming and safe, also the room is cozy, clean and offers every confort. The only discomfort was having had a very noisy refrigerator.A special thanks goes to Nicole and Jondariy for their professionalism, availability and above all for their courtesy.Thanks also to Jackson who, with undisputed profesionalism, made us fell at home every morning, pampering us and always welcoming us with a wonderful smile.Surely these three people have improved and encouraged staying at the hotel and our entire vacation.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Great friendly staff and best value for all the features offered. Location, decor, breakfast, friendly front desk, attentive dining area staff, stove, fridge, microwave and all other kitchen gadgets. Convenient Lobby coffee/tea /hot chocolate.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We were in NYC to combine a family visit with a sightseeing visit and the Homewood Suites was the PERFECT place to stay! We spent 4 nights and will definitely go back when we're in NYC again. The location of the hotel is very, very convenient. We could walk to Penn Station and take the NJT to New Jersey and the subway was also nearby. There are tons of restaurants within walking distance as well as a grocery store if you want to stock up the full size fridge in your room. The fitness center was one of the nicest AND cleanest I've seen, the breakfast was excellent- hot, fresh and lots of selections, our room was extremely quiet--we never heard any noise and the staff was super helpful. All in all a great stay--would recommend to anyone.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: This is a very well run hotel. After a very long flight I was greeted at reception by Pranay who provided a big smile and a genuine welcome. I cannot speak highly enough of the way Pranay set the positive tone for my stay. The staff at some of the New York stores (eg Kate Spade) could learn a lot by sitting in the reception area at this hotel and seeing how Pranay and his colleagues interact and relate to their customers. The room was spotless and housekeeping continued to do an outstanding job. The breakfast area is very busy and, whilst the range is not extensive, it is still of good quality and once again the breakfast staff with Jackson do a great job. The downstairs hotel common area, breakfast area and my room seemed to have recently been renovated so everything is very contemporary and clean. My room had a very good sized balcony area which is “bare bones” with a café style table, 4 chairs and a few pavers – with a little more expenditure in paving the whole area and putting in some plant boxes this balcony could become a very nice area and really set this hotel apart. The hotel is well located and a reasonably easy walking distance (with suitcase) from Penn station. To the two questions – would I come here again and would I recommend it to others the answer is a definite “yes”.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Staff all around is very helpful and the morning breakfast crew of Felix, Ana, Liset, & Pedro was especially kind and professional. Located in the center of it all in Midtown this hotel puts you in the middle of the action.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We stayed three days at this hotel on a visit to New York City. From the first moments at check-in the staff was very friendly and helpful. Traveling with three adults and two children with nine bags made us unlikely to be favorites among staff at any facility, but every staff member acted as if we were favorite family members. I would especially like to compliment the employees at the breakfast rooms. In a 22 story hotel the free breakfast accommodating many, many cultural differences and expectations would be really hard. But, they were so very friendly and happy to make sure each and every person had what they needed and began their day on a positive note. WELL DONE. The young women who checked our bags on our last day not only did not flinch at the special attention needed by the back packs of young girls ( American Girl dolls’ heads sticking out so that new hairdos would be preserved) they assured the girls that the dolls would receive special attention. They won my heart. The janitorial staff person who helped an aunt and six year old to find a restroom on another floor with no line in an “emergency” also deserves an “atta boy”.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We stayed here for our first visit to the Big Apple and my partners Birthday, one of the main reasons we chose this place was the location in which we found was ideal as it was pretty central.The rooms were very clean and modern, packed with a small kichen with almost every appliances if you are wanting to cook or eat in.The hotel offers breakfast and 24hr coffee in which is a real bonus, just wanted to say that all the staff from the front desk, in house waiters, and cleaners were very friendly attentive and took pride in what they did especially Jackson who we were happy to see in the morning.We couldn't fault the rotating breakfast options, and thought that the take away boxes were a real good idea especially when travelling around and out for most of the day.Would defiantly recommend, and would stay again if we get chance to come back,Thanks for making our stay special. John & Katie

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We flew into NYC on a whim for our 20th Anniversary. I selected this Homewood Suites location also on a “ whim “ . Sometimes spontaneous choices simply work out best . Front desk manager Paul and assist Audreen wereincredibly proactive by ensuring our stay was quite memorable. Upon entering our suite , we immediately noticed a bottle of apple bubbly , a small decadent chocolate cake w/ fruit and an array of delicious snacks . There also was a handwritten welcome letter and congratulations on our 20th Anniversary.. It is special touches like this , that keep us loyal to Hilton properties..Kudos to Paul and Audreen for going above and beyond ..Thank you both very much .. We’ll be back !

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: My daughter and I stayed at the Homewood Suites for 3 nights. The staff at reception made our first trip unforgettable. They were welcoming on arrival, especially Pramay who checked us in so quickly. He was friendly and funny! They spoke to us as we left on our adventures every morning and asked us about our day when returning in the evening... a first class service! The suite was immaculate, comfortable and well equipped. Even when we had an issue with the key card, it was fixed within a couple of minutes. We both fell in love with New York and have vowed to return. The Homewood Suites by Hilton will be our no.1 go to hotel!! Loved our stay, thank you all so much!!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: The service. The employees at the desk, especially Jackson in the dining area, was so helpful and kind. And the front desk couldn't have been more helpful, going out of their way when the right room wasn't ready, they adjusted our bill.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Loved our stay here at Homewood Suites in Midtown - this is our 3rd annual trip here, and staying at this hotel. The location is convenient, rooms spacious and well-kept. This is why we keep coming back! Jackson was our attendant at breakfast, and he is amazing - so attentive to our needs, worked really hard to clear dishes. It says something that he is the focus of this review, but he is why I'm writing it. So happy with our stay!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We enjoyed our stay here in Homewood Suites Manhattan. The Service from Jackson at breakfast the was very attentively and helpfully. He always had a smile in his face and we could see that he really liked bis Job.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Great location ! Front Desk staff very welcoming and professional. Had the pleasure of speaking with the Hotel Manager, Jonathan Lomitola. What a charming and professional Manager, A great asset to your Hotel !! We were pleasantly welcomed with Amenities delivered to our room upon check in. Thank you Mr. Lomitola !The complimentary breakfast was impressive and convenient. The discounted parking across the street is an added bonus.I will highly recommend you to all.I will recommend

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Great location in Times Square! Easy walk to all of the excitement. Front desk always went above and beyond to greet you on the way in and out and great breakfast in the morning! Definitely coming back!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: A really nice location. Close to Penn Station, Time Square, Empire State Building, Madison Square Garden etc. Nicole on reception and Jackson a waiter were extremely helpful during a our stay. Great staff. I would choose this location again.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Enjoyed 5 nights here exploring New York. 2 families of 5 with children from 11 to 21. Rooms very spacious with small kitchen area and bathroom, cleaned daily. Staff were friendly and helpful, suggested local restaurants which we tried and liked. Check in/out was quick and we were able to store our luggage on departure day. Great breakfast which was a bonus as eating out is very expensive. Free hot drinks all day, grab a coffee or hot choc on the way in/out. Free wi-fi. Decent gym in the basement. Great location, walking distance to Times Square, Rockefeller Tower, Central Park, High Line, Grand Central Station and subway 2 mins walk to get elsewhere.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: My family of five was very comfortable in our suite. It was clean, relatively spacious and the beds were comfortable. The kitchen was very functional. The complimentary breakfast was a huge value, high quality, varied daily, delicious.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We stayed at this hotel for four nights. We were very happy with our stay. The location is perfect. An easy walk to Madison Square Gardens, Times Square, High Line, Macy’s, Penn Station, Port Auth Station and much more!! The hotel room was clean, quiet and had an ideal set up for 3 of us. The pull out sofa is single not double but worked for us. The breakfast had a large selection but was very busy. Especially on the weekend. There are actually a lot of tables and seating but not enough at peak times. The coffee bar is available all day and has a great selection. The staff were all very friendly.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Every year my sister and I come to NYC to stay - we’ve been to this hotel for the second time! Fabulous service that makes you feel like you are at home! We checked in at 10:15 am and were offered breakfast and got an extended checkout!!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I arrived late and found the hotel staff very accommodating and polite. They made great recommendations for dinner and I felt very comfortable. It was in a great location, I was there for business and only for one night but I will definitely try to stay there next time.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Great place to stay. Central to what we wanted to do and see. Far enough from the noise Times Square but close enough. breakfast was good, gym good overall a great value. I would recommend Homewood Suites for sure.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Roomy suites near everything. Great to explore Midtown Manhattan Nice breakfast and premium room had snacks and drinks, which our son loved. Good wifi said he too. Only minus was, that only 2/3 of elevators was working, so one had to wait.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Solid place to stay. Convenient location. Clean, orderly, with good amenities. Convenient to Penn Station and subway, as well as Times Square and Bryant Park. Nice to have kitchenette. Shower leaked though.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I've stayed in other Homewood' before, but not this particular one. The service and attitude of all staff we encountered was excellent. The breakfast was better than expected. The location was perfect for our trip - only 3 blocks to Subway and Penn Stn and short walk to Times Sq. We were in a "premium" King on the 10th floor - not much of a view; water pressure and temp were very good; bed was comfortable; room was very quiet. The only negative for me was not being able to adjust the room temperature to my liking.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: great location, friendly staff and spotless room with amazing bed!! Jackson the breakfast waiter was so friendly,best place i have stayed in ! close to all attractions but very quiet, all staff were so helpful and friendly.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: The hotel location, rooms and staff were excellent. The hot breakfast was great and a rare find included in a NYC hotel stay. A shout out to Jackson in the breakfast area. He was very friendly and helpful.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I picked this hotel because of its proximity to Penn Station. It is a quick walk - less than 10 minutes from Penn Station. The hotel has been beautifully updated. The breakfast buffet was impressive! It has broccoli quiche when I stayed there! Treat yourself to a premium room. It was nice to have snacks and drinks available. Have already recommended this hotels to several people!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: The two wonderful ladies at the front desk could not be more accommodating, caring, friendly and helpful. They stored our luggage and texted us when our room was ready. Our room was on the 7th floor. It was immaculate and perfectly comfortable. Cleaning service was equally kind and helpful. Plenty of hot water, nice TV, beautiful workout room, delicious breakfast and all kinds of information and thoughtful suggestions. The hotels location was ideal to Time Square, Subway, MSG, restaurants. We loved it!! We are a family of four and we were fine in our king jr suite. No complaints. Thank you to everyone for a nice stay!!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: This was a great hotel. Very clean & modern. Bed was very comfortable. Breakfast was also good. Staff very friendly. Location was right in the middle of everything in Midtown. Walked almost everywhere from this location. Felt very safe all the time.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I've stayed here twice for business and these are clean suites with great amenities. The beds were extremely comfortable and the floors are NOT carpeted! I love that it feels clean here. I use the Gym each time I'm here and like it very much. Also clean and lots of bikes, treadmills and weights. I never ate the breakfast but it looked really nice. There were always a lot of people there. Again- very clean and the big fridge was helpful.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I stayed in this hotel one night while on business in NYC. I chose it because I needed a hotel near Penn Station. This is a 6-minute walk northwest of the station, on a (relatively) quiet side street, in the heart of the Garment District. My room was surprisingly large for a Manhattan hotel, very clean, and with lots of windows and light. The desk was in front of one of the large windows, which made it a pleasant workspace. Breakfast was fine, with a decent selection of hot and cold items. I recommend this hotel to anyone, and I look forward to staying there again.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Great hotel near Times sq, Empire State Building and Madison sq Gardens. Staff were all friendly and helpful. EspeciallyJonathan, Audreen and Idris, who decorated our room for my girlfriends birthday surprise! Thank you. Room was cleaned daily, breakfast was plentiful and replenished regularly.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: As a team member, I stay in a lot of Hiltons. Normally when asking for recommendations I get told about the most expensive locations. But the staff here recommended budget friendly yet exotic food choices. The room was cozy as well. I didn't want to leave in the morning. They held my bag at the front desk after I checked out so that I had a little more time to explore the city. That was appreciated. It's just a short walk to Hell's Kitchen. There's so much to do around this hotel. I definitely wish I could've stayed another night!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Very dissapointed an hour before our arrival our room with terrace was given away . They were apologetic didnt know how it happened but it put a real downer on arriving . The hotel was clean but due to the room saga my teen had a sofa bed and was raging and uncomfortable. The breakfast was ok. Kitchen and fridge in room was good. Wont return again
user_name:
Lisa W
Belfast, Northern Ireland, United Kingdom

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I stayed here last June. It was centrally located and for New York standards, a large hotel room. So when it was time to travel to the city again, I was drawn back to this hotel, I am so glad I did. We arrived early and our room was ready. Check in was quick. Everyone was kind and very accommodating. The room had everything you need to feel at home for a few days. Breakfast was great. It was very busy each morning. The staff worked wonders waiting on everyones needs. However, Jackson was wonderful. I wanted to take breakfast upstairs. He wrapped everything up neat and tidy to transport and couldnt stop asking what he could do for me. We are already talking about our next trip to New York and this is going to be my go to place from now on. They delivered on both trips. Love this place.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Great service. Excellent staff. Central location, close to Times Square and MSG. Rooftop has a great view. The breakfast has a good variety of options. 24hour coffee was a plus. Will definitely returned this hotel again in the future.
user_name:
NicolasAR92
New York City, New York

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We stayed for 4 nights in The Homewood Suites in March 2019. From check in to check out the hotel delivered exactly what we required. We're a family of 4 with kids aged 15 or 12 (boy and girl) and finding rooms to accommodate us is generally tricky. This room was perfect. Two double beds and a sofa bed meant that there was no arguing over sleeping arrangements. The room was fitted with a small kitchenette including a large fridge\freezer. Breakfast was plentiful and adequate. Its a free breakfast but the choice is OK. Don't expect too much but there's enough to choose from to suit most tastes. Tea and coffee was available in reception 24/7 which was very welcomed. Why cant more places do that? On check in my daughter sneezed and the helpful man immediately handed her a box of tissues. A small thing but a welcoming gesture appreciated on arrival. As you'd expect in New York there is so much to see and do that we didn't spend hours on end in the hotel but it was comforting to know that had we needed to spend more time there than all our needs would have been catered for, Highly recommend this hotel for families and couples.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: The hotel was surprisingly spacious. Our two queen bed suite easily accommodated my family including two teenage boys and a nine year old daughter. Location was ideal, there were multiple subway stops within an easy ten minute walk of the hotel and we were able to walk to Hell's Kitchen and take the Highline to Chelsea Market. Times Square was also less than 20 minutes away walking. We never felt uncomfortable in the neighborhood when walking to/from the hotel. The staff was unfailingly helpful and friendly. We asked for restaurant recommendations and were sent to Scalliwags which we thoroughly enjoyed.The hotel was clean and updated. Beds were comfortable and all amenities worked well. In room complimentary WiFi was easy to access and very fast. The complimentary breakfast was a cut above what I have experienced at other Homewood suites (I have stayed at over a dozen in different states). Overall we were very pleased with our stay and would strongly recommend the Homewood Suites.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Traveling with our two kids (14 and 12) requires a hotel room with three beds which isn't easy to find, especially on short notice in Manhattan in December. This place fit the bill with two queen beds and a twin size sleeper sofa. While it isn't ideal for our daughter to sleep on a sleeper sofa for 5 nights, it was actually pretty comfortable and worked out fine. The rooms here have a full kitchen, which was nice. Kids were not a fan of the sliding bathroom door with no lock (understandable) but again, it worked out fine. By Manhattan standards, the size of this room was decent. Breakfast was free and acceptable. Typical hotel breakfast, nothing outstanding but adequate. Elevators in the morning were busy, but that is normal. Location was about 2-3 blocks from subway stations and walking distance to Times Square, the Highline and Chelsea. The area around the hotel felt safe, we walked all the streets in the dark without any hesitation. It was our first trip to NY and next time we would like to stay in the Financial District or down by Battery Park in the historical area. We thought staying by Times Square would be better but we realized it is so easy to get around Manhattan and the lower Manhattan is quite a bit nicer than the area by Times Square.It's NY so there is noise all night long. We could hear occasional sirens during the night but overall the noise was manageable.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: The staff at the Homewood are fantastic. The try their best to accommodate if possible. Audrey Corvin at the front desk went above and beyond to help us. We had a problem with making a reservation and she stepped up and helped. I will definitely stay here again.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: My family and I have stayed at the Homewood Suite by Hilton on West 37th, NYC, several times - and we highly recommend it. This past weekend we had another good stay -- thanks to Audreen and Jonathan at the front desk and Mike who handled and stored our bags. Terrific hotel - super convenient, really comfortable rooms, filling and healthy breakfast included. Highly recommend it for a business or personal stay.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We stayed several times at a Homewood. The service at this hotel is great in particular the barman Jackson, he is really doing his best to satisfy the guests. This hotel has a great location, close by the trains so you can discover the city.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: HIGHLY RECOMMEND staying here, I will always stay here and for hundreds of reasons. My room was superb and cleaned daily to an exceptionally high standard by Yelexnin, it was a delight to return after a busy day out and about knowing my room would be perfect. Breakfast was ALWAYS DELICIOUS and so much choice and ALL INCLUDED in your nightly rate. The breakfast team are OUTSTANDING and I loved every morning seeing them, everyone was happy, Tamara remembered me from staying last year and a delight to see her, she's so lovely. Jackson was awesome too and always greeted everyone warmly. Lisett, Ana, Felix, Lloyd and Pedro are amazing too, EVERYONE works SO hard, Thank you. The cleanliness is top and SPOTLESS. The reception team were ALWAYS welcoming and had time for a quick chat, lovely way to make you feel you're part of the family. Omy (remembered me from last year), Pranay, Nicole, Audreen and Idris thank you for making me feel at home. I had a BIG challenge and wondered how it could happen. My head was spinning around until I spoke to one team member who took it on, Mike V Bellman, honestly, he went above and beyond and made it happen. The challenge was I wished to have a driver to and fro with waiting time in NJ and Mike V Bellman organised it all for me, THANK YOU so much. Homewood Suites is, clue in its name 'HOME" and here you DO feel at HOME. Thank you to EVERYONE, if I haven't mentioned you, please forgive me. I feel it's the BEST hotel in New York. I'm Missing you ALL.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Great experience overall! Love the location and the staff was kind and courteous. It was nice to have a complimentary breakfast before we started our day! Rooms were clean! We have stayed here before and will be back!!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Stayed here for (2) nights in March 2019. Hotel & guestrooms are exceptionally clean and well appointed. Staff was super friendly and helpful. Breakfast was great and is included in the overnight room rate. I highly recommend this hotel when staying in NYC!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: This is my family’s second time staying here. We like the ability to cook and prepare our own food due to my child’s allergies. The kitchenette has a dual burner stovetop but no oven, microwave and a medium fridge/freezer. We cannot use the toaster due to cross contamination. It has most of the usual utensils (no spatula this time). There is not much room to store groceries so that gets tricky.The breakfast provided by the hotel is hit or miss. We had an EXCELLENT experience on March 26, 2019 when Paul and Jackson were working. Paul was so accommodating about informing about they type of gf bread (Udi’s) and making sure it was not cross contaminated. Jackson checked up to make sure my son liked it which made him feel included. Normally, we don’t risk it because people don’t pay attention. The rest of the days were just ok... We tried again for the toast and the staff for that day did not take the allergy seriously at all. One day the signs labeling the hot food items did not match - bacon was a sausage broccoli mixture, the egg patty was a undercooked French toast bake, etc. The hot beverage bar is always available with office style coffee, tea, and hot cocoa packets. There are always a few pieces of fruit available to grab which we love!The room is nice with a desk, dresser, bed, pullout bed, and wardrobe. It’s NYC so everything is smaller but it works out great! The tv reception was glitchy at times. We didn’t have much noise at night and slept well.The location is fantastic being near 34th and Penn, Madison Square Garden, Times Square is walkable, and near the garment district.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: For making our trp to NYC comfortable and memorable. Your services made us feel welcomed and that you were interested in services us.Special shout out to Parnay!Thanks to Jonathan, Nicole, Tamara, Yessica, Jackson.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Impeccable friendly service,clean rooms full loaded Great breakfast,varied.Thank you Jackson...super attentive Great locationI checked out at 12 but was able to leave my suitcases in the Hotel,go around the city till my flight time and return to get it.very convenient.Perhaps the only little detail would be to upgrade the mattress on the sofa.Sofa bed was perfect for us,we have a 10 years old daughter that fit on the sofa.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I had a conference at the Javits Center so was looking for something within walking distance. It's an 8 minute walk right down 37th Street to the convention center so that was perfect. It's also very close to Times Square and everything else thats around that area, close to MSG too. We were on the 14th floor looking out over 37th Street. Cool city view. The room was very clean, bed was very comfortable, kitchenette was very useful and came fully equipped. Bathroom was nice with a great shower. Only about 10-12 rooms on each floor so not a lot of foot traffic, our floor seemed VERY quiet. Every single employee we came into contact with was friendly and smiling. The morning breakfast area was great. Food was good. Lots of choices. Coffee available 24 hours which was nice when we'd come back to the room with cannoli from Carlo's which is just a couple blocks away. Lobby area was always buzzing with activity but didn't feel crowded and was very welcoming. The folks staying there were all nice and overall we had a great time there. Loved the location. Easy to catch Lyft/Uber right in front of the motel. Security was excellent as you had to swipe your key to use the elevator. This was our first trip to NYC so I was a tad nervous about how safe we'd feel. Literally within 2 minutes of checking in, we just felt at home. Staff, neighborhood, other guests all were wonderful. Next trip back to NYC there will be no reason to stay anywhere different. Thanks to the staff for such a wonderful stay!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Great location! Close to Penn Station, Broadway, Times Square, everything that you go to NYC for! Staff was great at following up to make you have everything that you need and the complementary breakfast was an added bonus.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Family members came in from overseas for my son’s Carnegie Hall performance and we got 2 comfortable large rooms for 3 days. We felt so at home. Staff here is exceptional and we really appreciated the great conversations and warm hospitality. Special shout out to Andrene and Omy at the front desk and Jackson in the kitchen for taking such good care of us! The included breakfast was great and varies slightly every day. Not many great choices of restaurants that will deliver other than pizza but great spots are just a stroll away nearby. Great location. We had a fantastic time and will definitely stay here again.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: This hotel has a great location. The staff are courteous and helpful. The breakfast is great. Lots of options. The walls seemed really thin in my suite though as I could hear my neighbors conversations, snoring and sneezing too easily. For a NYC hotel though, this is a great value and I would consider staying again should I visit the city.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We chose this hotel due to location for visiting our family. We like this hotel because the prices are very reasonable, it is clean and well maintained, and the full hot breakfast is included. The staff is very nice and attentive. In particular, Jackson was one of the staff in the breakfast room and he was very attentive and very responsive to our needs.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: This hotel was so bad . 5 blocks from time square, the hotel was full because cheaper prices rooms . On arrival the room we booked had been given to someone else by mistake, because it was full they put us in a tiny room with a king and pull out couch . When we pulled out he mattress to make up the bed it was covered in urine and mold.We call the front desk who moved us to a second room , this one had the same issue urine but not the mold .We called the management who then brought us up a new mattress all together.. no offer of refund or assistance it was just our back luck. My husband then met the management the next day who then moved us to a room with 2 queen's near he lift and ice machine ,so noisy .. Still not the original room we booked for ,It was just gross avoid this place .

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I took my 12 year old daughter and her friend to NYC for the weekend to catch a broadway show. I chose this hotel because it was the most reasonable rate for the kind of room we needed, and boy was I surprised! We arrived on Friday around 6 pm and were greeted by the kindest, friendliest man at check-in (I’m sorry I don’t remember his name!). Check-in took less than 4 minutes, he apologized about our room being on a lower floor but that’s nothing he could control. We booked a one bedroom king suite and I was pleased with the size of this room! Huge, especially for NYC. Spotlessly clean, nicely decorated, and well situated. There’s a large living room area with a double pull out couch and TV, a separate bedroom with king bed and TV, decent closet and storage space, small kitchenette with large fridge and freezer, sink, cooktop, microwave, dishwasher, toaster, small coffeemaker, and basic cooking necessities (pots,pans, silverware, plates, bowls, glasses, mugs, etc.) Would be great for families staying for extended vacations as you could save a good bit of money by preparing meals in the room. Large windows with blackout shades overlooking the street in the bedroom and sitting room. There’s a safe in the room also. Bathroom is HUMONGOUS. Large sink area with plenty of space to store your toiletries, plenty of towels, hairdryer and a standard sized walk-in shower. Again, spotlessly clean. Neutrogena soap, shampoo, conditioner and lotion are all provided. The girls thought the pullout bed was comfortable enough and the king bed was super comfy. My suggestion would be to add a few more pillows for the pullout. There was only one with the sheet/blanket set. The lobby is beautiful with a fireplace, 24 hour coffee,tea, hot water, creamer, flavored creamers, etc. Coffee is quite good. Breakfast is a nice touch. There are plenty of options to choose from: scrambled eggs, turkey sausage, French toast, potatoes, oatmeal, cereals, yogurt, fresh fruit, all kinds of breads, bagels, and pastries. The employees keep everything replenished and clean. There’s also a rooftop observation deck, business center, laundry and free WiFi. I couldn’t figure out where the self-parking area is, I was on a time crunch, and it was rush hour so I just parked in a small valet garage down the street instead of taking another 30 minute drive around the block.I come to NYC about once a month and I’m happy to say I’ve found my new go-to hotel in the area. 12 minute walk to Broadway theatres and Times Square. Plenty of shopping and restaurants in the immediate area. Overall I’m extremely pleased and will definitely be returning.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: NY visit with my 23 and 18 year old children for Spring Break. Hotel was very clean, staff very friendly and helpful. Had a King room with sleep sofa. Hotel room was a little small for 3 people but that is typical for NY hotel rooms in this price range. My son said the sleep sofa was comfortable but be aware it was a twin size sleeper. Location was close to Times Square, Madison Square Garden, Penn Station, Broadway and more. There was a 7-11 convenience store just around the corner which came in handy. Would stay again.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I was surprised by the property being so nice. My room was large and well appointed (for a Homewood). The location is very good for any midtown attraction. There was a free breakfast that seemed very popular, although I didn't have time to use. Definitely will return if the rate is reasonable.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Words cannot express how impressed I was with this property! I arrived in town earlier than expected and was greeted with a cake, fruit, and sparkling cider for my birthday! I thought my husband somehow arranged this surprise but it was a wonderful guest service agent named AUDREEN! I can't state how this kind gesture warmed my heart. Our time at the property only got better as the days went on. Nicolas R. went above and beyond to ensure that we were enjoying our stay, another kind guest service rep assisted us in booking the hotel contracted airport service (GREAT VALUE- 20-minute drive w/ toll). I honestly was just blown away by the customer service. You can tell everyone on site really cared. Location was super convenient to everything! We cannot wait to visit again. THANK YOU!!!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: My wife and I were looking for a hotel that was walking distance from Penn Station. After reading numerous reviews the Homewood Suites seemed to have the best reviews. They seemed almost too good to be true. Well, we truly were pleased with this hotel. From the convenient location to the the very nice rooms that were impeccably clean. The staff was outstanding, especially Jackson who helped serve at the better than expected breakfast. We will stay at the Homewood Suites with our next trip to NYC.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Overall a great experience, check parking prices before arriving if your driving. Short walk to Madison Square Garden, Time Square, and Broadway. Great bars in the area. Highly recommend Lyft of uber to get around.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Recent stay to visit NYC. Very nice suite, plenty of room- bedroom, bathroom and living room, kitchen area. Vert good buffet breakfast. Stayed on street side- very noisy all night long, both inside and outside the Hotel.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I had a beautiful stay. Great room for NYC friendly staff. Good breakfast. Most importantly of note, while I was in town for business i left a money bag in the safe. It was returned promptly and with everything this in it!! Thank you to JL and his team for there honesty and professionalism.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I had to go to New York for a few days for work, and my aunt came with me. The room was very spacious for New York and I loved that there was no carpet. Very clean & the staff was very friendly! The breakfast was okay, but it’s free so don’t expect something too extravagant! Free coffee that is always available is a plus for me. Would love to stay here again!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: The hotel was close to everything, but the quiet location is perfect fora good night's sleep.The staff were friendly and helpful. The gym was available 24 hours and was clean and very well equipped. The breakfast was adequate!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Great service, no wait for room ,very clean I will definitely stay there again anytime I have something going on in Midtown Manhattan it’s very close to Hudson Yards The new Tourist attraction in Midtown

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We booked this hotel for my Partners 50th Birthday trip.The location was great for all attractions. Easy walk to the nearest subway (Penn Station), ample amount of restaurants, bars, cafes to eat in locally and supermarkets to bring hot or cold food back to the suite.The suite was ample size for 2 people with free tea and coffee.The hairdryer was powerful so no worries about bringing your own.The room was always kept clean and tidy by our maid, Ana Ramos, although we never saw her!!! and the staff at breakfast and in reception were always helpful and welcoming.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Daughters first trip to NYC and this hotel put us in a great location for walking and subway travel. Penn Station an easy walk away as well as wonderful restaurants. The breakfast served helped cut food expenses and was above the "normal" buffet.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Price was right, rooms extremely small for 3 people and bathroom tiny. Not sure why we would need a full size refrigerator and dishwasher and stove in the heart of Manhattan. Breakfast usual fare in morning, nothing special, nothing great. Grab a banana and a cup of coffee and skidoo. Central to subway and plenty of restaurants as well as Broadway.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: our stay at homewood was so wonderful! the service at breakfast was incredible every morning. a waitor named jackson went out of his way to make sure i had all that i needed since i have some food allergies. i am blown away!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: If traveler writing review 16 hours after checkout, than something special is in hotel like Homewood Suites by Hilton, stayed there with two children for a five nights. Those who rating this hotel under five stars, are in group of people, writing always negative reviews. They simply are people looking for something to be rated down. I am average traveller and Homewood was recommended from person, Hilton hotel owner in Florida. Everybody there is very kind, helpful, daytime and nighttime. I spoke with employee on frontdesk, house keepers, those who are cleaning night time, but no one of them responded me on negative way. Rooms are clean, people can relax and that kind of atmosphere goes up to travelers, so I met there interesting people too.We only flying from Iceland 5 hours and half to NYC. On that way we get many New Yorkers as a travelers and we from Iceland traveling there too. Reason more to recommend Homewood suite by HiltonDuring our traveling in NYC we walked a lot. What I noticed special on 37th West street and area of hotel in fact can´t see any police. It looks like they don´t need it. I have seen only one cop came due to illegal parked car.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Overall, a mixed bag though entire front staff was courteous and professional. Really felt welcomed from all. The pluses: location to Times Square and major transport hubs, large rooms, functional shower with great water pressure, kitchenette, fast elevators, excellent breakfast!! The scrambled eggs and tofu looking egg squares were amazing! Also central air/heat, good lighting and outlets. TV also modern and good picture quality. The negatives: very thin sheets, hard bed, no carpeting so floor was cold, unfortunate position of room was very close to the housekeeping cart, and neighbors could be heard easily near me in adjacent room and hallway.
