Just bad luck, as I’ve slept very well in other rooms here, and no more HH dinners on weeknights. Could not take a nap after work due to movement of housekeeping etc. Recommend overall.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Compliments to Audreen and the other staff members on the front desk. All very welcoming, friendly and helpful in particular Audreen. Front desk is large and in a comfortable space. Rooms are spacious and having the kitchenette gives more space and the option of using a full size fridge. Breakfast can be very busy so get in early. Well located hotel close to Penn station, Madison Square Garden and easy access to Times Square and the theatres. Would definitely stay there again.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Good place to stay, centrally located to midtown places, especially the convention center. Complementary breakfast was a deciding factor in choosing facility, staff was excellent, food items were just ok.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Myself and family stayed here during a business trip at the Jacob Javits convention center which is conveniently located just a few blocked down the street. Also so close to Times Square and tons a great restaurants. Extensive breakfast selection comfortable bed/rooms and extremely friendly staff. Maybe the best I’ve experienced in NYC on business. Highly recommend

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: My husband was in NYC for business and my daughter and I came along. When I booked the suite hotel through central reservation I was told it was going to be two rooms. When we arrived in was only one room. Also my husband had some issues with the printer in the business center. Both issues were handled well. The hotel is in a great location and close to everything. The breakfast was good. It was very quiet and the room was updated. The snack in the mini bar were included. The staff was great and were very helpful.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I want to share how satisfied you are with your OVERALL EXPERIENCE as a guest at the Homewood Suites Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South.Lot of things were on top such as Quality of SERVICE, Quality of ACCOMMODATIONS, staff service for our ARRIVAL and DEPARTURE,quality of the Breakfast. Special and dedicated thanks to Pedro (breakfast preparation team) for the quality of the breakfast and the whole service from 6 am to 10am. We will RECOMMEND this hotel to someone else for sure...

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We very much enjoyed our 3 night stay at this hotel. The hotel is clean and modern. The staff are very friendly and helpful, especially Nicole. The rooms were a good size for 4 people and the beds were super comfortable. We really liked the roof top patio. We enjoyed the free coffee/tea/hot chocolate throughout the day. The location was good, only a 4 minute walk to the subway and close to many attractions. We would definitely stay here again!!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We were in NYC to help our daughter move. The hotel location is central and the room price was excellent. Although in the center of things, the hotel was very quiet and conducive to a good night's sleep.
user_name:
Ray L
San Diego, United States

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Close proximity to Penn Station was the original reason that we booked this hotel, but the great staff and the nice rooms are why I will be coming back. We stayed mid week, so the hotel probably wasn't as busy as it would be on the weekends, by Friday morning (the day we left) the breakfast area was packed and getting an elevator to our (3rd) floor that wasn't full of people was a bit of a task. We stayed in one of the accessible suites, which was nice and spacious and allowed for easy maneuverability throughout. Our room had two queen beds as well as a small kitchenette area with a stove top, dishwasher, refrigerator and microwave. If we had really thought it through, these would have come in very handy!Close enough to Time Square and a lot of theaters you can easily walk to in about 10 minutes, and only a few blocks from Penn Station and the Port Authority Bus Terminal if you wanted to hop of the subway to go Uptown to Central Park or Downtown to the WTC Memorial (both of which we did).

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: While the location of this hotel definitely receives high marks, the real asset in this venue are the people who work there. We stayed several nights and the staff was unfailingly friendly and helpful. Our experience in that regard was well above average. The Hilton brand is well represented here. The quality of accommodations is good and includes a buffet breakfast bar. Food was OK but not on par with Hilton's very best offerings. The rooms are not spacious, but they are clean and comfortable. We liked having a kitchenette including full size fridge, sink, small stove top, and, a dishwasher in the room. Bathrooms have ample space and include a walk-in shower. Bedding was just right. Heating and air worked well. WiFi was excellent although users are forced to log on to the network multiple times per day- perhaps for better security. Elevators are busy and require a room key to get to any floor except the lobby level. That can slow down the process and has almost no security benefit but overall ride times were not excessive. The TV was flat screen with a large number of channels. Some channels suffered from buffering due we assume to network issues and one channel had voice over for the visually impaired that could not be muted. There is a small laundry on site where guests can wash and dry their clothes for $2.50 per load. They need a clothes rack for hanging up wrinkle free garments. There is a folding table. The fitness center is very nice.We enjoyed being centrally located in the garment district, not far from Times Square, the theater district, Madison Square Garden and Penn Station. With The Port Authority terminal and multiple subway stations nearby we found getting around the city pretty easy. There are Uber, Lyft and taxi rides for portal to portal travel although we like Dial 7 car service which is about as cheap or cheaper depending on the time of day, and, more reliably available.. There is a Brooklyn Fare grocery store close by as well as both Duane Reade and CVS pharmacies. Several banks have walk-in locations within a short walk. CityMD, a walk-in clinic, faces 8th Av between 33rd and 34th St, within easy walking distance. There are lots of restaurants nearby. We found the most visitor friendly place was the Essen Slow Fast Food restaurant on 8th Av and 36th St where you serve yourself buffet style just the kinds and amounts of food you want, then pay by the pound ($10.99). Their selection of freshly prepared food was impressive. They have a some seating but we usually brought our food back to the room as Essen was only a short walk away from the hotel. We will definitely stay at Homewood Suites again on a future visit. If you found this information helpful please click the link below to let us know.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Ideal central location .room was clean and comfortable ,staff were very friendly and accommodating buffet breakfast was delicious and constant complimentary self service hot drinks roof top access with a view

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: This property is very convenient to Penn Station. Located in Midtown Manhattan and close to Times Square. Tons of options for food and beverage. Hotel is clean and rooms are big for a NYC room. Have a small kitchenette and full size refrigerator is great. Free breakfast is good and you can easily get filled up. Area is very walkable, I've stayed in area many times.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Right where we wanted to be, near Times Square, Broadway, MSG. The room was clean, sharp and all in working order. The staff -- incredible. Friendly and attentive to our requests from a phone call before arrival through checking our bags so we could extend our last day in the city. Been a long time since every staff member we encountered on a trip was a 10 in service, but they were here.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Nothing fancy in this hotel, staff was wonderful, pricey for lack of amenities, close to MSG. Room was not ready for early check-in. Again staff was accommodating. Rooftop deck was neat. Kids ate the free breakfast and were content with it

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I love staying at this hotel when in NYC. The staff is so warm and helpful, the location is close to everything, rooms are clean and have mini kitchens, beds are very comfy, and all is modern w hardwood floors.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Excellent staff and service. Well organized, friendly and accommodating. Clean, updated room. We requested more towels, they arrived less than 5 minutes later. They sent a text shortly after check in to make sure everything was good.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Tamara was so kind and helpful when my girlfriends and I returned from a Peloton workout (exhausted and starving)!! Even though breakfast had just ended, she went out of her way to get some food and snacks. She was great!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: The hotel was beautiful! We walked in to a clean and spacious room with excellent decor and great amenities. The bathroom was gorgeous and had a tub for our baby which worked out great. The view of the city from our room was amazing enough but even more breathtaking from the rooftop! The gym was state of the art, WiFi worked great, breakfast was delicious... what more could we say?? Loved the place. The staff was courteous and helpfulas well and gave us great ideas of nearby activities! Can’t wait to go back!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Great location especially if you’re exploring the Garment District. Penn Station, Time Square among others are within a short walking distance. Paul S. is an amazing manager and should be commended for being personable and caring. We were able to check in early after a short wait. Room was clean and had some of my personal faves for a room: ceiling fan, hooks in the bathroom by the shower, foot rest in the shower, well-lit. Plugs by the bed were under the nightstand but not worth deducting a star. Also wish there was a fan in the bathroom but that tends to be rare in Hilton properties. Beds were comfortable and being on 21st floor resulted in no street noise. Breakfast was crowded and Paul was there helping move people along. I will definitely return.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Just arrived from a 3-night stay (February 18th-21st) It was an amazing hotel stay, from the moment at check-in, we arrived 4 hours earlier than the check-in time because our flight was a morning flight, without any hesitation or worries we got our room right away! The Lobby area is moden, warm and very welcoming. Room was spacious, had everything you needed. A nice washroom, nice and big Tv, great storage space, and not to forget one of the best kitchens to cook small things. Breakfast was included in the morning which is a big plus, very close to Time Square, around 10-15 minute walk, great pizza places around the area. They had coffee/Tea available 24/7 so it another plus! Elevators were fast, and the view from the 22nd floor is also very nice! Highly recommend this hotel and when I come back to New York, I will definitely stay here again.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We had a great stay. Very Clean room,very comfortable beds and friendly staff! Good breakfast! We were there for our NYFW presentation. The hotel provided us with a well priced conference room for us to organize and work in. Everything went smoothly! We will definitely stay here again!!!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Breakfast included, nice entrance, small convenience store in lobby, confortable bed. Free Wifi. Very friendly staff.If you have a convention in Javits center it is 5 minutes walk only. If you are not in a wheel chair, I would not recommande the room for someone with reduced mobility since the shower is not very pleasant.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Couldn't be better!! We spent 3 weeks here and our experience was AWESOME. We arrived after travelling for over 30 hours to be met with the wonderful Pranay whose cheerful manner made us feel totally at home. The rooms were very spacious and beautifully maintained (thank you to the incredible Elia who was the best housekeeper you could want for) and all the rest of the staff we interacted with were friendly, cheerful, reliable and most of all helpful. Beds were super comfy and venue was perfect for us as we spent most days at the theatre (easy walking distance super safe even at night) and the subway was really close as well. Right in the heart of everything but the hotel was quiet and felt like our own little oasis. All in all this was the perfect home away from home. We loved every minute. THANK YOU EVERYONE! We'll be back!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Super helpful staff, especially Jonathan who was always available to make my hotel experience the best possible. The attendance is excellent. I would definitely return to this hotel and would recommend it to everyone. My best regards to all of you, Homewood Suites New York Staff.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Clean, conveinent and economical hotel in the heart of New York City. I was surprised at the comfort and the accommodations at a hotel in the heart of midtown. A great find for the business traveler. I would highly recommend this hotel to everyone.
user_name:
Kevin C
New York City, New York

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We could not be more pleased with our stay at Homewood Suites. The staff was friendly and accommodating, the breakfast offered had lots of options, there was 24 hour coffee and hot chocolate and the location was close to subways as well as major tourist attractions. The room was spacious and had lots of amenities to make you really feel comfortable and was very clean! One thing I appreciated was how dark and quiet the room was because I am a very light sleeper. The large window in the room made me excited to wake up and open it every morning to look out on the beautiful city! This hotel truly made our stay in NYC that much better and I highly recommend Homewood Suites.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We visited New York in October 2017 as a family of 5. An excellent base for visiting very close to Time Square with lots of things to do in area, about 1/2 hour walk to Central Park. The Staff were excellent with great customer service. Rooms were spacious and very clean. Breakfast is good with free hot drinks in reception which is a great touch. Can't fault this hotel and will be staying there again on our next visit. Would highly recommend.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Booked this hotel for our first visit to New York. Was a really good choice. Good base in midtown Manhattan. The inclusive breakfast was fresh and plenty of choice. Free coffee in the foyer. Our room had a small kitchenette which was useful. Tea and coffee sachets were re-filled if you had used them. Free WiFi in our room. Staff were friendly and helpful. Our flight home was at 9pm, so there was a place to leave our suitcases and they booked our taxi back to the airport for us. Would definitely recommend this hotel.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: On the recommendation of a business associate, I decided to stay at Homewood Suites. The location was conveniently located near Javits for the National Stationery Show. The front desk was friendly, accommodating, informative and efficient. They stored our luggage at check-in and check-out, were helpful with restaurants and arranged for car service to JFK. The room was clean, quiet and comfortable. The kitchen was a bonus. Breakfast was included and there was coffee, tea and hot chocolate available at all times. The room rate was very reasonable. The only request would be a full-length mirror or another mirror outside the bathroom. Would definitely recommend this property and will stay there next year for the show.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Fabulously located for Javits trade shows, the Homewood Suites was a calm island in the middle of the garment District. Action and excitement right outside, and my tiny haven inside, the perfect way to travel.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: This place saved my whole NY experience after having to leave another hotel late at night. I was able to easily check into Homewood suites and Pranay made sure I liked my room and that everything was suitable and gave me great tips about navigating the city and restaurants. I got home last night after staying there for 5 nights and actually miss staying at this hotel. I loved that hot coffee, hot tea and hot cocoa was always available in the lobby. I loved that breakfast was always there when I woke up and always good. I didn't know anyone when I got to NY but everyone that worked at this hotel was so nice that I never felt alone and everyone made me feel at home. I enjoyed getting up and going to the gym every morning. I was able to walk to Times Square and the Javitz center very easily so saved money on taxis. This place truly made my trip so enjoyable and will definitely book here again since I come to NY each year for 1 week.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Cannot beat location, a few blocks from Penn station transit hub for subway, Amtrak and Long Island rail. The staff in hotel is very professional.Breakfast included is solidRooms have kitchenette, so it’s convenient for families and groceries
user_name:
Winslow2015
New York City, New York

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Very nice hotel at a very good price. You have good access to all midtown attractions and all transportation options. It's it's between Penn station and times square so it's close to all tourist attractions. They offer free breakfast and coffee all day which helped save money.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Pranay went above and beyond providing local information and dining advice. And he always had a warm welcome upon my return to the hotel. Jonathan coordinated some important shipping needs on short notice. Very impressed with the entire staff’s willingness and ability to assist me during my stay.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Fildy went above and beyond. He helped me look for a pair of stolen gloves, was gracious in his approach and attitude, and had a fantastic sense of humor. These little things are what make your stay memorable. Him and the entire front desk were terrific.
user_name:
malbertell
New York City, New York

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: The staff at this hotel was incredibly friendly and service oriented! When we checked in there was a little confusion because they had us booked into two rooms. I had only reserved one with two queen beds. Turns out the manager changed us to two adjoining rooms with queen beds because the room we were supposed to have had been smoked in by the previous occupant. He proactively took care of the problem (and believe me, it would have been a problem!). Rooms were very nice and clean with fridge, dishwasher and mini stove top and microwave. Unlike so many hotels I stay in the bathroom had multiple hooks for towels! Nothing drives me crazier than no hooks in the bathroom -- especially since I am a big believer in saving the planet and re-using towels. Breakfast is included and is a nice selection -- nothing fancy but solid good breakfast choices. Parking is very convenient close by -- a garage just three doors down for $45 a day.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: The room size was surprisingly large considering it’s external perception. The location was within walking distance of Time Square and the entertainment that I had anticipated to engage. I highly recommend this for my next visit!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I had an issue with my bank and Nicolas went above and beyond when he did not have to I am extremely pleased with his service,patients and just out right courtesy and willingness to help even when I was a little upset. I will definitely stay at the Homewood Garden midtown again.And a huge thanks to Nicolas Rambajue. You are truly a kind a soul.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: My wife and I decided to get away for a day or two and travel to NYC for what turned out to be the coldest days of the year, maybe decade. The staff couldn’t have been more helpful with superstars like Audreen, going out of her way to make our stay special. Room sizes were a great surprise and housekeeping does a great job.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: This is a wonderful hotel located convenient to the Broadway shows and lots or restaurants. The property offers spacious rooms with all the amenities you need away from home. We felt very safe at this location:)

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: The staff is very accommodating. The location is perfect. They will do your grocery shopping for you and deliver to your room!! If you want to shop for yourself, the store is just up the block. The room was very clean. The only complaint I have is the shower door in our room leaked, it really needs a new seal. Breakfast was good, a lot to choose from. Thanks, Homewood Suites for making our family trip to NYC memorable.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Very busy hotel, not surprising given their location between Times Sq and Central Park. One elevator was out of order which sounded like a recurring issue, and so it took a long time to get from room floor to lobby. Room was nice and clean and staff super friendly and helpful.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: This is an awesome hotel. Great location to all of NYC attractions. Exceptional service and cleanliness. The beds are comfortable and the rooms even have a fan. This helps when you just want to feel a gentle breeze.Free breakfast great place for family with kids.I highly recommend this place.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: absolutely love this hotel! It’s perfectly located in midtown manhattan. We’ve stayed here a dozen times and look forward to a dozen more. I happen to know the manager by name I’m there so much, Jonathan Lamitola is a sweetheart!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: This was a quick trip for us, so we didn't use all the features of this hotel, but I can say the staff was very friendly, the hotel and room were very clean, and the location was perfect! The hotel was just off 8th avenue, so it was not only convenient to several areas, but it was quiet being just off the bigger streets!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: This Homewood Suites is conveniently located 3 blocks from MSG/Penn Station, and only a short walk from Times Square and the Theatre District. The hotel and our room were well maintained, clean, and comfortable. The room was much smaller than the typical Homewood Suites room, which is typical for NYC. The staff were friendly and helpful. The floor plan was unusual with some of the rooms tucked behind the elevators, but elevator noise was not a problem. Avoid the second floor. It is open to the lobby and the breakfast area below, and lobby noise and breakfast noise can be disturbing. During the morning, we could clearly hear voices, kids yelling, and dishes clanging together. Breakfast itself was the typical hotel buffet. There were the usual hot dishes, breads, cereals, yogurts, fruits, etc. We found the breakfast to be well stocked and the food to reasonably good. We will definitely stay at this hotel again and are comfortable recommending it to other travelers.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We stayed in one of the rooms with a balcony/patio. It was wonderful & I’d definitely stay here again! Loved the kitchenette. Room was very comfortable. Friendly staff. Great location. No complaints at all.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: My friends and I stayed here for a fun night in the city. It began with a friendly and warm welcome from Paul and Julian. Paul was so accommodating and helpful to all our needs. He really made our stay all the more enjoyable. Anderson came to our room a few times to help us out with different things and always with a smile. We really enjoyed our stay! Nice accommodations, great friendly staff and a nice breakfast!Thank you! We would definitely return!!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Just returned home from a 4-night stay at this great property in the Garment District. I cannot say enough good things about this hotel! Easy to find, close to subway, food, shopping, shows. We were at Unifieds auditions and it was the best location for the audition studios Ripley Grier and Pearl. Our room was in the back and was actually quieter than my house in Florida! Clean room, attentive staff, quick elevators. Free breakfast is always a plus with a variety each day. Some of the food could have been a little tastier but we had purchased food for our suite so it was okay. Shout out to Nicole at the front desk who went above and beyond to help a stressed-out stage mom with headshots and resumes! We would definitely stay again for a vacation in NYC.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: The homewood suites lives up to its name. The staff are very courteous and friendly. They go out of their way to please. The room had very convenient amenities. There was a microwave, refrigerator and dishwasher to eat in. There was a desk to get work done. The suite provided space for guest. I liked how the sink and toilet were separate so different people in the suite can put on make up or brush your teeth while another person uses the shower or toilet. There were lots of plugs for charging electronics in very convenient places. The provided not only a complimentary breakfast but there was also a complimentary dinner on Thursday night. You could use “ to go” plates if you needed as well. The place made us feel at home.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Stood here twice fell in love with the property the first time.Great location I’ve been to many Hilton hotels and this takes the cake a great at home feeling. Big thanks to Audreen and JL You guys are the best.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I recently came to the Homewood suites over the holiday vacation and was extremely pleased with my experience. The hotel is ran excellently at every level, from house keepers to the managers all willing to do anything to make your experience a great one. Especially days after Christmas and right before New Years Eve in NYC, I was happily surprised to see how perfectly they were still able to run even during the busiest time of the year. The people at the front desk were extremely friendly and helpful, even with a lobby full of guests. I would heavily recommend the Hilton Homewood Suites in Midtown Manhattan, and I can confirm that staying here will give you an experience that feels like home.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Just stayed 2 nights at this lovely Hilton Property! I have stayed at many Hilton brands in the city and I have to say this is definitely the best! Staff is eager to help in anyway possible, the rooms are very large and extremely clean. Every time I walked in and out of the hotel the staff greeted me with a nice smile. I didn't get that dirty NYC feel at all from this property. I HIGHLY recommend this hotel to anyone visiting the city, also the location is excellent!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Stayed for 11 nights in November. Great location, easy walk to many attractions - Times Square, Rockefeller Centre, Macy’s, Broadway, Fifth Avenue, Bryant Park and Central Park. Penn station is close for trips on the subway. Staff were very friendly and always helpful. I booked a studio suite with balcony, room was a good size, very clean. Kitchenette with full size fridge/freezer, sink, stovetop and microwave all very handy for the times you want to self cater. Bed was very comfortable. Good sized bathroom with walk in shower and Neutrogena bath products. Room had plenty of wardrobe and draw storage. Other reviews here talk about slow lifts and not so good breakfast. I found the lifts fine and the breakfast was plentiful, cereals, bagels, muffins, danishes, toast, yogurts, fruit, scrambled eggs, turkey bacon and more - yes it gets busy, I found a seat most mornings. Laundry room very convenient and free coffee, tea and hot chocolate available 24/7 in the foyer is a nice touch. Staying in New York is very expensive and the Homewood Suites isn’t the cheapest nor the most expensive but it’s a good quality option, I would definitely consider staying here again.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: After travelling for a month straight with 12 bags, no sleep across 10 states, this was my last stop before getting home for Christmas. DESPITE being on a low floor (6), it was SILENT -EXACTLY WHAT I NEEDED. The staff was highly accommodating, nice suite, etc.The lobby was festive with a warm inviting fireplace and a Christmas tree.I WILL(!) BE BACK!!!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: The breakfast is really great. There is a egg with cheese made by chef Edu that is delicious! You need to try it. People are really kind. They always try to help you, also in the lobby they help me order food. I really enjoyedmy time there! Thank you

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Stayed here for 9 nights in December just before the holidays. Can't fault the hotel. Coming back to the complimentary tea/coffee in the lobby each day after siteseeing and shopping made our stay at the Homewood suites extra special. Rooms were clean. Breakfast was sufficient. Reception staff were lovely. Would highly recommend.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: This hotel couldn’t have been better for my mom, sisters and I. We had plenty of room, the breakfast was great to start the day! Free coffee/tea. The staff was friendly and helpful bringing anything we needed. Planning a return trip in the fall and I’ll be booking here again.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I spent the holidays at NYC at this hotel.We booked a premium suite with a sofá bed. The sofa ved was TERRIBLY uncomfortable, as the mattesses are old, they are thin and you can feel the springs when you lie down. I asked for a matress change but they said they did not have new ones, all they did was bring an extra one and put a down cover at the top to make it more confortable, it worked better, but still for the price you pay it is abaolutly wrong!! Room was clean and a bit more spacious than other NYC hotels. It has no carpet, instead it has wooden floor which makes it cleaner :) They serve coffee, tea and cocoa 24 hrs as an ammenitie which was great! Breakfast was included, the food area was very small and crowded for the amount of guests, and the worst, food was TERRIBLE, DISGUSTING!! The quality was horrible, they ran out of food fast, the flavor of eggs, fruit and pre-cooked food was very bad and poor quality. Hotel management should really pay attention in these details, I heard many people complain about the same.Costumer service was good, all cleaning staff were very friendly and willing to help.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Nice Hotel for getting about in New York. Good location. The staff was accommodating. The room is comfortable and spotlessly clean. Thumbs up to the fully equipped kitchen; however, the room is a little bit small for the Homewood’s standard, but we know New York is different. The elevators are fast. The fitness room is excellent! The breakfast area is adequate and the meal fulfilling. Free tea & coffee in reception all day is a nice plus. Thank you guys for taking care of my packages delivered in the hotel. We certainly recommend the Homewood Suites by Hilton New York Midtown Times Square.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We stayed at Homewood Suoted. Lovely stay. Generous teas coffees and all round service. Highly commendable. However, I have not ever had worse breakfasts in a similar establishment. Eggs like rubber sausages the same. Maybe we missing something but it was awful. If this is sorted. Magnificent Place
user_name:
Rajie M
Washington DC, District of Columbia

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Great Staff...Friendly, Knowledgeable, Attentive. Very Clean. The Hotel was booked to Capacity but the Service never lacked....thanks for making us remember why we always choose the Hilton family for all our hotel needs

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: This hotel was a great place for a family of five. They had two queen bed’s, a pull out couch, and were able to get us an extra mattress. The service was amazing. They were very quick to get us extra items we needed. My only criticism and a breakfast in the morning was a poor quality and was picked over. The coffee was often emptied. However we were there over a New Years during a busy time.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Great location that was super close to everything. Excellent staff that was super friendly and helpful. Hot tea and hot chocolate in lobby was an added bonus after being outside in the City all day. Enjoyed our stay here!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We had a very pleasant stay at the Mid-Town location. This is my third visit to this location and I have been pleased with the service and accommodations each time. It is located close to subway access but not directly over the subway so no train sounds on the lower levels. The rooms are very clean and have good amenities including a cooktop, microwave, refrigerator, and dishwasher.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Made a weekend trip to NYC for Christmas Eve to see the Rockettes, Ellis Island and skate Rockefeller Center. Location of the hotel made it easy to walk to every place we wanted to go - even the Subway to Battery Park. The breakfast offered was decent to hold us over for a late meal in the day - busy breakfast area with limited seating for the number of folks but found eating earlier rather than later gave us time to relax at a table. Staff worked hard to keep everyone happy - from maitenance to housekeeping and breakfast hosts to front desk - everyone was helpful and courteous. Thank you for a great weekend.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Highly Recommended!Booked 2 great rooms. 1 with balcony and a 1br suite. Family and guest was so impressed with hotel, rooms and the courteous staff. They treated us all so well like they wanted us to be there. Loved our stay. The rates were reasonable.
user_name:
wdasho
New York City, New York

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Perfect location, hotel staff was very nice and helpful. Rooms were very roomy and king size bed was so comfy. Very clean and food was good, only thing is they would run out early everyday. Breakfast was until 1030 so not everyone came at the same time. They wouldn't refill it.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: This is a good suites hotel which is neither glamorous or ritzy but perfectly functional and pleasant. We had a small “efficiency” on second floor for 1 adult and 2 teens - one king size bed and a sofa bed all pretty close together. Clean and tidy, the main bed was comfortable but apparently the sofa bed not so. Got more blankets from housekeeping to pad it out. Kitchen fully equipped if you wanted to cook, and a couple of pullout tables to eat at. Not with sofabed pulled out though! Our view was of a brick wall but didn’t matter as most of time we were in room we were sleeping. Bathroom absolutely fine - clean and newish, just a shower but toiletries provided. Safe, iron, tv, lots of sockets etc.Breakfast included which was a bit hit and miss. First morning was scrambled eggs and French toast, and as we were down at 7am, we could get a table and lots of food available. Good hearty breakfast - lots of bagels, toast, cereals etc. Fast forward to 3rd morning at 9am, when it was rammed, most of food gone (although I did notice them replenishing bagels etc at one point), nowhere to sit, and hot dishes were random - frittata with broccoli, tiny hash browns and chopped up unidentifiable meat. People also taking huge plates of food, either packing up in napkins, or discarding.Staff very friendly and helpfulWould definitely recommend (just get up early for breakfast)

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Excellent location!! Rooms are exceptionally clean and spacious, staff is friendly and helpful. Great place to stay with family. We have come here for the past several years, it is a Christmas tradition and we look forward to it every year!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Let me begin with the positives:Attractive, new in appearance hotel. Nicely decorated. They made sure we had a pull out bed for me teen son. Room was very quiet. Staff very nice and helpful. We had a few issues during our stay and the management was excellent with their service recovery.Negatives:Day one of breakfast at 10:00 am, breakfast ends at 10:30, no bread of any kind. No almonds for the oatmeal. No creamer for coffee. The eggs must have been powdered. Inedible. We skipped breakfast there the second day. Third day, went at 9:45. No eggs, no French toast, no creamer for coffee. We were looking forward to coffee and hot chocolate after a long day out in the cold the second evening. The water for hot chocolate was lukewarm, as well as the coffee.Our room was not cleaned properly, there was hair in the bathtub from prior guest.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Hotel is in fine shape. Close to subway and close to high end grocery Brooklyn Fare and close to Penn Station. Hotel gym is great as well. Rooms were very nice and the staff was very helpful and hard working. The rooftop terrace was nice.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Our family stayed at this establishment during the Christmas Holidays. It was very affordable, has a full kitchen, the location is near everything. I was able to cook a gumbo in the room and share with the staff. The staff was awesome, very friendly and helpful!!! Very clean establishment. I would recommend this hotel to anyone traveling with family.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Great clean room, friendly staff, and ideally located. Would definitely recommend for business or pleasure to all friends and family. It was a great location being only about 6 minutes from the Amtrak station. I look forward to staying there again.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Location, location, location!! Hotel is within walking distance of numerous major attractions: Time Square, MSG, Bryant Park, Macy’s, Penn Station, etc. Nice size room (2 queens). Breakfast was good (need a new toaster though). Friendly staff. Would certainly book this hotel again!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: My family and I just got home from a four-day stay at Homewood suites. This hotel was everything I thought it was going to be and more. I was very nervous to bring my toddler to New York. This hotel exceeded my fiancé and I’s expectations. It was so nice and luxurious, the staff was very courteous and helpful! especially, Jonathan who was emailing me before and during my stay with any questions or concerns I had. Everything was spic and span clean and very big. We had a Cityview king suite and it was amazing⭐️ Will definitely be back!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Stayed 2 nights. Room was spacious enough and very clean. Included breakfast was very simple so we opted to eat out. I would definitely stay here again. The elevators took long at times but that is expected.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Homewood Suites is convenient to times square, Penn Station, and Madison Square Garden. there are good places to eat nearby. The rooms are bit small, we had a room with a king bed and it was a bit cramped for my wife and I. In spite of that we would recommend this Hotel for anyone headed to NYC Mid-town area.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: AWESOME location which makes it easy to get to many major attractions. The rooms were super clean and the staff was ultra friendly. A lot of nearby parking but VERY costly to park there. Would stay there again.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: The hotel was very clean, with very caring and diligent staff. The room was kept clean and the breakfast was great. The lobby area is kept clean and welcoming. The staff really made our stay very comfortable Great location... Thanks!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Very nice suite hotel - our room was compact as they are in most NYC hotels but very nice modern decor and no noise from other rooms. We had a king bed with pull out for 17 year old and she was comfortable enough on the twin pull out.The hotel is a short walk to subways, Bryant Park, Empire State, Times Square and other sites. Free Breakfast offered a ton of selections with slightly different choices each day and sometimes the same day. Coffee, tea, and hot cocoa all day and night in lobby. Have stayed here twice and will again.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We've stayed here multiple times and each stay has been outstanding.The hotel is very clean and the location can't be beat. The service this trip was exceptional. Audreen checked us in and she's phenomenal- extremely efficient, warm and friendly. She's the best!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Amazing customer service by one of the managers J.L (Johnathan Lomotola) in this location. Looking forward to booking a future reservation at this location while in New York City on business. Thanks again!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: The location was perfect and within walking distance or a short Lyft ride of many major places to visit while staying in NYC. Breakfast being included was great although it was just ok. We stayed in a larger 2qn/sofa bed room which was a good size for a family of 5. The sofa bed isn’t very comfortable but for my kids it was fine. I appreciated the small kitchenette in the room as well. We would definitely stay this hotel again.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We stayed here for 5 nights, we arrived after travelling for 17 hours and the check in was quick and the receptionists were friendly and nice. Our room was on the 21st floor, very spacious and clean! Beds were so comfortable and had a brilliant sleep every night. There’s an open rooftop on the 22nd floor with great views of the city including the New Yorker hotel and high rise buildings from Times Square. Breakfast was included in our package and it was enough to start you off for the day. There’s a station with coffee, tea and hot cocoa 24 hours a day. You also get access to the gym. There’s a desk for broadway tickets, personally we didn’t use this but good to know! The hotel is very close to penn station, Empire State Building and Macy’s, about a 10 minute walk to Times Square. Very handy and convenient, would highly recommend and would stay here again.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Room was clean and comfortable and bed very comfy. Yummy breakfast with plenty of variety. Staff was helpful and very nice. Great location close to subway. Couldn't have asked for a better stay in the city.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: The hotel was very convenient to Time Square and the Subway. It was a trip for Christmas with the grandkids ages 11, 7, and 5. We felt safe and the kids loved the breakfast provided every morning. The beds were comfy and the room was very clean! In the evenings we sat by the fire in the lobby and enjoyed hot chocolate and coffee. Very kid friendly

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I had a weekend stay at Homewood suites for a Kentucky-Seton Hall basketball game. The room was very clean with a nice view of 37th street. The hotel has a good lobby and they provide coffee throughout the day and breakfast for guests. It was a great choice for being convenient to Madison Square Garden and Time Square. We had exceptional service by Audreen at the front desk. She was extremely friendly and assisted us with each of our needs.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Hotel is very convenient to Penn station and Javits center. The hotel Asst Manager is a great guy and very customer friendly. The entire staff really cares about your happiness. Rooms are clean and new. Love the wood floors (no old hotel carpet ick factor) and duvet/ sheets all white so again no ick factor. Stay there every year for Javits Ctr event.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: While we were told the check in was 4:00, the room wasn't ready until 5:30. The bedroom was quiet, but the sitting room with the pullout was very noisy. Good thing kids weren't with us to use that pullout bed or would never have slept.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We had a great New York experience and we really enjoyed the staff at our hotel. Everyone was very friendly and helpful. My only complaint would be the breakfast buffet. Unless you are the first ones there bright and early, the breakfast buffet runs out very quickly and the substituted items don't seem to be as "yummy" as the first offering. It was very nice having a breakfast of any sort to start our day though! It was very cold during Thanksgiving week so a bath tub or even a hot tub would have been awesome to come home to. I was pleasantly surprised at how quiet our hotel was even though it was at capacity- no annoying elevator button noises and I couldn't hear any early risers, doors shutting, etc. Thank you so much!!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I travel to Manhattan for work 4 times a year since 2015, and after 3 (or is if 4?) stays, I can consider Homewood Suites as my favorite so far. Great location (few blocks away from Times Square, Herald Square, and our NY office at Hudson Yard) yet quite; clean, comfortable, and spacious room (but TV on my last stay didn't work well), friendly and helpful staff, 24 hrs coffee and tea, breakfast .Jonathan and his team are nice and helpful.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I travel to NYC often for business and bring my wife with me as she see’s the sites. I have stayed here perhaps 10+ times. The location is excellent, 5 blocks to Madison Square Garden, Penn Station, Macy’s. Walking is 10 minutes to Time Square, Empire State Building, 20 minutes to Javits Convention Center, Radio City Music Hall, Rockefeller Center and Broadway shows. Walk towards 46th street area using 8th street for many restaurants near Broadway. 1 block from the Lincoln Tunnel, which bring you to New Jersey (parking garage is across the street). Rooms have great beds for sleeping, modern tiled floors, very clean and quiet. Hotel has fast elevators and friendly staff. Room rate includes breakfast, which is typical American style buffet (eggs, sausage or bacon), potatoes, fruit, bread types, etc.. Coffee, tea, and hot water service is free 24 hours. Comfortable sofas and tables are in the lobby, including a large natural gas fireplace.There are many Europeans staying here, who have commented to me about how much they like the hotel. To my Eruo friends New York City is huge. Subway is the way to get anywhere. 9/11, Wall Street, Statue of Liberty will need to be Subway, Uber/Lyft, or Taxi.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: My friends and I travel every year, sometimes multiple times a year to Manhattan. We have stayed and many of different hotels, and this one definitely stands out. Every employee that we encountered was so very helpful, and eager to help. The room was quiet, and very comfortable making for a good nights rest. The coffee bar in the lobby is such a treat, that we looked forward to it after long shopping days and early mornings. We will definitely be back here soon! Keep up the great work guys!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: This hotel was very nice for a recent stay in New York City. The rooms were modern and very clean, the staff was friendly. My only real complaint would be the breakfast that is included. It is difficult to find seating, and the options were not very good. If you are on the fence and the breakfast is a tipping point, be prepared to have to go out at least once during your stay.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We arrived at JFK to be greeted by the 4th worst snow blizzard to hit the eastern coast.Our journey from JFK to our hotel took 4.5hrs due to traffic congestion & weather conditions. We arrived at the hotel greeted by smiling hotel staff and were allocated a room on the 16th floor. The room was just as advertised, good size, no having to move out of the way to get past each other, room for suite cases, plenty of storage, mood lighting, flat screen television with cable & extra viewing channels/films, fridge freezer, coffee maker, microwave, cutlery, pans pots, plates cups etc etc everything was here.Extra large bed, acceptable pillows, (im super fussy over pillows) very comfortable.The ensuite was roomy enough, soap, shampoo conditioner, nice white towels (a selection of all sizes) flannels and a great shower in a roomy glazed cubicle.The only downside if anything was the forced air blown heating which bellowed out of the wall mounted grid but after walking miles around NY, one soon snoozed off.As it was approaching our birthdays the hotel suprised us with a bottle of sparkling cider,a bag of cashews, a tub of chocolate bites plus a $20 gift card to spend in the pub on the corrner of 8th avenue 37th street. Not bad eh! Well the morning breaky was great, a good choice of most breakfast choices to get you ready for another marathon hike around the many sites of NY. Some items on offer were a choice of eggs, boiled ,scrambled, toast, bagles,cereals, fruits, yoghurts, sausages, turkey bacon, fried potatoes, cakes, jams & a selection of hot drinks available 24/7.To sum up this hotel was in the right location, easy walking to times square, 10 mins,Macy's 5 mins, Empire State 10 mins, subway 3mins, shops, eateries, take aways everywhere, beer most places $8 per pint. Irish pubs can be found in most streets 5 minute walks between them, Central park 15 mins, ticket touts everywhere beware!A tip, take the Staten Island ferry from the east side ferry terminal its free! You can see the statue of liberty for free otherwise you pay tourist boat prices of $30 plus.Our hotel for the price, size of room, facilities, 3 lifts & hospitality was welcoming, friendly, helpfull, clean & tidy & well worth a visit.Tip, take a left outside the hotel 5 minutes walk to the banks of the Hudson river, see, the exhibition centre, ferry ports to various destinations & a massive USA navy aircraft carrier.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Best experience ever at a Hilton Property in NYC. Jonathan at the front desk was so awesome and very accommodating to our needs. LOVE THIS PROPERTY. So closed to everything, Times Square, Central Park, Macy's etc Priced just right.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Nice suite - kitchen fine with big fridge. Quiet - no street noise. Clean. Comfortable beds. Good breakfast. Reliable WiFi. Location great for Times Square, theaters, Central Park. Metro and bus close by

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: My stay was great. The room was very nice, comfortable, clean and the feel of home away from home. The location is perfect. Close to everything and in walking distance of the theater, restaurants and Rockefeller Center. The staff is very friendly and helpful. Great customer service. I highly recommend this hotel.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Checking out of this Hotel tomorrow following an eight-night stay as visiting our daughter who lives and works in New York. Our stay has been relaxing and enjoyable. All Staff have been really lovely, friendly, efficient and professional. We’ve felt really comfortable staying here and getting about in New York is no problem at all as centrally located. We would not hesitate at all in booking another stay here if we were return to New York.Thank you for such a lovely trouble free stay.
user_name:
Enairrol
New York City, New York

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We are Hilton Honors members and always look to stay at a Hilton property in NYC. This hotel was fairly new and the room was spacious with a full kitchenette. We asked to be moved after choosing a corner room because the view in the back of the hotel was dismal and dreary. They moved us to the front overlooking a nice apartment complex across the street with string lights on a large patio lit up at night. It was much better with more windows and lots of light. The staff was extremely accommodating and housekeeping left our room tidy and spotless. Breakfast was adequate and the washer/dryers in the basement were a lifesaver for about $2.50 per load. Really liked the hotel but surrounding scenery wasn't so great. However, it was centrally located and in walking distance of the theatre and Hell's Kitchen. We took the LIRR from JFK to Penn Station and walked to hotel. For the price, it's a good budget choice in crazy expensive NYC.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Loved everything about this hotel. Great rooms and plenty of space for an NYC hotel. The Mini Kitchen was a great feature and the laundry and fitness center were great. Would recommand to everyone who goes to NYC.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: This hotel is very nice. My room was clean and very spacious for NYC standards. The staff was wonderful, my room very tidy each day. The elevators are fast which is usually an issue with most city hotels.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Very well kept area and great accommodations. Good location in relation to Time square. The staff is friendly and always takes good care of the customers. Would highly recommend this hotel to anyone who is visiting the NYC area.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I had a most satisfying visit this past week at the Homewood Suites Hotel-times square south on W. 37th St. in New York City. The staff is courteous and professional and committed to providing the guest with the best possible experience! A special shout out to Junior, Stephanie, Jonathan, and Idris, all of whom made my two-day stay a pleasure.Thank you!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: When we first arrived at the hotel we were greeted by Nicole, a very friendly and helpful member of staff who got us checked in with ease and got our stay off to a great start. When we went up to our room it was much better than expected. Very spacious, clean and equipped with everything you could need for a stay in New York.The location of the hotel was ideal, situated between Madison Square Garden and Times Square. And easily in walking distance to many of the main attractions of New York. We easily walked to The Empire State Building, The Rockefeller Center, Broadway, Times Square, Grand Central Station and Central Park.The hotel had a roof terrace which had some lovely views of the surrounding area, we used this space to have a nice drink during the evenings.The complimentary breakfast was a good way to start the day with a buffet style breakfast that included a variety of cereals, fruit, muffins, bagels, toast and other pastry's. It also had a cooked breakfast section that changed from day to day which included an egg dish, meat dish and potato dish. The breakfast area was busier during the weekend but we always managed to get a table.When we checked out we were able to leave our bags at the hotel to be stored securely, without charge, and to arrange for a taxi to be ready when we were due to leave.We would recommend this hotel to anyone visiting New York.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: This was our place to escape the crowds. Free tea & coffee in reception all day is a real bonus when you come in from the cold, free marvellous breakfast which sets you up for the day and friendly staff! A few small thing could be improved which are:- extending breakfast times as we sometimes couldn’t not find a table so by giving people longer to eat you could serve everyone easier; - please fix the many wobbly tables; - perhaps add a kettle in the rooms for tea making as we didn’t want to heat a huge pan each time.But these are minor issues, the beds are comfy and large, showers hot and we didn’t even need the kitchen!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: The reviews were so excellent, we chose to stay here. They were all spot on. This was perfect for our women's weekend with 3 in the room. Having a refrigerator and glasses for our wine was awesome. The breakfast was delicious and constantly filled. One of us stayed an extra night and on our departure day (for 2 of us) the front desk called and said my friend didn't have to change rooms. We were able to leave our luggage in the room and go on a tour. That service was amazing and appreciated. I've been in the travel industry for 35 years and stayed at a wide range of hotels from 2-Star to 6 Star. This was 6 Star service. Pricing was also a great deal for NYC. Hard to find places that will take 3 in the room. We had king bed and single pullout sofa sleeper. Lovely lobby with great fireplace. Will recommend to all my friends.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Very high marks for this property. We were a party of four; myself, my and our two adult daughters. We wanted to economize and share the same room, but had some concerns about the usual compact room size in most Manhattan hotels. The Homewood Suites fit the bill perfectly. Our room was quite large and easily accommodated two queen size beds and our luggage. We did not feel cramped in the least. It also had an efficient, well stocked kitchen. The service was also excellent. Nicolas reached out to us via text shortly after our arrival to check our satisfaction with the room. We did express our concerns regarding the room's location which was directly across from the elevator. Nicholas was very understanding and offered to find another room for us if the noise level was unsatisfactory. Stephanie followed up with us the next morning to see how things went. As it turned out, our concerns were unfounded. Noise from the elevator or the accompanying traffic was non existent. A word of caution though. Our room did have a door to an adjacent connecting room. Through the door, we could clearly hear the occupants next door conversing in normal volume voices. This could have been an issue if the conversations continued late into the evening or were raucous. Fortunately for us, that was not the case. The location of this property was also excellent. Times Square, Bryant Park, Rockefeller Center and the theatre district were all within easy walking distance. So is Madison Square Garden and Penn Station with its access to the LIRR.If you're trying to save money, taking the AirTrain and LIRR back and forth from JFK (about 12 bucks) is on of the best values in Manhattan.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We selected this hotel on location and the "suite" facilities. We chose a king studio with balcony. The balcony would have been great had it not been November temperatures (too cold to use. The room was clean and well maintained. We had a toddler with us so with the hotel provided crib in place the room was quite confinedReception staff were good - Stephanie was outstanding (thank you to her).Housekeeping was good. There is a complimentary breakfast but it gets very busy. The items provided are basic but OKOverall I would recommend this hotel and would stay again

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Excellent breakfast with exceptional team members working in that area. The guest rooms are adequate size compared to other more expensive hotels in the area. Great location for theater, restaurant and shopping.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Everything was very clean, staff was courteous. The location was convenient to the subway and midtown attractions. The complementary breakfast was adequate but not quite up to the standards I have come to expect from Homewood Suites.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We stayed here for 10 days, All the staff were professional, receptionists, dinning room and house keepers. Even Mike the post man come odd job man. Thank you all so much, You all made our time there feel so at home. So helpful, friendly and they all had a bubbly sense of humour. Nothing was too much trouble. The hotel roof top was such a lovely place to sit and chill out with a drink. What a view. Our apartment was always so clean and restocked with toiletries and linen. The apartments were so well equipped, the laundry room was such a good asset and very cheap. The hot breakfast was perfect, as it gave us a good early start to the day and enabled us to save time and money by not stopping for lunch. The hot free tea/coffee and chocolate in the foyer to enjoy after a full day or evening out was such a lovely gesture too. This hotel may only be a 3* but it should be a 4* plus. It may not have been the poshest hotel that we have ever stayed in, but it was by far the nicest and one of the cleanest. Most certainly the best staff we have ever had. We would most certainly stay here again and definitely recommend it to any one. KEEP UP THE GREAT WORK. THANK YOU from Mike and Jac Tait

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Couple from Ohio in the city for a show at Madison Square Garden. Super quick walk to MSG even In the rain. Super friendly staff. Check in/out no problems. Parked car 3 buildings down across the street (1 minute walk) $45 for 24 hours. We were able to leave our luggage for free after check-out. The hotel is very busy in a good location. IT IS CLEAN!!THE COFFEE IS FREE 24/7 and GOOD!!BREAKFAST SELECTION WAS PERFECTOnly thing I found that could have been better is counter space / lighting / mirrors for getting ready to see a show

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Very nice property. Excellent Midtown location close to two main subway stations (30th pens station and 42nd port authority).Friendly and helpful staff, clean and comfortable common areas and carpet free rooms. Refurbished bedrooms with small kitchenette, flat TV screen and very nice bathroom with walk-in shower.Complimentary hot and cold buffet breakfast. The breakfast room can get very crowded but we always found a spot where to sit.The staff will store your bags at check in and check out if needed.On the 22nd floor there is a terrace with some chairs and small tables and also a small exercise room in the lower floor

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Outstanding personnel, service and accommodations. The hotel is about 3-4 blocks north of Penn Station (subway) and about 5-7 blocks from Time Square. It has been several years since our last visit to New York and I was looking for somewhere centrally located. The hotel is warm and inviting as soon as you enter, with a beautiful fireplace in the lobby. Check-n was quick and easy, I use Hilton's pre check-in and digital key so my room has already been selected and my "smart phone" operates as a room key. The room is "cozy" with a comfortable king bed and a kitchenette. Either the hotel has been recently remolded or is fairly new but everything in the room was in great condition. The staff continually sends out daily text messages to ensure you are enjoying your stay.The daily breakfast is busy and can be hard to find a table, but the staff works very diligently clearing tables and restock.I am a very picky traveler and I would not hesitate to stay here again.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Audreen at the Front Desk was super friendly and helpful! We came in around 12noon, not expecting for our room to be ready but she found one that was. It was nice since we had just gotten off a 10 hour flight.Rooms are junior suite style. I like that there is a dishwasher, microwave, and a sink. The only other Homewood Suites I stayed at never had that amenity.Rooftop views are amazing! I wish there was a bar up there. Nonetheless, it’s a good place to relax and talk stories.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: This hotel was in a great location, close to times square and a few blocks from the subway. They have a great complimentary breakfast and hot coffee available all day. The room we had was a perfect size for my husband and daughter and I. The staff was very friendly and professional, we plan to stay here on our next trip!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: nice hotel cleanvery very slow elevatorsthey don't have a bar which would have been nice but there are bars close bygood location nice staff an ok breakfast the pull out couch is not very comfortable

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Staff were as accommodate upon arrival and friendly. We were early and they found us a room fast. The hotel is immaculate. The room was spacious. The breakfast was good on Saturday and Sunday. The parking was great, good price and convenient. Were impressed and will be back.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I purchased some things online and have them delivered to the hotel, but unfortunately it didn't arrive on time before checking out. The hotel staff, Jonathan, went through the hassle of locating the package and safe-keep it so it can be picked up by my brother who will be visiting end of the year.He really went out his way to help me. I really appreciate the effort he put in. This to me is 5 star service. An experience no money can ever buy.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: My brothers and I gave my parents a night in NYC for their 40th Anniversary. FROZEN on Broadway and a Night at the Homewood Suites in Manhattan. Times Square South. They had an excellent time. They can't stop raving about it. From the time they arrived at the Front Desk to the time they departed they said all of the staff they met were so welcoming / warm / kind. The first person they met at the front Desk was Nicole. The room wasn't ready yet so Nicole took my mom's cell phone # and texted her once the room was ready. When they arrived back to the hotel, Nicole gave them a big welcome back, a Happy Anniversary and two bottles of complimentary water.When they got up to their room on the 15th floor there was a bottle of sparkling cider / popcorn / Hershey Kisses waiting for them in their room with a note. " True Love is Spending one Day getting married and the rest of your life feeling glad you did." When they texted me thanking me for the items in the room I said "I wasn't aware there was anything specific / special in the room" I believe the staff of the hotel put those items together for their arrival which was very kind / unexpected. The room itself was a good size for them. It was a King Studio Efficiency suite. I was worried it was going to be to small for them but they said it was the perfect size. Their room didn't have a spectacular view just views of other buildings / roof tops / etc... However when they went up to the 22nd floor they were able to see part of the Hudson River and other landmarks; they couldn't stop talking about the views from the roof. Breakfast: They did eat breakfast at the hotel. I believe they said it was busy so they had to wait a little bit until a table opened up. They also mentioned that the food could have been a little warmer but overall the food was good and definitely did not complain about a Complimentary Breakfast which I believe is not standard in a lot of hotels in bigger cities. Overall they give the hotel and their stay a 10/10. If they or anyone in our family / friends need a place to stay in NYC we will definitely recommend this hotel. Thank you from the bottom of my heart to the hotel staff for making my parents anniversary a memorable / enjoyable one and thank you for going above and beyond. WE WILL RETURN !!!!!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I spent the weekend in the city and came across this gem of a place. It's location originally attracted me, close to Penn Station and Madison Square Garden, but I was impressed the hotel as a whole.The staff is very friendly and helpful. The concierge can assist you with any directions and is spot on with recommendations on where to eat.The room was impeccably clean. I travel about 40 days a year take my own supply of cleaning wipes with me. They have come in so handy over the years. I was happy to see after my own cleaning ritual I found no dirt or grime.So in a nut shell, great location, great staff and great rooms.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I have to admit I can be a bit of a hotel snob, so staying at a Homewood Suites while in NYC was not my first choice...but a busy week made it hard to find an affordable room. That being said, this place FAR exceeded my expectations. Shout out to Audreen at the front desk who provided not just a warm welcome, but a friendly and familiar face throughout my 3 days there. She really seemed to genuinely care about her guests....always taking a minute to say hi when passing through the lobby. The building itself is new, modern, and clean. The small lobby was very nice and the room was well appointed. Just as nice as a number of "hip" boutique hotels I've stayed in. If you're used to a typical non-NYC Homewood Suites, prepared for it to feel small. Size-wise it was really good for NYC. Props to the housekeeping team - my room was impeccably cleaned everyday. Location can't be beat...a couple blocks in one direction to Penn Station, a couple the other direction to Times Square. Tons of food options and pretty much anything you need right there. Subway just 2 blocks. This Homewood Suites gets an A+ from me!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: The room was amazing! Huge with lots of room to spread out, a large fridge, sink, microwave and a great bathroom. Coffee all day in the lobby. Breakfast free in the morning and a rooftop terrace (no bar ) . I was amazed at how great it was! The front desk staff was amazing too.
user_name:
B7819WEbarbarac
Washington DC, District of Columbia

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Our work group stayed here for a recent convention and the location is perfect for easy walking distance to the Javit Centre. Immaculately clean rooms with a mini kitchen that's got everything. All the conveniences for a business stay and close to the heart of mid town.Only two small criticisms. Housekeeping was a bit hit and miss when it came to replenishing toiletry supplies and the common areas outside the lifts were seriously over heated. Breakfast was reasonable and included in the room rate. Would definitely stay here again for future work visits.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: The hotel was clean and location is great. Staff is friendly and helpful and there is coffee available in the lobby 24/7. Fitness center is ok, lacking some weight training equipment (there would be space). On negative side the breakfast is quite simple and there is very little healthy choices available- missed some protein and stuff without sugar. If you get a room on 2nd floor, the lobby sounds can reach your room but this was not too bad.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: This is the 2nd year I have stayed at this hotel during a convention at Javits. The location is great. But the reason I came back is the hotel. Great vibe amongst the staff. Outstanding rooms. This place makes you feel good about being at the hotel. Special shout out to Audreen on check in. Super helpful.
user_name:
Todd E
State College, Pennsylvania, United States

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We stayed for 4 nights. Lovely clean room and comfy bed. Disappointed they could not offer me twin beds but the king was huge and comfy. Staff nice and building felt safe.
