The buffet breakfast was quite limited - no Danish or pastries and the eggs were tiny squares of very dry egg; there was no bacon - it was really not very appealing but for those in a hurry - it served its purpose. I will definitely stay there again and look forward to it.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I think finding good affordable accommodation in New york is really hard as you need quite a lot of money to get something half decent. but this I think is excellent so no wonder my company uses this for all staff every time. They are not massive rooms as not many NY rooms are but I would say a little bigger than average, the staff are friendly, its very clean and feels quite cosy and the rooms are equipped with fridge and cooker and freezer etc, so this was so handy for us with our baby. I would stay again and at $115 a night think its great value and the location is very central (near Times Square). Not an area I like but an area handy for seeing NY and near my office!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Brilliant base to explore everything, hotel is clean , comfy beds, lovely staff and a good breakfast, tea and coffee available all day to guests. Nice big rooms and a descent shower , we had a fabulous stay here would highly recommend

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We stayed here for "unified" auditions---the auditions for BFA programs. Incredibly close to two of the audition studios---and easy to get to the others. Perfect to have a kitchen so we could just grab stuff and eat back at the hotel. The staff was always extremely friendly. My one suggestion: it would make things SO MUCH EASIER to have a coin change machine in the laundry room along with a soap machine. I brought my own detergent but it would have been nice to be able to get the $2.50 in quarters (x2 so $5 in total) without having to go to the desk.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Just spent 4 fantastic nights at this location. Faultless and ticked all our boxes. Great value, service, location, breakfast and importantly room. Staff were awesome and especially the ones helping at breakfast. The free 24/7 coffee /tea station is a nice touch. Highly recommend and would absolutely return.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: The Homewood Suites hotel is a relatively new, modern all- suites hotel. Even a studio suite is roomy & fully equipped - including a full kitchen. A full hot buffet breakfast is included - more than adequate in a nice breakfast room. Coffee & tea are available in the lobby all day & night. The staff are friendly It is conveniently located between Penn Station & the Port Authority Terminal. It has a nice fitness facility. And the elevators are very efficient- much better than the older hotels in the area.My only complaint is about the “heating” system. I had cold air blowing in my face all night even though I fiddled with the thermostat & fan. I finally gave up & turned the system off.The hotel is relatively inexpensive- overall a very good cost performance choice.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We stayed here for four nights over Christmas. The lobby is lovely and there is access to tea, coffee and hot chocolate whenever you want it, even outside of meal times. The breakfast was good and although it gets very busy in the restaurant/lobby area we somehow never had a problem finding a table for our party of 4. There are three lifts but you might be waiting a while for them during the busier times!The room was very clean and the bed comfortable. There was a safe and a hairdryer and I think an iron and ironing board although we didn't use these. We didn't have much of a view from our hotel window but that didn't bother us as it was always dark by the time we got back to the room in the evening. Fast complimentary WiFi in the room as well. The only thing I will say is that the fridge was quite loud but we were so tired at night it didn't wake us up!The staff were really friendly and polite and they booked us a taxi to the airport for when it was time to leave. The hotel is very easy to get to from JFK. You get the AirTrain to Jamaica Station and then get the train from Jamaica to Penn Station. It's a short walk from here.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Location was great! Broadway, Times Square, and Rockefeller Center we’re walking distance. We even walked to St. Patrick’s Cathedral. The hotel staff were all friendly and helpful. Hot breakfast was great as well! We will definitely book this hotel again next time we come back to New York.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I am a NYer. A few days before xmas our bldg had a water issue and, with a very good rate, I decided to stay here as a stress reliever. (Spouse thought I was nuts) The lobby is quite lovely with lots of seating, coffee/tea station and a refreshing water wall. Check in was easy. The room was tight but fine for one. Nice bed and bathroom. My view was of closely neighboring buildings with windows looking into my room so had to draw drapes. Not great, but ok for a mini staycation. Tourists would be unhappy with that view. Breakfast food was fine, but it was a real zoo. Not enough seating for the guests, despite people sharing tables. Staff working hard to keep up.The neighborhood is fine, as in safe, with several other hotels on the block. You are several blocks from Macy's and have access to busses and subways within a couple of blocks. But 8th Ave is still pretty seedy with few restaurants in the immediate area. There are places. Ask the desk for suggestions. At the right price, I would recommend this hotel to family or friends visiting the City. With bfast included, can help keep NYC costs under control.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We stayed here 3 years ago and were very happy to return. However, it's not as good as last time. We were there from late December to mid January and clearly the hotel couldn't cope with it being full. The difference over that time was huge.- Getting to breakfast at 10.15 was a huge mistake as the food was basically almost all gone and not replenished even though service was to be until 10.30. Don't even thing about trying to find a seat in the dining room- there are 3 lifts for all guests plus staff. One day it took me 15 minutes to get to the ground floor whilst I waited for a lift that stopped and/or wasn't full- the lobby area looked like a train station waiting room, and at breakfast it was full of people eating and the dining area was full.Once the hoards had left it was much easier to get to breakfast, have use of lifts and general amenities. However, other things have changed e.g. no buffet dinner included but daily rate hasn't changed and facilities in the room such as toilet paper and tea/coffee are the cheapest on the market. And please fix the room doors - they all self close with a slam and I got tired of being woken by slamming doors (especially the store room doors).When you are paying this much per night I expect better.Having said all of this, the location is still great and the rooms are very comfortable but I'd avoid peak times to stay again.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: The girl is in a great location. The staff are wonderful. Sleeper sofa mattress need to be upgraded. The food area is small; minimal choice of hot food. The rooms are beautifully decorated and clean. If you have any issues supervisor Stephon meadows is great

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Enjoyed our extended winter break in the city. Staying at Homewoods was TOP, everything from check in with the ladies, as late as it was when we arrived they made us feel extremely at home. Both rooms were just right with space and layout, bigger than expected.Nicolas the manager was a true extension of making sure all was taking care of each day-100% AWESOME WORK.Location, location, location of the hotel was great, from taking the subway or other means of transportation. It was always something to do or eat nearbyDEFINITELY love for the city and love of this hotel- will be staying here next time we visit!!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: The hotel and service is great, thanks Wedin Santos for helping me recover the things I forgot in room 1206, I want to come back soon!On each trip I make this year, I will stay at Hilton Hotels & Resorts.
user_name:
Mariela L
Playa del Carmen, Mexico

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: The hotel is pretty well located, close to several metro stations and to the Penn station. Room was big, with a double size bed plus sofa, bathroom and kitchenette. The service was ok and it was really convenient to have the breakfast included and the 24 hours coffee station... specially when the temperature outside was below -15C ❄️⛄️.We got an extra charge for “premium” internet which we didn’t request and didn’t use, but it was removed from the bill although with a “just for this time” comment

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: This hotel may not be 5 stars in everyone’s book, but the 2 Queen suite was a bargain for our family of 5 since we would rather spend our money on doing fun things (and our son doesn’t care about the comfort of the foldout bed). It’s conveniently located, clean, friendly staff, free breakfast, & the room layout makes good use of the square footage. Also liked having the fridge and microwave/stove for leftovers.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We stayed at the Homewood Suites on West 37th near 8th Avenue for an overnight in New York City. We had found a great weekend special. The hotel is 22 stories tall and has about 15 rooms per floor. It is a short distance to Penn Station and Times Square. The rooms are very modern and utilitarian, but designed with all the essentials. There is a small kitchen unit with two burners, microwave, dishwasher, and refrigerator. The room had a king size bed, a small couch, a desk, and a closet. It was quiet. The hotel appears busy with a quick turnover of patrons. The bathroom was clean, but had a somewhat well used look. Breakfast was included with the price of the room. It was buffet style and more than adequate. We were there at 6 AM, so there was no line and plenty of food. The only complaint was that the food in the chaffing dishes was not hot. We stayed at the Homewood Suites during the severe cold. The lobby is not designed for this kind of weather and each time the automatic sliding door opened, there was a blast of very cold air that penetrated through the whole first floor. You really needed a coat if you were going to sit long in the lobby. The key card system was not working and staff had to let us back into our room each time we both went out. The staff was very courteous and pleasant. We were very impressed by this!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Hotel was close to everything. Rooms were spacious and clean and staff were very friendly and accommodating. Only complaint was breakfast buffet a nightmare. No seats, foods run out. Really frustrating. So don’t plan on breakfast there. Other than that it was perfect.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Situated about 15 min walk from Time Square and other main attractions. Friendly and pleasant staff. Rooms clean and had cooker, fridge freezer, microwave so great if you had a small family or wanted to save some money. Breakfast included which was adequate for most people. Tea and coffee available 24/7. Near train station and subway. A great place to use as a base to explore New York.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I loved everything about this hotel. The staff was very friendly and helpful, the breakfast was delicious and the room itself was comfortable and it had everything inside to make my vacation better. I would definitely stay there again!.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Good size room for NYC and good location. A bit of a walk to the nearest subway terminal but not too bad. Clean rooms and friendly staff and a good breakfast. Fast elevator too...after staying in NYC in a hotel with a painfully slow elevator, this was appreciated.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Nicolas -Operation supervisor Great customer service. Told him about the bad experience with concierge and he stepped up to bat and took care of us. And provided us with great knowledge of Statue of Liberty & 9/11 Memorial. Thank You Nicolas.Front desk staff was always pleasant & amazing. Always greeting you when you come and go.Free Breakfast everyday 6-1030am. Typical hot eggs, meat and potato’s with bagel & toast, cereal, pastries and fruit.This hotel is pretty central, can walk most places. Otherwise you can always call uBer.Fresh cookies early evening, but they go fast.The room is spacious. We were in 1711 (faces front of building). Windows do a good job keeping noises down.Bed was comfortable, TV, couch, in room safe. Small kitchenette (Fridge, microwave, coffee pot, stovetop, pots and dishes.) floors were laminate which we enjoyed. Decent size closet and good size bathroom that was updated. Room also has a ceiling fan with light. Room also has a desk with several electrical outlets.This location is walking distance to Madison Square Garden, few blocks. Several restaurants near by. You can definitely walk to Times Square & Central Park, it is a bit far but it is doable. We have walked at all hours all around, no safety concerns, however always be alert. 7-11 at the corner for snacks.Ivette at front desk awesome. Always welcoming and nice.We would definitely stay here again.This hotel is located in the Garment District. You are on W 37th Street between 8th & 9th Ave. W 37th is a one way street from 8th Ave to 9th Ave.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I am stuck here for a other night in the worst hotel I have stayed at in the past 3 weeks in USA and Canada.The only positive is you cant hear street noise, but you can hear the next room and people in the corridor and lifts. Rooms are tiny, we are travelling with 3 adults and there is no room so I dont know how families with young kids fit. Breakfast was packed and slow to refill stations, people were sitting wherever they could find a seat and those that tried to take their breakfast back to their rooms because no seats left were told off. Also they dont bother to refill tbag station and I havent seen a normal black/english bfast tbag yet...even at 6am when bfast opens..Customer service is poor and you are it appears main objective is to maximise profit by minimising service. Also, the cleaning cart was left outside of our room for a day, not appealing and blocks 3 rooms from easy exit in an emergency. You are not getting what you pay for. Only booked here because of trip advisor rating, but am now wondering if the positive ratings are from parents of the naughty kids and dog owners that populate the lobby.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: This was our first trip to NYC as a family. A friend recommended this hotel and we’re so glad she did. Everything was perfect from the time we checked in until the time we left. Our room was small which was fine because we were really only in there to sleep anyway. It had a kitchenette with a good sized refrigerator, stove, plates and utensils if you’re planning on doing any cooking in the room. There was a fold out sofa which was really the size of a chair. Only one of my kids could sleep in it and they’re 7, 9, and 11. Whenever we asked for something such as extra towels or blankets they were at our door within minutes. The room was clean and the staff was so very friendly. Checkout is 12 which is nice because the kids were exhausted after all the walking. We didn’t leave until 4 so they stored our bags for us until we left. We would absolutely stay here again. Thanks for everything!!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Wonderful family stay in a perfect location! Staff was kind, courteous and helpful at every step. Complimentary breakfast was a perfect start to our day. Amazing hotel to come back to after a day of sightseeing. Would definitely come back again.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Convenient and spotless, with excellent service all around, this is a hotel we would definitely go back to when we’re traveling with our family. Also pet friendly! The staff were amazing, and the daily breakfast so convenient.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Our stay at this homewood suites was fantastic! The location is only a couple blocks from all of the main tourist attractions but slightly removed enough not to be to chaotic. The room was very quite and we never heard the streets or foot traffic in the halls. The beds were comfortable. Only small thing was the shower flooded our bathroom but we had extra towels to remedy this problem. We didn’t need it, but there was a full size fridge, microwave, and stove top. Overall was exactly what we needed for my first trip to new york

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Small but functional rooms with full kitchen. Free hot breakfast, but limited seating area. Good location with easy access to Times Square. Nice courtyard on the top floor with good views (can see the top of the Empire State building. Overall very good value.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We stayed at Homewood Suites New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square for 10 nights on our honeymoon in August/September 2017. We chose the hotel largely due to its location and we were definitely not disappointed - we were right in the heart of all the action in Midtown, a short stroll to the magnificent Times Square and a couple of metro stations very conveniently located nearby. The hotel itself was everything we wanted - the room was sufficiently sized so that we could both easily fit our very large suitcases, with plenty of hanging space in the wardrobe and an all-important full length mirror too. The bathroom and shower were spacious and the room was always impeccably made up when we returned home after a big day of exploring NYC. My husband also liked the free cookies that we sometimes managed to get back in time for in the late afternoon!The staff were always friendly and accommodating, and we always felt safe and secure entering the hotel. Sometimes there were some colourful people hanging around the street near the entrance to the hotel, but they were generally harmless. A great little coffee spot down the road (Madman Espresso) was my husband's first stop of the day, occasionally bringing a takeaway back to the hotel to enjoy with his breakfast, which was also a highlight for me - granola with fresh yoghurt, turkey patties (very foreign to us Australians but very delicious!), 'tater tots' and fruit to go. When looking at value for money, we were not disappointed and would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a mid-range hotel in Manhattan.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We got an early check in. That was appreciated. Thanks. Nice clean comfortable room/suite. The hotel is within walking distance of steward Airport. Hotel offers a shuttle. I lost my headphones in shuttle and driver of shuttle came looking for me to go give it to . I was so surprised and thankful.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: My husband, daughter and I stayed here from December 23-25. My husband and I have been to nyc before and said we wouldn’t stay near Times Square again, but we booked this hotel as our daughter wanted to be near the action for her first trip. I’m glad we did, because this hotel was wonderful. The staff were all so friendly, from front desk to the cleaning staff, the room was small but very clean and well laid out with a kitchenette. We loved the rooftop area, where there is some seating to enjoy the view. There is always free coffee and hot chocolate in the lobby which is a nice touch as well. They have 3 elevators, so you’re never waiting long to get to/from your room. The location is great as you’re close to Times Square, but not smack in the middle of it. We could easily walk there, but it was nice being outside of the crowded area. Upon check out on Christmas Day, we were given little boxes of chocolates and my daughter received a book from the hotel as a gift as well. All in all, we were very impressed with this hotel, and the price was extremely fair. We will definitely keep this place in mind for our next trip to NYC!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: For myself and my two older children, this was the perfect place to stay. It was a great location for us as it was quiet, yet it was only 3 blocks from the closest subway station as well as Times Square. The staff was approachable and willing to help as soon as you requested anything (from reception, to food service, to housekeeping). The value for the location was much lower than other hotels within blocks of Homewood. Would stay again; highly recommended.
user_name:
Donna P
Virginia Beach, United States

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We stayed here in mid-December. We were traveling with another family and it was a great price for the time of year we were going (Christmas).Pros: Modern, clean, friendly staff, willing to accommodate (needed an air mattress and they found us a room next to our friends), easy walk to Time Square (1/2 mile). Free breakfastCons: small room if you have older kids. We're a family of 4 with a 12 and 8 yr old. The pull out couch is a single. We ended up getting an air mattress. It was a tight fit for all of us. The free breakfast is nice, but there's not a lot of variety and it's PACKED in the morning (hard to find a place to sit).Overall, it's a hotel I would recommend, but not sure we'd stay again simple because it was cramped.
user_name:
camry Y
Metro Minneapolis-Saint Paul, Minnesota

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Hotel was excellent. Great location- easy to walk to major attractions and to subway and train station. Breakfast and coffee just ok- not great Room was big enough for family of five with 3 teens. Hotel staff very friendly, helpful in terms of answering questions. They recommended Lyft car service to us which turned out to be very helpful and only a little more $ than subway cost for 5.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: This is by far the best room we have had for this price range in New York City. The staff from the front desk to the maintenance staff in the halls were the friendliest we have ever encountered. Rooms are spacious with a fridge and stove top. We will be back for sure!!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We booked 2 suites in this hotel. We split the family up into a group of 3 and 2. The rooms are very small (normal for NYC) and generally have a king size bed and a pull out. This is meant to be for up to 3 people. It was not big enough for me and we had requested 2 beds in each room but did not get them as apparently they only have a limited number of rooms with this layout. So our 2 person room was very uncomfortable.Breakfast was included and the food is not bad but there are simply not enough tables which means you are hanging around for a while waiting to grab a table, This is never too easy when there are 5 of you. They have 3 lifts - you'd think that was enough? You'd be wrong over the 4 days we were there we always squashed into a lift with at least 6 others. Not the end of the world but it was annoying and made it all feel too busy,All of that is negative. On the plus side the staff are very good and work very hard especially the breakfast crew who are constantly on the go cleaning the tables that people are waiting for. The hotel is clean and every request for extra towels was met quickly and efficiently. The location is very convenient for the subways and walking to Times Square is a no more than 10-15 minutes. If you are a family looking for a budget stay in NYC with no frills then this is better than most. In short a base to explore NYC from then this is fine. If you want a few more hotel 'type' facilities then don't book.So yes it was poor and only 2* for us but of our kids were younger - less than 10 then it would have been fine.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Place is extremely clean and all staff friendly and helpful. Was shocked they eliminated the evening welcome but still an overall good experience. The breakfast was good and its nice to have selection of coffee tea and hot cocoa all night
user_name:
U2990YKseank
New York City, New York

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Great value and great breakfast, great location. Would recommend to anyone. Will probably stay there again. Clean room. Short walk to some major attractions. Close to Jacob Javits center. Happy to have been there

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Stayed three nights at this hotel. The staff was very accommodating and friendly. The rooms were very clean and comfortable. I loved this hotel. Just a couple of blocks from Times Square and all the other tourists locations. The room was very spacious and quite. They have an excellent breakfast bar. I would definitely stay here again.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Location of property is wonderful we were able to walk to all and see the sights. The staff we encountered were friendly and knowledgeable about attractions in the area. The hotel was quiet at night and beds comfortable breakfast was a great bonus in the morning

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: The room was compact, very well equipped, spotless and the staff you couldn't fault. WE had a fabulous time in NYC and this was mainly due to the hotel and the location, we would ghighly recommend the hotel.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We stayed here with our two older children. The suite we stayed in had plenty of room for the four of us. The room was spotlessly clean with modern amenities. The staff we encountered were helpful and friendly. The location is great. It is walking distance from Penn station and offers easy access to the area of Manhattan that tourists would want to spend the majority of their time exploring.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: The hotel is located in a perfect Manhattan location just a short walk from Penn Station. Was a little disappointed in the TV reception. It kept going out every minute or so. For $400 a night, I expect better. The staff said it was a known problem. There also aren’t enough elevators for the hotel. It took a long time to get an elevator from the floors to the lobby. Breakfast was good with plenty of food selections.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: This hotel is in a great location for all the Midtown attractions. The rooms were of a good size and we found that there was very little traffic noise outside. The staff were all extremely professional and courteous at all times. The breakfast was hit and miss.The cold choices (cereals, fruit, yoghurt pastries etc.) were OK, but the hot food wasn't great. Overall though we would recommend this shovel and gladly stay there again.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: 1/2 mile from Times Square. Very reasonable, especially with breakfast included. Rooms are very clean and staff was great! Most of everything you want to see is within walking distance, including the subway and MSG.
user_name:
James R R
Dallas, United States

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: we loved the property! the location was perfect, the room was big enough with a small kitchen and very clean! the beds and the pillows were great!! There was coffee and tea supplies at the lobby 24/7! very close to the subway! close to everything! We would stay there again!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Loved the amenities and location of Homewood. Steps from Times Square and MSG. 24-hour coffee, tea and hot chocolste by the lobby fireplace was a definite plus! Breakfast left a lot to be desired but the rooftop balcony made up for it!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Our suite was strangely laid out, but nice. Bring earplugs if you have an adjoining room, because there's more noise than you'd expect. But the location is great for running around Midtown Manhattan, and it's nice to have a hot beverage around the fireplace in the lobby.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I’m considered a germ aphrodisiac. Anita in the housekeeping department did an amazing job with my room. After day one, I felt so comfortable with diving on the bed after a long day. Seeing her card, i knew everything would be completely clean and might be even better than I do in my own home. Because of people like you, I will always return to your hotel when I travel to Schenectady.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We booked 2 rooms for our family and friends annual New York Christmas trip. We had 2 queen beds and a sleeper sofa. This hotel is excellent !!!. The rooms are large by New York standards. We had a kitchenette but didn't use it. The sleeper sofa only sleeps 1 person. The room had a lot of electrical outlets to plug in your devices. The staff was extremely friendly and helpful. The breakfast was very good. No need to buy breakfast some where else. I'd prefer a little different location for the places we like to frequent but overall it's very good. If their was a subway stop on the block it would make a huge difference and would make the location even better. When you've been walking all day and your ready to go back to the hotel you don't feel like even walking a few short blocks from closest subway stop to the hotel. It's not a deal breaker though. I'll be booking our hotel for next years trip soon and this hotel will definitely be at or near the top of My list.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Excellent in every way. We were most pleased wtih the location, the awesome staff, the excellent free hot breakfast, 24/7 beverage bar, afternoon cookies, cleanliness of rooms and all areas, overall experience!!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Great Location easy check in and out and a great staff. The rooms was great, nice bed, great bathroom and the kitchenette was great bonus. The roof top patio offered some great views of New York. Easy access to all the different sites that NYC has to offer, Highly Recommended.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: In for a 2-night business trip, this was my first stay at this Hilton "suite" property. I wouldn't actually call the rooms suites, but by New York standards, the rooms are, well, roomy. Kitchenette, sofa, desk, king bed, ample-sized bathroom, and plenty of room to navigate around the room.The bed was comfortable and the towels were plush enough. The room was clean, and the maid service very nice.Check-in was a breeze. Staff is friendly. The breakfast buffet was about as nice as one could expect.My destination both days was the Javitz Convention Center, which is an easy 2 1/2 long block walk up 37th - about ten minutes. The hotel is very convenient to Times Square and Bryant Park.Recommended.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We stayed at the Homewood Suites for 4 nights and had a great time. The reception staff were helpful and friendly as was the concierge who changed a restaurant booking for us. We were celebrating a 50th and 21st birthday so wanted the hotel to be perfect which it ways. The room was generously sized and the beds super comfortable. Tiny gripe about the bath, the plug didn’t work properly so the water drained out quicker than you could bathe. Would really recommend this hotel. Breakfast had plenty of choice and the complimentary tea and coffee area was a blessing

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We are Hilton Honors members and like the location of this Homewood Suites. It’s far enough from Times Square that it was so crowded or noisy. It’s nice to have free Wi-Fi and breakfast included. The staff was helpful and would recommend this hotel as a great stay in Manhattan. It’s also close to a subway stop.One thing to bring if you aren’t used to street noises are earplugs. They help block out the sounds of the City.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: This hotel was conveniently located to subway station and local attractions. Room with immaculate and very quiet ! It was nice to have breakfast provided at the hotel instead of wondering out- great value!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: My 94 y/o mother, my son and myself traveled to NY from Florida to have the Christmas experience in NY. Rockettes, Rockefeller Center tree, Chanticleer Christmas concert, etc. We were concerned about hotels as my mom and myself are mobility impaired. I’d stayed in Homewood Suites in other parts of the US. This Homewood Suites in NYC was wonderful. Every aspect of our stay was great. From before we arrived to check out, our every need and request was taken care of. Staff was polite and prompt. I’ll definitely stay here again.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I booked this hotel since it was close to the Javitts convention center and close to midtown. I was attending a hotel and restaurant conference for two days with my husband. When we got off the airport shuttle at Penn Station, the hotel was a short walk about less than ten minutes. The hotel is very close to many restaurants, cafes, and Times Square. It was very clean, modern, and warm. The staff greeted us each day as we left and came back. We had a king suite, which due to location (being New York), was a small room with desk, refrigerator,microwave, stovetop, bathroom, and armoire. The rooms and bathroom were very clean and new which was comforting.Free WiFi was great as was the 24 hour coffee station in the lobby. The free breakfast- is standard American continental breakfast and nothing to rave about but will do for a fast bite. I enjoyed my visit as I felt comfortable and safe in the area. I look forward to visiting again.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Great experience from check in to check out. Hotel is in a great location, many restaurants and shops within walking distance , friendly staff, loved our room, absolutely no complaints from anyone...can't wait to return in the summer.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Good location with nice breakfast and complimentary tea/coffee in reception. Rooms were big and well equipped. All staff were friendly and porters were very helpful as we had lots of luggage. We asked for a low floor at time of booking and received this.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: This is an exceptional hotel. The suites are ultra modern and exceptionally clean. You will be very satisfied with this hotel. The complimentary breakfast is great with a large entryway and seating area. The location is close to everything and in many cases within walking distance to area attractions. Coffee always available.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Extend Weekend Trip with teenagers. Family friendly in safe area of city, modern, clean and affordable for the amenities received. Spacious room with two double beds and twin pull out. Small kitchen area has nice size fridge, microwave and stove top. A/C and Heat was newer, worked great and kept us very comfortable. Bathroom was clean and fresh after arriving. Public space in hotel is clean, modern and newer. Carpets are clean and fresh. 10 minute walk to Times Square or Macy's. Staff is accommodating with early check-in, if available. Bag check is offered if you are leaving several hours after check out. Staff assisted with finding transportation to site seeing events and was able to suggest alternative options (UBER, LYFT, etc)

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Lovely hotel, friendly staff and having breakfast covered plus endless hot chocolates was an added bonus and great value for money. The location was ideal for everywhere we needed to get to in NYC. Would stay again!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We enjoyed our stay here. Besides a few small things (same thing for breakfast everyday with that nasty sausage these chain hotels insist on serving; sponge instead of kitchen towel and dishcloth), we loved it here. The staff is excellent and very cordial. We will be back on our next NYC trip.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: My boyfriend and I stayed here Friday night 12/1 it was excellent down to the room staff and service. We enjoyed it so much great price and location!! Beautiful decor for Xmas too. Our room was pretty big they had coffee and free breakfast also..perfect will be back.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Stayed here with my family for Thanksgiving. We had such a wonderful time. Having a suite with a full kitchen was great, perfect for leftovers. The rooms feel brand new and are sleek and modern in design. The bathroom in our efficiency was a little small, but the space in the room made up for this.The staff are so helpful and friendly. You really feel taken care of at this property. The value is also amazing because the rate includes a free, hot breakfast. I have stayed at many hotels within the city within a variety of price points, but I will definitely return here just for the wonderful service and value I received.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I have stayed at this hotel almost every week for the past four months. Great staff, clean rooms. Breakfast is good - but gets a bit repetitive for me. The only complaint is that a few of the rooms have poor cell service on Verizon. That's not the hotel's fault of course, but it has been a challenge a few times I had business calls.I plan to bring my family on a trip here soon.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I was very pleased with this hotel! The staff were so friendly and helpful! The suites were clean and seemed to be very new. I would most definitely recommend this hotel. It has an excellent location, being walking distance to times square, Macy's, Broadway, and other attractions. My family and I felt very safe during our stay there.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Impressed to find 2 beds with a roll-in-shower, no carpeting in the room, faucets placed on side of sink for easy reach, push button, drop down cabinet for easy access. One of the best ADA wheelchair accessible rooms we have stayed in. Thanks so very much!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Nice clean hotel. Staff were always friendly. Breakfast was ok and good value for money. Some mornings were extremely busy so not alot of places to sit to eat. (Make sure you pick your times). The hotel has a complimentary tea/coffee/hot chocolate station 24hrs in the Foyer, along with bowl of fruit.Laundry was very convenient, make sure you get heaps of 25c coins.Great place. Would reccomend for people travelling with kids.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Loved the Homewood Suites Hotel on West 37th Street in NYC. The reasonable room rate and central location drew me in, the friendly service and cleanliness of the entire facility will cause us to return time and time again.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Expensive and I felt customer service could improve. room was nice. breakfast was average. overall a good hotel. Rooms spotlessly clean, good shower and comfy bed. housekeeping very good. TV channels were limited. room view was not that great.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: My family of four had a great experience while staying at this hotel. The check in and out was very easy and efficient and the staff was always helpful with providing us directions to our destinations for the day.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: This hotel is well located in the Times Square area of Manhattan. The nearest Subway station is 3 blocks away. The rooms are spacious and offer a full kitchen. The bed was comfortable, and the staff was friendly. The breakfast was not as good as other Hilton hotels. It was just so so. The breakfast area can be pretty crowded between 7 and 10. Overall I highly recommend this hotel.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We were a family with one toddler. We had a king room. view was of some office. However, can't beat the great location close to Times Square and walking distance to Penn Station. Spacious and clean room. Friendly staff.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: This hotel is a 10-minute walk from Times Square and is very cozy/comfortable/beautiful! The lobby is gorgeous and has ample space to sit down and relax. The staff is also very accommodating and helpful. We were traveling in a party of 6 and booked 3 rooms. We arrived early and since our rooms weren't ready, we were offered to have our baggage stored. The room itself (1KG EFF STUDIO W/SOFA-NSMK) is a decent size for a central location in Manhattan and if you're just sleeping there, it's more than enough space for 2 people. The room is pleasantly renovated and everything seemed very new in the room. Although we didn't use the kitchen, it did have everything you could need to make a nice dinner in the hotel room.The breakfast was delicious! A wide variety of foods, drinks and lots of space to sit down and eat. I would definitely recommend this hotels to others-- location was great, price was even better at about $343/night and the staff was very lovely and helpful. I would stay again if I were to return to NYC. Thanks!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Fantastically located hotel. Rooms spotlessly clean, good shower and comfy bed. Friendly and helpful staff. Hot breakfast variety not great (turkey sausage, dried potatoes and scrambled eggs) but acceptable. It was all hot and plenty of it. Endless coffee all day. Good WiFi and a super roof terrace with great views. Highly recommended. Only scores three stars as yet again Hilton group didn't bother to credit me with reward points.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I first stayed here after it had just opened and fell in love with it (especially since the price was so good). When I made a last minute decision to spend the night in the city following a show, I was happy to see this available again at such an inexpensive rate! ($91AAA). Love the hardwood floors, quiet halls, beautiful lobby and quick and friendly check-in. We requested a higher floor away from the elevator, which were both granted (17th floor, corner room). We had a king sized bed with a single sofa bed that we didn’t utilize this trip. Even though we didn’t use it, we love the little kitchen. Everything was sparkling clean in the bathroom, with a good pressured hot shower to start the day. Appreciated the non-flimsy towels!The closet was of a good size, with a small safe inside. Nice flat screen television and two small tables at either side of the bed with outlets and a small lamp. About a ten minute walk to time square as well as Penn Station. The plentiful free breakfast was ready at 6am, which included scrambled eggs, potatoes and sausages, fruit, various bagels/bread, yogurt and juices. And coffee always available in the lobby. Will definitely stay here again if the price is right.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Conveniently located neat Penn Station, this was a lovely hotel with lovely lobby and nice breakfast. However, for some reason this Homewood suites unlike every other we've ever stayed in does not have an Evening Social. Quite disappointing on this score. But lovely room and very comfortable.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We stayed for 4 nights and found everything to be great particularly given the rate. The rooms are large for nyc and clean. Beds comfy and extremely quiet. We didn’t hear any outside or hallway noise during our entire stay which is remarkable. The breakfast was so so but lots of variety. Location made it easy to visit locations all over manhattan. Staff was extremely accommodating.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: The location is great, easy access to the subway, close to a parking garage and easy in and out of the tunnel. The room was very clean and the value was exceptional. I would definitely stay here again.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Good location. Flew into JFK, took the subway to Penn Station and walked to the hotel. Walked to Times Square and the Convention Centre as well.Breakfast was a typical cooked breakfast. They changed the egg dish every day.Room was clean and well maintained. Tried the electronic key which was nice because we were able to skip the front desk which looked a little understaffed at times. It didn't work one day so we had to line up at the front desk to get it reset.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: love the place, free breakfast, 24 hour coffee (regular and decaf), place to sit and watch TV in the lobby. tables to bring your own food in and sit privately perfect other than the fire station down the block that love using their sirens at all hours.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Booked through Priceline, but did my research & knew I was getting the Homewood Suites.VERY happy with the cleanliness, spaciousness & professionalism of this hotel handy to MSG and many Broadway locales.We got a corner room on the 11th floor & I think those are more spacious. A small kitchen (you can make coffee, heat up a meal or if you’re staying for a while actually cook). Great for couples as well as families Tip: definitely make it down for breakfast but make a point of picking up some milk/ creamer for & ask for extra coffee in the morning & take a bottle of wine for your room (or the rooftop terrace in good weather)

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Good location and if you know how to walkin nyc then ots a great location. Great rooms and spacious for nyc hotel. Im not sure if will stay again. Breakfast egg do taste like eggs and no cheese. Staffmist be more helpful with clients

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: A tremendous find after thirty years of staying on Manhattan. Location great and the room was spacious and clean and well-equipped. The staff were very helpful and the location proved to be great without being too noisy. Excellent.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: At every turn, Hilton hotels offer to make your stay "the best it can be". At first, I was disappointed with my stay at Times Square HWS, but I took them up on their offer and now I am completely satisfied. I am here on business and if you are coming for the same, I recommend that you not "upgrade" to a room with a balcony (especially if it is too cold to be outside anyway!). This eats up the space in your room, eliminates the couch + couch table, and blocks your view to outside (the balcony wall is pretty high, and balcony rooms are only on level 8 so you're walled off by neighboring buildings as well). When my fridge started making a high pitched sound in the night, I decided I would go ahead and ask to move . . . SO GLAD I DID! I have a "downgraded" room which doesn't include a balcony, but I am on the 16th floor and have a couch and couch table, and a much more open view! Tiara at the front desk made this an easy switch. Junior is another friendly and helpful force up front. Speaking of upfront, the lobby space is fairly large and cozy with a fireplace. It can get REALLY crowded down there at peek times, so it is great that they have a fairly large space. For as big as the hotel is, it is fairly quiet in the halls and rooms. Noise from neighboring guests is fairly minimal. Breakfast has more options that other HWS locations (or Hampton Inns, etc.) but less complimentaries in the rooms. Not a deal breaker, just notable difference within the chain. I would definitely stay here again, and recommend to others as well.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: The hotel is ideally located to upper/lower Manhattan and upper east side. Good staff and service and good breakfast.Rooms are spacious and comfortable. Good value for money in terms of staying in the heart of NYC.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: This hotel was in a great location, you could easily walk to Times Square and the subway around the corner. The staff were all very friendly, the room was good and the breakfast was okay. My only gripe was we booked and paid for 7 nights but they only had us down for 6 we were told they would sort it out not to worry but we ended up being charged for the 7th night which I had to contact them about when I got home to request a refund which took 2 weeks to get back and because the exchange rate had changed it wasn’t what we were charged.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I had a wonderful experience at the Homewood Suites. Everyone was helpful and friendly.In particular, Nick and Ivette went above and beyond.Many thanks for a "home away from home" feeling! I will definitely stay at Homewood on my next visit to NYC.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Very modern rooms. Pretty quiet. Comfortable beds. Good free breakfast. Large fitness center. Good location. You can easily walk to Time Square and Broadway shows as well as nearby convention center Javitz.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Cozy lobby ! Everyone was helpful ! Room was clean and I loved the big window and that one section opened ! Top floor lounge has great views ! Easy to walk to many places and restaurants. We walked to Macy's, Time Square, and Bryant Park ! You will love this location!!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Every year I stay here for business and I absolutely love it! The location, the staff, and the rooms are wonderful! The rooms are modern, clean, w/ a great cute kitchenette (which I totally utilize since I stay so long), and fabulous views of the city! Super comfy bed! I get a higher room and I love the natural light that comes in. The front desk and housekeeping staff was very professional, accommodating, and just overall nice with positive attitudes. I found myself smiling every time I entered and left the hotel. Special shout out to:JuniorThomasMikeStaphonKeep up the great work! I will definitely be back again in April and I look forward to it! See you all then! :)

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Staying at the Homewood Suites Times Square in New York City might have been as close to a perfect stay at a hotel as I’ve ever experienced. Before I arrived I received an email asking if I needed anything during my stay. Check-in was easy, my room was clean and spacious, the bathroom and shower work equally pleasing. Everything about my stay was excellent. Breakfast was excellent and having coffee available all day was a treat especially considering the weather was cold.I highly recommend this hotel with its clean facilities and a staff that lives and breathes hospitality. Everyone goes out of their way to make sure you’re staying at the Homewood Suites is perfect.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: The hotel has quite spacious rooms all equipped with a kitchenette and an comfortable bathroom.Good cleanliness and professional service. A good price/quality ratio and the breakfast which is included in the price is a bonus although the variety and quality of the breakfast is not so high.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: This hotel is centrally located, offers an excellent breakfast, and has a dream staff. The room was really clean and the atmosphere was welcoming. Would highly recommend this for anyone looking for a hotel in New York!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I normally stay at another property when I am in Midtown Manhattan. A friend made the reservation here for Wed-Sat and we were going to check in there on Saturday. Because of the hospitality here, the great location and awesome staff I extended the stay here. The manager Tiara is a ROCK STAR! as she helped tremendously. I will be back again, and believe that Tiara should be a GM here, as she truly understands what hospitality means to business executives traveling!My highest marks go to her and the team at this hotel! Thanks! Doc!!
user_name:
LTFB703
Washington DC, District of Columbia

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I was traveling with my daughter and 7 year old granddaughter for her birthday. We loved the hotel, rooms exceptionally clean and comfortable! The location was close to everything and we had the best time!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Recently stayed at this hotel to attend a conference at the Javits Center. It is definitely nicer than other similarly-priced hotels near the convention center. The walk to Javits isn't too bad, and it was about $10 to Uber. The free breakfast was decent, although the breakfast area would get very crowded. The lobby and rooms were all seemed very clean and modern.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Overall we had a great experience in the hotel. Our complaints are:ROOM: small, not how they look in pictures, sofa bed is super uncomfortable. We couldn’t use itBREAKFAST: it has a good variety of things but they serve the same things everyday. After 5 days it was tiresome

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Staff was EXCELLENT. Every morning we were met by a smiling face at breakfast by AUDREEN. Every morning AUDREEN greeted us with a warm smile and always helpful. The breakfast was okay but AUDREEN made up for the lack of bacon. The suite was not very well planned. Mirror in living area could use a light for getting ready. Only one mirror with light was in bathroom. When couch is pulled out for sleeping you can not pass from sleeping area to get outside without rolling across pulled out couch. The springs in the couch could be felt and should have another foam mattress on top of it to sleep. The two queen size beds were comfortable. Never stayed in a hotel were EVERY STAFF from late night desk staff to cleaning all were amazing and went out of their way to address any questions or request.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: This was my first time in New York and we booked the Homewood Suites.From the moment you walk into the hotel it as that very nice reception area and the friendly welcoming staff to help you.Our room was on the 3rd floor facing the road outside,the room was nice and spacious with a small kitchen area.Although we overlooked the road outside we heard little or no noise,the beds were comfatable and the room cleaned daily.There was breakfast provided which was a nice extra.The hotel is ideally situated for all tourist spots and the subway just a 5 minute walk away.I would recommend this hotel and hopefully return myself again soon

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Staff were friendly and helpful. Breakfast was surprisingly good. Location, just a few minutes from Times Square was great. Unlike some NYC hotels, the wait for an elevator was minimal. Even though the hotel was full for the NYC marathon, we didn't feel crowded.
user_name:
Auguste F
New Haven, Ct, United States

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: First of all, the location is perfection. Short walk to Times Square, longer walk but still within walking distance of Central Park, and close to major subway stops.The hotel itself is great. Continental breakfast, rooftop access, spacious rooms with kitchenettes, and great views. The staff was so kind and helpful as well. They allowed us to switch to two double beds rather than a king to accommodate our additional guests free of charge.We were so pleased with our stay here--I would certainly stay here when I return to NYC!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: A+++++ Amazing hotel and staff! The breakfast was outstanding and the rooms are huge. The front desk staff took care of us and let us check in early. I was completely satisfied with every aspect of this hotel. The central location was convenient to everything we did.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: My daughter and I took a "girls trip" to NYC and stayed at the Homewood Suites in Midtown Manhattan. We had a great experience at this hotel. Staff was very pleasant, the room was a nice size for NY (Premium king efficiency), free breakfast and a lovely lobby & rooftop lounge area . We found the location of the hotel to be nice and central since we toured Manhattan from top to bottom. Would recommend this hotel to friends and family.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: A very welcoming hotel with good staff. The room was clean and well stocked. We had a cooker, microwave, fridge freezer, safe, hairdryer, iron and board in the room. The room was very quiet and we slept well. The only niggle we had was that the washbasin in the bathroom did not function correctly in that the plug would not close. We reported this to reception and they very quickly organised someone to come and see to it. Unfortunately they could not fix it, but we used our ingenuity and were able to use it .The roof terrace was great with fantastic views.The lifts were very quick. - no hassles at all.The breakfasts were tasty with a choice of cooked, fruit, toast and pastries. We had no difficulty in finding a table to eat at, even when it was busy.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: This location can't be beat - not in the center of Times Square craziness, but close enough to everything to make it walkable and on a "side" street not a main. The lobby looks fresh and the rooms are clean and modern with a small kitchen area and wood floors. We were right next to the elevator yet heard no noise from it. Only once did we encounter the "elevator lines" that we read reviews about, but it wasn't that bad. The rooftop deck is a nice feature - we enjoyed sitting up there in the morning with coffee. The free breakfast is not special, but what you would expect for a free buffet. We declined it the second morning and went elsewhere. It was also pretty crowded. Despite that, we would surely stay here again. Front desk staff was very kind and friendly.
user_name:
mandjfoy
Manchester, New Hampshire, United States

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Staying in a balcony room for a week and woke up to ants literally everywhere. In my clothes, on my nightstand in the bathroom and by the kitchen and door. Manager has no other rooms and offered me a dirty room as an option. Now I'm awake, tired and can't get my day started because of this. Definitely not what I've come to expect as a frequent Hilton tenant.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Excellent location, well priced, extra special touches, couldn't do enough for you, a definite five stars, breakfast included and tea, coffee facilities available, laundry facilities are so convenient

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We would recommend this hotel for any family group travelling to New York.As a base it is ideally located in midtown close enough to walk to all attractions.Rooms are spacious and very cleanHotel gym is great for a workout and all staff are welcoming and friendly.Concierge service will arrange anything you request. Rooftop terrace is great of a night.We are a family of five and will definetley use this hotel again

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We stayed last week as a family of 5 from the UK. The reception staff were efficient and friendly. The room was so clean, i usually take a pack of flash wipes with me to go over the bathroom etc but there was no need here and the room was thoroughly cleaned every day. The buffet breakfast was great and saved us a fortune. The dining hall area does get busy but it is fast moving and we always found a table even if it took a lap of the hall. The breakfast included an egg dish (sometimes scrambled, sometimes omelette), a sausage patty and potato dish. There were a variety of cereals, toast, bagels, fruit and pastries. The coffee was lovely and i really love the coffee mate creamer (we don't have that variety in the UK and i wished we did). The location is just off 8th Ave, probably not the most desirable end of town but we didn't have any issues and the streets were so busy we didn't ever feel vulnerable. You are also near to a Starbucks, 7-11 and a Dunkin Donuts so plenty of places to grab a snack. I think the walk to Times Square took about 15-20 mins.On our last day Reception ordered our car back to the airport and he was reasonable and on time. We stayed in the reception area drinking coffee and watching the TV by the fire, it was so relaxing.I wouldn't hesitate to recommend this hotel especially if you are a family and i hope to return soon.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Excellent experience...friendly & helpful staff, generous breakfast buffet. Close to B&H for photographers & techies. For movie goers - Loews, AMC & Regal Cinemas. Shopping heaven at Macy's. Other amenities - CVS, Penn Station, Port Authority. Area has optional eateries. Felt safe walking about. Delicious afternoon cookies!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I am a fan of Homewood Suites, so for our visit to New York it was my go to choice for our family’s 6 night stay. From the moment we entered the lobby it felt comfortable and welcoming and the staff didn’t fail to live up to that perception they were all very friendly and helpful. The hotel is located in an excellent location, walking distance to many of the attractions including Madison Square Garden, Times Square, Broadway, 5th Avenue, Grand Central Station, Empire State Building and even Central Park. Rooms are modern, clean and neat but the refrigerator runs quite loudly that you really notice at night. Breakfast is included, a small variety of hot and cold foods with tea and coffee available in the lobby 24 hours a day. We made use of the laundry and fitness centre facilities. Overall a positive family stay, I would recommend this hotel to anyone wanting to be close to most tourists attractions in an area that is quite quiet and feels safe to walk around morning and night.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Stayed here for our week in New York. Great hotel! Fantastic spot. Really close to Times Square and the subway. Staff were really helpful and friendly. Highly recommend .We were able to walk everywhere from this hotel. Very close to Hell’s Kitchen which have fantastic restaurants. Also really close to broadway. Beds were comfortable and shower was great!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We stayed for 8 nights in a 2 x Queen bedroom studio room. The room was very spacious and clean with a kitchenette. The room also had a foldout sofa bed which was great as we were traveling with our 2 adult children, so they were very happy they didn't have to share a bed!! The rooftop terrace is a great place to have a few drinks and relax. The staff were fantastic and very friendly and always happy to help out. The hotel is in a great located and an easy walk to main attractions.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We stayed in a 2-queen bedroom Studio non-smoking room. The room was clean and spacious with a mid-sized fridge and small kitchen area. The free breakfast had something for everyone. It has a coin laundry which is very handy for those long trips. We spoke to two different concierges for various matters and they were pleasant and very helpful. The location is excellent, as it is only a short walk to the Subway, Times Square, Cinemas & Theatres. If we return to Manhattan I would stay here again.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I think this was my 18th vacation to NYC, so I have a pretty good feel for what makes a good place in this town. The person who decided to put a refrigerator/freezer about 4.5 feet from the head of the bed should be fired immediately. I requested a room where the fridge is across the room, as I saw in some pics, but was unable to get one. That was partially offset by getting one of the patio rooms, but I STRONGLY suggest you do not book a room here if you're a light sleeper, and having that right by your ear would keep you up all night long.I think the garment district is a decent part of town to stay in, assuming you realize that from the 30s, getting to the east side isn't overly convenient. I personally enjoy this area, but to each his own. The hotel itself, well, it's a Homewood. You know what you're getting. Functional, but nothing exciting. The rooms did look newly furnished and the lobby was quite clean at all hours. My room, however, had obviously not been swept upon arrival, because I removed my socks before taking a shower, and could feel tons of junk under my feet. Not the best way to start a trip. Also, the washcloth waiting on the sink at arrival was not clean, as it had some form of makeup on it (picture attached.)The patio attached to the room was tremendous though. Perfect October weather for having bagels in the morning and drinks at night on it. I would would suggest only coming if you can get a patio room, or really need a lot of food refrigerated on your trip.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: I always come to this hotel b/c of it's location, staff, amenities, and the suite is nice. Great way to relax on business or leisure after an exciting day out in the city. There are tons of places to get food. If you like hockey / basketball, MSG is 4 blocks away. Although the city is loud, the rooms do a great job of keeping it quiet.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Great hotel in the Garment district, 5 mins walk from Madison Sq Garden and 10 mins walk from Times Square. Friendly staff, clean and comfortable rooms. Nice roof terrace too. Good facilities (business suite, gym and laundry). Our room had a balcony which, whilst basic, was a nice thing to have. Recommended!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Great location, great rooms, clean, friendly and helpful staff, great breakfast included. Was very clean. Possible only complaint was only 3 elevators which were not that large and often were full cresting a little bit of a wait. But minor inconvenience, overall experience was top notch!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Great walking distance to main mid-town attractions. Quiet because it is off the beaten path. Great service and accommodations - lovely lobby. Would definitely stay again. Staff was helpful and knowledgeable to help us with any of our needs.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Very nice place. My room was a outside balcony suite with kitchenette (8th floor) Fantastic to be able to "step outside" in the evenings, and mornings. Very clean, nice to have the refrigerator and kitchen appliances. Highly recommend. (A bit pricey but by Manhattan standards average to a bit high)

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Every employee at this hotel was friendly and willing to help. Rooms are renovated and clean. The variety of things to eat for breakfast was impressive. It is located just a few blocks from the bus terminal and Broadway. Room size is good for a city hotel.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We stayed in Manhattan at the Homewood prior to a cruise from Cape Liberty. The hotel rooms are on the small side but are equipment with a full kitchen should you wish to make your own meals. Breakfast is included which includes a wide assortment of different hot and cold dishes. The hotel is convenient to all the sights in Manhattan and the subway is only a block away. The staff is very accomodating and will even book Broadway shows or any sightseeing tour. Although the hotel does not have a restaurant, many food choices are within one or two blocks. Prices are reflective of a Manhattan hotel but you are guaranteed a clean and comfortable bed in a quiet room. PS. Don't forget the blinds as you can see into other buildings. Also some lower rooms have their own inside balcony.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: OK, so I stayed at Homewood Suites for five nights last year when I was working with a client at New York Comic Con, and I was so pleasantly surprised: The hotel was affordable, clean and well-located, and the free breakfast is the best I've ever had at a hotel offering such a thing.I enjoyed it so much last year, I stayed there again this year for seven nights. This trip was a tiny bit less satisfying, since it seems someone was in my bathroom before I checked in and left a rather substantial box cutter behind (I searched under the bed and in the closets after I found THAT), and also, every piece of furniture faced AWAY from the TV, which made it really awkward to watch it -- especially with another person. Also, may I just add that you should probably build in extra time for the elevators, since there are only three and there are a LOT of floors and rooms. I was almost late to a meeting waiting for the elevator (and I was on the 19th floor -- the stairs weren't really an option).But all these complaints are so MINOR. The staff is accommodating and friendly, and there are FREE COOKIES in the lobby every afternoon. And did I mention how clean the hotel is? I've already made my weeklong reservation for New York Comic Con 2018. See you then, guys!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: It's a Fantastic property, super view from the 21 floor where we were,roof top terrace is a great place to have a beer. The breakfast was super and the daily free tea/coffee and cookies. Staff are excellent-so helpful and polite. Hope to return soon - highly recommended.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Great place to stay for a two night stay for three of us in a suite. Full kitchen is a nice amenity. The staff is super and Tiara gets a shout out for her excellent suggestions of places to go and giving great directions. We visited Chelsea Market and a bagel place near the train station on her recommendations.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Very nice hotel, wish we had a view but NYC has too many buildings next to each other. The staff was extremely nice and helpful. Food was good. We had a very good time. We spent 3 days. Every time we would come back to the Hotel the staff would greet us. We had several questions on location of things and the internet and the staff worked with us and provided us with very helpful answers.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: The hotel was spotless, the staff was excellent. Loved the size of the room, bed was comfortable. Breakfast was so so but was free. Parking garage across the street. TV channels didn't always work but we weren't there to watch tv so it was okay. Rooftop deck is great and dogs are welcome. Will definitely return to this hotel!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: Great place, awesome location and staff! The bed is fantastic. We had a problem with your shower that was solved in half a day. Good breakfast (included) and the windows of the room open - which is totally a plus in nyc. Would totally go back!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: My girlfriends and I stayed here this past weekend. The rooms were clean and we loved having the refrigerator and dishwasher to keep snacks and wine in and to clean the dishes. The beds were comfortable (even the pullout bed) and the rooftop was a fabulous place to end an evening and relax. The best part of the hotel was the staff. Every single member of the team went out of their way to be helpful! Tiara at the front desk was amazing! She helped guide us to all of our destinations, helped with check ins at 2 different times, advised us on great places to visit and was so helpful, we ended our stay feeling like we'd made a new friend. Keep up the good work. . .we will be back!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: This is an excellent hotel, friendly helpful staff. Complementary breakfast great. Room tidy and quiet, well equipped to use kitchenette if you so desired.Complementary tea/coffee in foyer welcome after day sightseeing. A short walk to public transport.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY
review_body: We had a great experience. Would recommend it. Close to starting points for explorer passes. Near Time Square. Hotel was clean and quiet. Rooms were very comfortable and the gym was useful. Enjoyable experience.
